
1a1(mdo 'grel): dgra 'chos pa sa la lhas mdzad pa'i 'dul ba me tog phreng rgyud bzhugs so//
1b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ bi na yA kA ri kA/ bod skad du/ 'dul ba tshig le'ur byas pa/ bam po dang
1b2(mdo 'grel): po/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag
1b3(mdo 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /gang gis nyid kyi dbu yang rin chen 'od 'phro lta bu dang/ /rab rgyas pad+ma gser mdog dang 'dra'i btsun
1b4(mdo 'grel): mo rnams kyang byin/ /ma lus don gnyer rab dgar mdzad nas byang chub mchog brnyes pa/ /chos 'dul zhi ba'i don du
2a1(mdo 'grel): ston mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang thob ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa rnams las des par sgrol 'gyur zhing//
2a2(mdo 'grel): srid pa'i 'ching ba mdza' dag bcad nas mya ngan 'das gyur pa/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gting mdza' med pa kun las sgrol ba yi//
2a3(mdo 'grel): gzings gyur gcig pu bder gshegs kyis brten chos de la yang 'dud/ /gang yang yon tan kun ldan yon gnas dam par
2a4(mdo 'grel): gang gyur pas/ /cung zad phul yang 'bras bu rgya chen shin tu 'phel 'gyur ba/ /bdag nyid kun gyis phyag 'os bde bar
2b1(mdo 'grel): gshegs pas rab tu bsngags/ /gang zag brgyad mchog legs spyad kyis brgyan 'phags tshogs rnams la'ang 'dud/ /gang gis 'dul ba bstan pa
2b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ /gang gis gang zhig 'dul ba thob/ /ma dul spang nas 'dul dbang gyur/ /'dul ba la ni yang dag gnas/ /chos dang 'phags pa'i tshogs bcas
2b3(mdo 'grel): kyi/ /ston pa de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /gdul bya rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/ /'dul ba las brtsams cung zad brjod/ /le lo can dang blo dman dag/
2b4(mdo 'grel): gzhung mangs rnams kyis 'jigs pa ste/ /legs gsungs 'dul ba'i rgya mtsho la/ /yon tan ldan yang 'dod mi phyed/ /de phyir de dag gzhug don du//
2b5(mdo 'grel): skyo med 'gro ba'i che ba yi/ /tshig ler byas pa'i them skas kyis/ /rtag tu mu stegs ston byed bzhin/ /rab bsngags nor ni phun tshogs shing/ /lha yi
3a1(mdo 'grel): khang bzang dam par skye/ /ting nge 'dzin dang nges 'byung 'thob/ /tshul khrims 'di ni 'bras bu che/ /de la 'dir ni rnam kun tu/ /'dul ba min pas
3a2(mdo 'grel): dag pa med/ /ji ltar chu med 'dag chal gyis/ /mnyes kyang dri ma mi 'dag bzhin/ /ji ltar zla ba med pa yi/ /mtshan mo dag ni mdzes ma yin/ /de bzhin tshul khrims
3a3(mdo 'grel): mi gnas pa'i/ /rab byung rgyal ba'i bstan mi mdzos/ /de phyir snyoms las spangs nas ni/ /bya dang bya min shes nus phyir/ /tshul khrims kyis ni brgyan 'dod pas//
3a4(mdo 'grel): 'dul la 'bang pas gnas par bya/ /gang phyir 'dul ba shes gyur cing/ /gus par phyed pa'i dge slong ni/ /rang nyid yid ches gnas gyur bas/ /gdams ngag rjes
3a5(mdo 'grel): bstan ston pa yin /de yang 'khor rnam bzhi po yis/ shin tu gus bcas mdun bdar zhing/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gces mdzod 'dzin//
3b1(mdo 'grel): skyes chen rnams la phan phyir yang/ /dam pa'i chos la legs gnas brtson/ /'di yi rang gi tshul khrims kyi/ /phung po legs bsrungs nyams pa med/ /gzhan gang 'gyod pa dang bcas pa/ /thams cad
3b2(mdo 'grel): de yi rjes su 'brang/ /don rnams rnam par nges pa yang/ /phul phyin mkhas pa thob pa yin/ /chos rig chos dang bcas pa yis/ /pha rol rgol ba pham par byed/ /gcug lag khang duAng gzhan mi
3b3(mdo 'grel): 'gron /dge 'dun dbus na 'jigs ba med/ /de 'dir phyogs kyi sgron ma ste/ /'od gsal rab tu snang bar byed/ /gang du 'dul ba mkhas gnas pa/ /de ru nga ni snying las chung/ /de ltar dpag
3b4(mdo 'grel): med rnam pa yis/ /thub pas 'dul ba'i phan yon gsungs/ /de bas gus pa dang bcas pas/ /chos 'dul bzung phyir brtson par bya/ /lo bcu yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ /dge slong kun sdom
3b5(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid can/ /gsal zhing kun spyod rig pa yis/ /rab byung dang ni bsnyen rdzogs bya/ /so sor thar dang rnam 'byed don/ /mkhas shing dge bas sbyin bya ste/ /gzhan la rjes su ston pa yi/ /mthu
3b6(mdo 'grel): ldan zhu gnas bca' ba'i 'os/ /ston pa'i gsung ni ma 'khrugs pa'i/ /byis pas mdo tsam klags pa yis/ /gsal bar shes pa ma yin pas/ /rnam par phye ste rtogs par bya/ /so sor thar dang
4a1(mdo 'grel): rnam 'byed ni/ /gang 'dir shin tu mi mkhas lo/ /drug cu lon yang byis pa ste/ /de ni gzhan la brten pas gnas/ /slob dpon de las rgan yang ni/ /gzhon nus ji bzhin nges brten
4a2(mdo 'grel): te/ /gsar bu yin phyir phyag mi bya/ /gzhan ni thams cad byis pas bzhin/ /pham pa byung dang bu lon chags/ /nad pa rab tu dbyung mi bya/ /bran dang rgyal pos bkrabs par grags/ /chom rkun rgyal
4a3(mdo 'grel): mtshan 'chad pa min/ /smad pa'i rigs dang yan lag med/ /sgur gyol lag sor sprul 'dra dang/ /smad 'khyal lag rdum 'theng po dang/ /sna len dang ni sna rings min/ /gzhon ches pa dang rgan ches dang/ /ha cang
4a4(mdo 'grel): bong ring ha cang thung/ /yan lag mi min rnam pa can/ /ha cang mgul rings 'jing nub min/ /bud med lam dang khur gyis dug/ mgo rings mgo thung mgo chung dang/ /so ni shin tu phyir gyed dang/ /mig yon dang ni
4a5(mdo 'grel): lta stangs 'jigs/ /dmar dang ser dang sngo ches dang/ /chu bur rnam pa lta bu'i mig /rab tu byung ba bkag pa ste/ /sprul pa la sogs de bzhin no/ /sbang bar bya ba mdor bsdu na/ /mdog dang dbyibs la skyon chags dang
4a6(mdo 'grel): ma rungs rigs te rnam pa gsum/ /'khor gyur kun nas smod pa'o/ /mdog skyon dmar skya la sogs te/ /dbyibs skyon bzhin ngan la sogs yin/ /bong bu la sogs sna dang mgo/ skra dang rna ba med nyid spang//
4b1(mdo 'grel): glang po rta dang spro sna 'dra/ /sna med pa dang mig gcig dang/ /mig med pa lang la sogs kyi/ /so 'dra gang yang so med pa'o/ /rigs ni gshed ma smyig ma mkhan/ /g.yung po la sogs rnam par spang/ /shing rta mkhan la sogs pa dang/ /bstan bcos las ni gang bkag pa/ /de bzhin
4b2(mdo 'grel): gsal shing mkhan sogs dang/ /chang 'tshod la sogs gang yin pa/ /rang bzhin dman gyur de dag la/ /rnam pa kun tu bslab mi sbyin/ /de dag dge rgyun med min zhing/ /thar pa'ang mi 'dod ma yin mod/ /gcig tu bstan la skye bo yis/ /thos na skyon du lta phyir bkag/
4b3(mdo 'grel): bsam dang rjes kyi bsam shes shing/ /mngon shes ting 'dzin thob pa ni/ /mthu yis 'jig rten tshim byed phyir/ /rab tu 'byin na nyes pa med/ /ji skad bstan skyon rnams bral zhing/ /dge ba don du gnyer rnams la/ /bar chad mdza' dag dris nas ni/ /mgo nas rkang pa'i bar du
4b4(mdo 'grel): brtag/ zhag brgyad la sogs gzung nas kyang/ /ji srid bar du legs par brtag/ gang zhig sngon du yongs brtags nas/ /nyi ma gcig kyang bzhag mi bya/ /thog mar skyabs gsum byin nas ni/ /bslab gzhi lnga po dag kyang ngo/ /dkar po'i gos ni 'dzin bzhin la/ /tshogs
4b5(mdo 'grel): kyi nang du mkhyen par gsol/ /dge 'dun rtse gcig rjes gnang tshe/ /rab byung cho ga sngon 'gro bas/ /slob dpon rnam par mkhas pa yis/ /yan lag bcu yi sdom 'dzin gzhug/ de ltar dge tshul byas ma thag/ 'di ni khyim pa thams cad kyis/ /phyag byed smin par 'gyur
4b6(mdo 'grel): ba ste/ /gang phyir khyim gyi 'ching grol phyir/ /tshul ngan rab rib mun bsal te/ /ngur smrig gos ni 'dzin pa yis/ /nyi ma shar ltar lhung der ni/ /phul phyin de ni shin tu mdzos/ /sum cu rtsa gsum yongs 'du'i shing/ /sa brtol lo 'dab rnying pa bzhin/ /sdig pa kun las
4b7(mdo 'grel): ldog don du/ /'di yi bsnyen rdzogs de bzhin no/ /yul dbus su ni dge slong rnams/ /bcu las nyung du mi rung ste/ /mdza' khob tu ni bsnyen rdzogs phyir/ /snga la sogs pas 'dod pa yin/ /li kha ran tshang tshing nags/ /li khar shing 'phal shar phyogs nyid/ /u shi 
5a1(mdo 'grel): zhes brjod pa yi/ /ri bo mun pa can ni byang/ /ka ba nye ba'i ka ba yi/ /grong khyer nub na gnas pa yin/ /grong khyer 'dam bu can gyi grong/ /chu klung 'dam bu can ni lho/ /'di dag gi ni bar rnams la/ /yul dbus su ni shes bya ste/ /phyi rol mdza' 'khob
5a2(mdo 'grel): ces byar ni/ /mdza' yas mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin/ /tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yi/ /dge slong gis bsnyen rdzogs gsungs kyi/ /dung gi sgra dang khong rul dang/ /'bras kyi nang gi srin bus min/ /gal te bzhi ni las brjod mkhas/ /tshul khrims
5a3(mdo 'grel): ldan par gyur na ni/ /bsnyen rdzogs ma smad gyur pa ste/ /lha yi kyang ni phyag byar 'os/ /dge 'dun tshad dang mtshams phyir min/ /las mkhan tshul khrims ldan pa dang/ /las dag pa dang bar chad med/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin no/ /gang phyir bsnyen par
5a4(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa ni/ /gzhan yang bye brag smra bas brjod/ /ji ltar gnas pa mkhyen pas na/ /'dren pa rang rgyal rang byung gi'o/ /'phags pa kauN+Di n+ya sogs/ /lnga sde rnams ni nges pa las/ /gang zhig slob ma bzang ste rnams/ /thams cad skyabs su 'gro bas
5a5(mdo 'grel): thob/ /pho nya yis ni mchod sbyin ma/ /tshur shog dge slong zhes byas kyang/ /ston par khas blangs pa las ni/ /dge slong 'od srung bdag nyid che/ /dri bas mnyes pa nyid kyis ni/ /slob ma legs sbyin de bzhin no/ /dbus dang mdza' 'khob ba dag la/ /bsnyen
5a6(mdo 'grel): rdzogs yang dag bstan pa ni/ /bcu dang lnga yi tshogs kyis sam/ /de bas lhag pas kyang ni rung/ /de bzhin 'khor tshogs bcas pa yi/ /gau ta ma lci chos kyis/ /de las gzhan ni ci rigs par/ /las ni sngon 'gro bya ba ste/ /bsnyen par rdzogs la sngar
5a7(mdo 'grel): gyi ni gnyes par grags pa med pa yin/ /dgun dus dang ni so gnyid/ /dbyar dang thung du de bzhin du/ /ring po'i ming can du yang shes/ /'di dag dus ni rnam pa lnga/ /lhung bzed rnam sbyar gris tshod dang/ /de bzhin dbyar ni tshul 'jug dang/ rtag tu
5b1(mdo 'grel): bdag gi dran? byas te/ /gzhan du de la nyes byas 'gyur/ /dge slong rnams la 'di bsnyen rdzogs/ /de la zla phyed gdams ngag gsol/ /dge slong bcas gnas dbyar gnas nas/ /tshogs gnyis dang ni dgag dbye bya/ /tshul 'chal dge slong min par ni/ /mi
5b2(mdo 'grel): gleng khro ba nyid kyang ngo/ /lri? ba'i chos las 'das na ni/ /zla phyed tshogs gnyis mgu byas te/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa gsar bu la/ /dge slong ma yis phyag bya'o/ /lci ba'i chos brgyad 'di dag ni/ /dge slong ma la gsungs pa yin/ /bud med skyes pa'i
5b3(mdo 'grel): rnam pa dang/ /skyes pa bud med rnam pa dang/ /mkhan po gtan med nyid dang ni/ /mkhan po khyim pa'i rtags sogs nyid/ /gang yang skal ldan rkun po dang/ /yan lag bcad sogs khong chud dang/ /de yang bsnyen par rdzogs 'gyur mod/ /dge slong
5b4(mdo 'grel): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /mi 'dong bsnyen par rdzogs mi bya/ /gang gi lo ni mi shes na/ /de yi mtshan ni brtog bya ste/ /de ni na chod mngon gsal 'gyur/ /gang 'di nyid shu ma rdzogs pa'i/ /lo yis dge slong byas na ni/ /zla shol mngal
5b5(mdo 'grel): gyi zla rnams kyis/ /mkhas pa yi ni dgang bar bya/ /gal te de lta na yang 'di/ /lo ni nyi shu ma mtshang na/ /dge tshul nyid du gnas 'gyur te/ /de ni bsnyen par rdzogs min nyid/ lo ni gcig gam gnyis dag na/ /gal te dran pa rnyed gyur
5b6(mdo 'grel): na/ /'di yi lo ni tshang ba yis/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa nyid yin no/ /'on pas kyang ni go gyur na/ /las brjod pas ni ma thos kyang/ /'di la bsnyen rdzogs yod pa ste/ /tshul khrims ldan la nyes pa med/ /bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas
5b7(mdo 'grel): deng? /gal te mtshan ni gyur ba na/ /'di ni bsnyen rdzogs kho na ste/ /dge slong ma yi 'khor nang bzhag/ mkhan po mtshan ni gyur pa na/ /gal te gsol ba thos na ni/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa kho na te/ /las byed pa la'ang nyes pa med//
6a1(mdo 'grel): las byed pa na mtshan gyur na/ /gal te las brjod thos na 'dir/ /mkhan po la ni nyes byas te/ /las byed rnams la skyon yod min/ /las byed nam mkha' la gnas te/ /sa la 'dug la byed gyur na/ /bsnyen bar rdzogs pa rgyad
6a2(mdo 'grel): ring ste/ /tshul khrims 'chal bas mtho ris bzhin/ /ji ltar mi yi bdag po yis/ /gzhon nu rigs rgyud 'phel phyir bsrung/ /de bzhin ston pa'i bstan pa dag/ 'phel phyir dge tshul rnams kyang bsrung/ /shing sdong mtho la dge tshul
6a3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /bla ma'i bka' yis 'dzeg pa las/ /shing chag nas ni lhung ba'i tshe/? /de la 'di dag gsungs pa yin/ /gang phyir 'di ni rab byung ba/ /bstan la thugs rje'i bdag nyid kyis/ /bya rog skrod nus gyur lta na/ /lo bdun pa yang rjes su gnang//
6a4(mdo 'grel): rab byung dang ni bsnyen rdzogs la/ /lhung bzed can min mi drang ste/ /bsod snyoms rgyu ba rnams la ni/ /de tshe snod don gnyer bas 'thob/ /gnas brtan nye dags gang gi tshe/ /dge tshul khru bas nyan pa na/ /lhung bzed med par lhung bzed don/
6a5(mdo 'grel): gzhan song ston mo'i bar du thob/ /blangs nas kyang ni lhung bzed sogs/ /blo bzang gis ni sbyin par bya/ /rang byung bsnyen rdzogs dag kyang rung/ /bram ze bzhin du slar mi 'gro/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs gang du ni/ /nges par gnas rnams mi brjod
6a6(mdo 'grel): de/ /thos nas 'di ni bya dka' zhes/ /bram ze slar yang khyim du song/ /dge slong rnams kyi las gcig gis/ /bzhin bsnyen par rdzogs mi bya/ /tshogs dag la ni tshogs gnyis kyis/ /las ni gang duAng cung zad med/ /gnyis sam gsum po
6a7(mdo 'grel): dag kyang rung/ /dus gcig la ni bsnyen rdzogs na/ /na tshor bye brag yod gyur kyang/ /rgan pa med cing gsar bu med/ /phan tshun phyag kyang yong min te/ /rnyed pa gral rams bzhin du'o/ /skul byed dbang gi de dag la/ /las bcol ba ni rim
6b1(mdo 'grel): pas so/ /mtshams med lnga ni byas pa dang/ /rku thabs gnas dang sprul pa dang/ /mu stegs can zhugs 'on dang lkugs/ /'khrugs dang de bzhin pas pham byung/ /dge slong ma ni sun phyub dang/ /ma ning la sogs gnas mi bya/ /tsha sgo'i zhing ltar de dag la//
6b2(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims sa bon skye ba med/ /de bzhin gzhan yang bag med long/ /bsdigs pa la sogs las rnams kyis/ /smad do blang bar bya ba ni/ sems ni dul bar gyur na yin/ /mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa rnams/ /mkhas shing grags dang ldan pa dang/ /bsod
6b3(mdo 'grel): nams chen po la sogs ni/ /bskrad cing dkar par 'os pa min/ /gang phyir 'di dag mu stegs kyis/ /ri dags skrag byed seng ge'i bu/ /'di dag khyim par gyur na yang/ /ston pa de blo yis rab dang bskyed/ /'di dag rnams kyis gtsug lag khang/ /mdzes byed
6b4(mdo 'grel): khyu mchog sgra sgrogs shing/ /de bas 'di dag smad na ni/ /rang gi bstan la smad pa yin/ /kun nas nyon mongs skyes nas ma de/ /ma rungs gdon gyis rnams rmongs pas/ /bya min byed pa kho na te/ /'jig rten las ni smod par 'gyur/ /'thab krol can dang khyim sun
6b5(mdo 'grel): 'byin/ /gsum pa tshul khrims 'chal pa ste/ /las ni byed pa na yang 'di/ /gal te 'gyur brten byed na/ /'bad pas gaN+Di brdungs byas nas/ /dge 'dun gyis ni bskrad par bya/ /ka ba la ni 'jus kyang bcang/ /sgo skyes la 'jus de bzhin no/ /yang na dge bdun
6b6(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyis/ /slar yang gso ba'i 'du byed bya/ /gang yang dge 'dun de dag las/ /dpung byed yan lag 'byin bya ste/ /min na de 'dra'i dge slong gi/ rtags sun 'byin pa bzhag mi rung/ /nan tan gyis ni bskrad bya ste/ /'thab dang rtsod pa med par ba?//
6b7(mdo 'grel): de yi gnas pa cir 'gyur na/ /ro dang 'dra ba kho nar gsungs/ /dge slong ras skyon dri ma can/ /dge slong tshogs kyis chad byin la/ /dge slong mas ni gus bstan phyir/ /sngon du lngar gi phyag mi bya/ /dge bsnyen gsong par smra mi bya/ /khyim pas bsod
7a1(mdo 'grel): snyoms sbyin bya ste/ /'phags pa'i tshogs ni mnyes pa na/ /bya ba thams cad sngon bzhin no/ /'khyud chags phrag dog nang dang skyes/ /zla phyed ces bya ma ning lnga/ 'di dag re re'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rtogs pa'i don du brjod par bya/ /gang la gzhan gyis
7a2(mdo 'grel): mnan pa na/ /'khrig phyir sems la 'dod chags ni/ /rnam rgyas de ni blo ldan gyis/ /'khyud ldang ma ning shes par bya/ /gzhan gyi mtshan ni mthong ba las/ /rang la 'dod skye phrag dog drags/ /mtshon nam nad kyis rtags nyams pa/ /de ni nang kyis ma ning brjod//
7a3(mdo 'grel): gang skyes nyid nas mtshan ma ni/ /gnyis ka med pa skyes nas yin/ /zla phyed bud med zla phyed ni/ /skyes gyur zla phyed ma ning brjod/ /'dir ni sogs kyi sgra med kyang/ /zla sogs ma ning grub pa yin/ /gang zhig grong gi chos dag gi/ nus med de ni tha ma ste/ /mchan
7a4(mdo 'grel): ma gnyis ka 'dod pa ni/ /mtshan gnyis bar ni 'dod pa yin/ /mu stegs log ltas bsgos pa yi/ /yid can de ni mu stegs 'dod/ /mu stegs chos kyi longs spyod gang/ de ni mu stegs zhugs pa'o/ /dge tshul gang yang rdzun pa yis/ /rang gi rtags
7a5(mdo 'grel): ni bzung nas kyang/ /dge slong nyid du rab shes byed/ /de ni rku thabs gnas par 'dod/ /phyogs las gzhan kyi phyogs dag ni/ /tha dad tshogs la yang dag brten/ /gang zhig tshogs kyis chad pa byin/ /de ni tha dad gnas par 'dod/ /phas pham dag la log
7a6(mdo 'grel): par lta/ /dge slong ma tshogs sun 'byin dang/ /bden dang dkon mchog gsum gyi ni/ /sngags min sgrogs pa'i dge tshul nyid/ /skyon can bcu po 'di dag ni/ /chang pa'i las kyis bkar bar bya/ /phyung nas slar yang mi gzhug ste/ /ji bzhin bshags na skal ba bzhin//
7a7(mdo 'grel): dge slong pham pa ma byung na/ /cho ga bzhin du bslab phul nas/ /song na'ang skal ldan slar yang ni/ /bsnyen rdzogs dga' ston chen po bya/ /sdom gtong rang bzhin gnas pa yi/ /brda' phrad mi yi drung dag tu/ /bdag gis gang bzung bslab pa ni/ /gtong ngo zhes sogs tshig
7b1(mdo 'grel): rnams 'bul/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i rjes thogs la/ /phas pham rnams ni brjod par bya/ /rtogs ldan blo ni de dag las/ /'da' bar byed pa ma yin no/ /mi 'chab pa yi sems kyis ni/ /gal te byung na gcig la'ang mthol/ /chung du la'ang 'jigs pa'i phyir/ /de la phas pham mi
7b2(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba/ /brtul zhugs can gyis bla ma bas/ /sngar nyid mal nas langs nas ni/ /so shing bcas nas de 'og tu/ /ston pa la ni phyag bya'o/ de nas rab gus bskyed pa yis/ /bla ma la ni phyag bya ste/ /de ni de la gdams ngag sogs/ /chog bzhin du lan 'dogs yin/ /de la
7b3(mdo 'grel): khams bde sogs dris nas/ /rab tu 'bad pas de yi ni/ /gnas khang tshag tshig? yang dag gdab/ /nyer spyod sa yang sbyar bar bya/ /ston pa la ni maN+Dal dang/ /mchod rten la yang bskor ba bya/ /brtul zhugs rgan la phyag byas nas/ /de yi nus la ji bzhin du//
7b4(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan klog pa'i las dag gis/ /lus la snying po blang bar bya/ /ngur smrig gyon tsam gyis chog pa'i/ /bsam pa nam yang mi bya'o/ /so shing dus dang mthun pa'i chu/ /'dug stan la sogs bstab par bya/ /sman dang rnyed dka' zhim ba'i zas/ /'bras bu
7b5(mdo 'grel): sogs kyang de bzhin no/ /lhung bzed la sogs bkru ba yis/ /gus pas bla ma'i nye gnas bya/ /bla ma rnam par 'dzangs pas kyang/ /thams cad du ni tshod rig bya/ /tshul khrims 'chal la zhe sdang dang/ /phyag kyang na mi yang mi bya ste/ /de dang longs spyod kyang ma
7b6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /'di ni ro bseg? mgal du ma bzhin/ /khyim pa sdom la gnas kyang ni/ /dge tshul gyis ni phyag mi bya/ /'dod can khyim gyi chos rnams la/ /dge slong gis lta smos ci dgos/ /de bzhin khyim pa stobs ldan yang/ /sdom brtson kun gyi phyag mi rung/ /kun
7b7(mdo 'grel): nas ma bsdams de dag la/ /phyag len dbang ni yod ma yin/ /srid pa tha ma pa la ni/ /rigs pas rnam dpyad mi 'thad do/ /mi brtan 'khor bar 'khor bzhin pa'i/ /sems can rnams la snga ma bzhin/ /gzhan yang phyag bya min mang ste/ /spo dang bskrad pa
8a1(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa'o/ /dge slong gis rtags phyag bya ba/ /sangs rgyas dang ni sdom pas rgan/ /mi slob pa ni bdag por spyod/ /slob pa byin pa spyod pa ste/ /bsam gtan klog dang ldan pa ni/ /rjes gnang spyod pas nyes pa med/ /lhag ma le los bcom pa
8a2(mdo 'grel): yi/ /bdag nyid rnams ni bu lon spyod/ /khrims 'chal rnams ni nang du yang/ /gtsug lag khang sogs nyer spyod bkag/ bshad khang dang ni nye ba ru/ /sna tshogs gtam ni mi bya ste/ /klog dang kha ton la sogs dang/ /tshon gyi las kyang khyad par du'o/ /bshad
8a3(mdo 'grel): khang dang ni gci ba'i gnas/ /tha dad du ni bya bar gsungs/ /chu 'dor tshe na gci khang du/ /skra brda byas nas 'jug par bya/ /de yi khang par gros sogs min/ /dal bu dal bus sgra med par/ /rlung dang bshang pa gci ba rnams/ /dor byas nan gyis mi bsdam mo/ /sngon
8a4(mdo 'grel): du 'jam po gang rung gis/ /'og gi sgo ni phyis nas kyang/ /de nas lan gnyis lan gsum du/ /sa yi dag par bkru bar bya/ /lag pa g.yon par 'jam pa yis/ /sa yi phung po bdun bya ste/ /gnyis kar yang ni bdun po nyid/ /so sor tha dad du ni bzhag/ thog mar
8a5(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu la 'di/ /bslab bcas gzhan du nyes byas 'gyur/ /de nas lag pa'ang 'bad pa yis/ /chu mang pos ni rab tu bkru/ lag dang byin pa phyis nas ni/ /slar yang lag pa dag ni bkru/ lag dong rkang pa dag dang ni/ /phyi rol dag byang gsungs pa yin//
8a6(mdo 'grel): dri yi byug pa spangs pa yi/ /gtsang sbra sams ni spyod pa yin/ /'di 'dra'i byug mchog yod pa la/ /stong phrags yis ci zhig bya/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis nang gi ni/ /gtsang sgra don dam pa dag pa nyid/ /lus dang dag dang yid dag gis /sdig
8a7(mdo 'grel): pa spong bar gsungs pa yin/ /so zhing byed dang bshad ba dang/ /gci ba 'dong dang chu 'thung dang/ /mtshams nang rten la phyag 'tshal ba/ /bla ma dag la zhu mi dgos/ /gang du skabs dang mthun pa yis/ /ra ba rtsig pa rta babs nas/ /'dom ni bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i bar/ /nang gi
8b1(mdo 'grel): mtshams su shes par bya/ /sdom pa lhag ma med gcod dang/ /dge 'dun lhag mas de ldang dang/ /de bzhin gang zag lhag ma can/ /ltung ba rnam pa gsum du grags/ /dang por phas pha ma gsungs pa ni/ /bzhi yin shin tu lci ba'i phyir/ /'di dag gang rung byung na ni/ /dge slong rnam
8b2(mdo 'grel): par nyams pa yin/ /ston ka'i chu bzhin dri med par/ /ston ka'i bstan pa bcu gnyis lor/ /ltung ba med par legs gnas te/ /nyon mongs spong bar byed pa yin/ /de nas bzang sbyin bu yi phyir/ /chur ma la ni 'khrig pa spyad/ /dge slong dgon pa pa yis kyang/ /spra mo la
8b3(mdo 'grel): zhugs kun mkhyen gyis/ /'di skad smad pa mdzad de khyed/ /'dod chags la sogs zhi bya'i phyir/ /nga yis chos rnams bstan pa la/ /'di ltar sdig pa'i las la chags/ /de nas phan yon bcu gzigs shing/ /slob ma rnams la phan bzhed pas/ /bslab pa'i gzhi ni bca' 
8b4(mdo 'grel): bdag/ thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyis mdzad/ /mchil ma gci dang bshang ba yi/ /lam du chags can zhugs na ni/ /gso byar mi rung bdug pa yi/ /phas pham sbrul gyis dge slong zin/ /kha shun so dang bgas pa las/ /nor bu 'das na phas pham ste/ /phyi rol char ni
8b5(mdo 'grel): ci rig par/ /sbom po 'am dge 'dun lhag ma'o/ /gang phyir stobs kyis mnan nas kyang/ /brtul zhugs can gyis grong chos kyi/ /bde bsten de yang phas pham gsungs/ /nyams pa dang ni rma yi sgor/ /rab zhugs sbom por shes par bya/ /mi shes byis pa chung du
8b6(mdo 'grel): gang/ /bsten mi bzod la spyad pa yang/ /cung zad zin dang shas cher zin/ /skrangs dang rul te nyams pa'o/ /gang zhig gnyi ga rnal du gnas/ /skyon med de ni ma nyams pa'o/ /thams cad du ni rma yi sgo/ gsum po nyams pa la yang ni/ /gang zhig de la zhugs pa na/ /sbom
8b7(mdo 'grel): po yin no mthar thug yin/ /nang du ma chud pa dang ni/ /las su mi rung bas kyang ni/ /'khrig pa spyod par byed pa la/ /sbom po nyid du grags pa yin/ /mo mtshan mtshams dang ma 'byar dang/ /'jigs pas bud med 'dor bzhin dang/ /yang na ngo tsha yis kyang 'dor/ /mi 
9a1(mdo 'grel): 'dor gyur kyang nyams pa dang/ /gang yang byis pa 'dod pa yi/ /longs spyod mi shes mi rung la/ /de ltar bsten na'ang thams cad du/ /sbom po'i kha na ma tho bcas/ /chung ngu 'bring sogs dbye ba yis/ /'dus byas thams cad tha dad
9a2(mdo 'grel): de/ /de yi ltung ba nges pa yi/ /dbye ba grub par the tshom med/ /bu ga gzhan dang lus kyi ni/ /bu ga bral nas de dag du/ /lus skyes 'jug par byed na'ang/ /sdom brtson la ni sbom por brjod/ /byis pa chung la zhugs pa yi/ /dge slong pham par yod
9a3(mdo 'grel): mi brtag /nu ma mchu dang sha mtshams bzhin/ /nyes spyod rgyas par mi 'gyur dman/ /mche ba rno mangs gdug pa yi/ /sprul gyi khar ni chud pa sla/ /lus bde bstan pa'i rma la ni/ /lus skyes 'jug pa ji ltar rung/ /sbrul gdug gis ni reg gyur kyang/ /
9a4(mdo 'grel): skye ba gcig nyid 'chi 'gyur gyi/ /khrims 'chal skye ba brgyud pa ni/ /stong phrag sdug bsngal mi bzad 'thob/ /lci dang shin tu lci ba nyid/ /yang dang shin tu yang ba ste/ /phas pham pas ni blang ba yi/ /sbom po rnam pa bzhi yin no/ /skrag par
9a5(mdo 'grel): mi byad lci bste/ /gzhan gyis de la 'bad pa yis/ /bzlog kyang mi nyan rab lcir shes/ /gzhan la khrel yod yang ba ste/ /rang nyid ngo tshas shin tu yang/ /bsam pa'i dbye bas 'gyur ba yin/ /de bzhin dge 'dun lhag ma yis/ /kun bslang
9a6(mdo 'grel): spo cha? po rnam pa bzhi/ /dge slong nyid dang de ma nyams/ /ma nyams pa yi lam dag tu/ /bcug reg ro ni myong ba dang/ /gang phyir sems ni rang bzhin gnas/ /rang gi khang pa brtsig pa'i phyir/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgra yi shing/ /dge slong nong can
9a7(mdo 'grel): gyis brkus te/ /de brten 'di dag kun bslang bcas/ /ma 'khrul gnas nas spo byed cing/ /gzhan nong brku? sems mthu yis sam/ 'jabs su? yis? kyang de la mthar/ /mi las ma sha lnga tshang brkus/ /ma sha ma ga d+ha pa ste/ /de las lhag pa mkhas pas
9b1(mdo 'grel): shes/ /dngos po bskyod pas sbom po ste/ /sbyor ba la ni nyes byas so/ /sa gzhi 'jam zhing mnyam pa la/ /bskyod kyang mthar ni mi 'gyur te/ /sa phyogs grum gsal sogs pa/ /mtho dman can la rab tu bskyed/ /zhe sdang gis ni rgyal sogs/ /chud gson byed pa sbom po yin//
9b2(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams ni dgrol don du/ /bsod nams 'dod pas bshags bya'o/ /gang gi yul ni de yi dus/ /gang gi tshod ni mgron pu ni/ /de yi bzhi cha brkus pa gang/ /dge slong la ni pham par 'gyur/ /sa gzhi rtsod bcas rnam pa gnyis/ /rig dang rgyal po'i rigs kyis te/ /
9b3(mdo 'grel): gnyi ga la yang dge slong ni/ /rgyal na ltung ba sbom por brjod/ /khyim pas gal te sbyor btang na/ /gnyis kar yang ni pas pham nyid/ /phas pham me yis bsregs pa yis/ /shing tshig lta bur sdom brtson 'gyur/ /nor bu mu tig la sogs nor/ /sngags kyis bkug
9b4(mdo 'grel): nas rku ba na/ /mthong ba tsam gyis de la 'dir/ /ltung ba'i mdza' ? ni 'gyur ba yin/ /bdag gi lo tog phun tshogs bya/ /gzhan la min zhes sred pa yis/ /rang sar chu ni 'dren byed cing/ /tshan gyis 'jig par byed kyang rung/ /rang gi lo tog phun tshogs shing/ /gzhan gyi lo
9b5(mdo 'grel): tog nyams pa na/ /lo tog rin ni shes byas nas/ /sbom po 'am phas pham ci rigs brtags/ /sdig pa kun las ldog phyir dang/ /sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /nam yang gzhan gyi 'tsho ba ni/ /dge slong gis ni dbrog mi bya/ /rkun pos slob ma phrogs pa
9b6(mdo 'grel): 'am/ /gser sogs stobs kyis mi bslangs te/ /gzhung lugs ji bzhin ma bsgrubs na/ /ma rungs ltung ba dag dang bcas/ /chos bshad pa 'am phyed rin nam/ /rin ni tshang ba yis kyang rung/ /blang bya rkun ma rgyal po la/ /phul na ltung ba sbom por 'gyur/ /slob ma nyid
9b7(mdo 'grel): phyir mthun btsal nas/ /dge tshul dge slong gis phrogs na/ /'khor dbye ba yi kun bslang phyir/ /sbom po'i blo can sbom pos reg/ dge slong gi ni sho gam sogs/ /dang ngam gzhan gyi lag gis phrogs/ /dngos por brtag par bya ba ste/ /ltung ba nges par bsten par 'gyur//
10a1(mdo 'grel): rgyal po la sogs dbang ba yi/ /chu 'gram gru btsas las byung ba/ /ma byin lam gang nas song na/ /rang ngam gzhan gyi lag gnyis kyis/ /de ni de yi phrogs 'dra ste/ /ltung ba rnam par dbyad pa na/ /ma sha lnga yi rin gyis ni/ /mthar 'gyur gzhan du ma min
10a2(mdo 'grel): no/ /sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags tshogs sam/ /pha phyir gang zhig bsams pa yi/ /bsngags pa de la brjod pas sam/ /byin nas brtul zhugs can gyis bgyed/ /mang po ri pa'i dngos po gcig/ rung ba'i chos gos khyer ba bzhin/ /des ni sba bar mi bya ste/ /nges bar
10a3(mdo 'grel): ltung ba med par 'dod/ /gzhan yang sho gams 'da' bar/ /kha char bcad pa la sogs sam/ /chu yis bsnyugs nas kyang ni rung/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyis gnang/ /gang gis chos gos la sogs pa/ /'dod pas dang du len pa ni/ /'gyod pas btang yang de la
10a4(mdo 'grel): na/ /ltung ba sbom por shes par bya/ /ri la 'dzeg gam gru brgal tsho/ /phan tshun so sor go byas nas/ /lhung bzed la sogs snod bskur te/ khag yod rtag tu dran pa yis/ /'di ni bzung ngam btang ngo zhes/ /smras thos gal te rlag gyur na/ /de rin nges par sbyin pa la/ /
10a5(mdo 'grel): 'dir ni rnam dbyad mi dgos so/ /ci ste ma bos zan zan/ /dge slong la ni nyes byas te/ /'di ni sde ldan lhag ma la'ang/ /nyes byas nyid du rab tu grags/ /rgyal pos byin dang rkun pos byin/ /las byed dag gis ma dris byin/ /gzhan dang 'brel bar 'du shes na/ /sbyin
10a6(mdo 'grel): po de las mi blang ngo/ /gzhan dang 'brel pa phal pa yin/ /ster bar rnam par shes na ne/ /'dod pa mi mthun mi blang ste/ /mi shes na ni nges pa med/ /sbyin bdag nges par rnam dpyad nas/ /de phyir gtso bo ma yin na/ /de las blang bar mi rigs te/ /de ni sbyin por mi
10a7(mdo 'grel): 'dod do/ /gal te dge 'dun sogs kyi nong/ /rang gi gnyen nam gzhan gyis kyang/ /ster na ner med nad pa yis/ /slar yang bsab par 'dod pas blangs/ /gal te shin nyes med ste/ /gson na gang yang rung ba ni/ /blangs nas kyang ni ci nus kyis/ /de yi dkor ni bsab
10b1(mdo 'grel): par bya/ /ba lang la sogs longs spyod mchog /grong la sogs par longs spyad pa/ /'di dag dge 'dun la ni gnang/ /gang zag la ni bkag pa yin/ /longs spyod zhing dang grong dang rta/ /ba lang ma he ra lug rnams/ /'dul bar longs spyod mchog nyid du/ /de nyid rig pas gsungs ba
10b2(mdo 'grel): yin/ /dngos po rnam pa lnga po ni/ /shes rab can gyis mi bcang? zhing/ /mi btsong mi bgo thams cad du/ /de bzhin khas kyang mi blang ngo/ /skyed mos tshal dang gtsug lag khang/ /de yi dngos dang mal stan rnams/ /tshul ldan rnams kyi sbyin bdag gi/ bsod nams spel phyir
10b3(mdo 'grel): bsrung bar bya/ /lha khang skyed tshal kun dga' ra/ /gtsug lag khang ni gcig tu 'dod/ /de dag dngos po gnas khang yin/ /mal stan dag ni grags par zad/ /gtsug lag khang steng gnas pa yi/ /bsgo ba gang du gsal bar thos/ /bka' bsgo ba ni byed pa yis/ /de la nges par
10b4(mdo 'grel): 'jug par bya/ /las kyi bya ba byed pa'i tshe/ /zas dang gos kyis rjes su bzung/ /nad pa la ni rjes su gnang/ /las ni mi nus ba la yang/ /brdeg dang 'tshog dang spyo ba dag/ 'phags pa'i chos dang 'gal ba yin/ /bsang dang bcing dang nyon mongs byed/ /'phags pas de phyir
10b5(mdo 'grel): rnam par spang/ /ci rigs mchog gis gsungs pa dang/ /rigs kyi chos ldan gyis bstan pa'o/ /yul chos ldan pa'i chad pa ni/ /dge 'dun gyis ni dang du blang/ /rgyal po la sogs yongs btang ba'i/ /rang skal bsod nams kyis rnyed na/ /yongs su longs spyod nyes med de/ /de dag
10b6(mdo 'grel): sngar bstan bzhin du gnas/ /'dren pas dngos po thams cad kyi/ /tha stod rang? ga ma gsungs te/ /dge slong ma'am dge tshul dag /nges pa'i zhal ta ba yis blta/ /ston pa'i chos las 'das nas ni/ /sred ldan gang zhig chad pas gcod/ /de ni bslab pa nyams pa ste/ /ma rig
10b7(mdo 'grel): sgrib g.yogs kyis bskyed pa'o/ /yang dag lta dang gzhan thob kyi/ /log lta can dang tshul khrims med/ /de la rab tu byin na ni/ /dad pas byin ba'i 'bras bu med/ /gang yang 'tsho ba'i tshang tsam zhig/ khengs las lhag dang brtul zhugs can/ /ston mo dag las len byed na/ /des ni
11a1(mdo 'grel): rnam par nyams par byas/ /ji tsam gang gi chog gyur pa/ /de tsam stan ma la ni blang/ /lhag ma kham gcig len byed kyang/ /bsam bzhin yin na nyams pa nyid/ /pha ma'am nad pa la sogs la/ /sbyin par byed pa bkag pa med/ /sbyin bdag dag gis ma
11a2(mdo 'grel): spags bar/ /nam yang gzhan la sbyin mi bya/ /gang du 'chag pa la sogs tshe/ /gri khab la sogs rnyed gyur na/ /gtsug lag khang skyong dag la gtad/ /lung bzhin de yi go bar bya/ /dge 'dun dbus su zhag gsum par/ /de yis de dag bstan par bya/ /su yang ngo len med
11a3(mdo 'grel): na ni/ /ci bde bar ni tshogs la dbul/ /dgos pa'i chen las rnams bya/ /bsod nams bsam pas las bya yi/ /rnyed pa'i don du dge slong gis/ /las ni nam yang mi bya'o/ /yid ches gyur la rang gi blos/ /ji srid du ni nges pa yis/ /'jog pa la ni nyes med de/ /dbang
11a4(mdo 'grel): po gzhan ni bzhag nas so/ /gang phyir dman dang 'bring dang mchog /grogs po gsum ni rnam spyad nas/ /yid ches brtan po nyid la bca' i/ /nges par sems mi brtan la min/ /shin tu mchog la mchog nyid de/ /'bring la 'bring po tha mal/ /tha ma nyid de dman la chung/ /yid
11a5(mdo 'grel): ches rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /nad pa la ni dris nas sman/ /phan pa'i ched du sbyin bya ste/ /rang gi yid ches kyis kyang rung/ /til snod dge slong ma bzhin min/ /mi dang gzhan nor rku sems kyis/ /sbyor ba gcig la tshang na ni/ /mdor na bslab pa nyams pa ste//
11a6(mdo 'grel): pas pham pa yi rgyu yin no/ /dge slong mi gtsang yid byung gang/ /ri dwags dbyug thogs zhes pas bsang/ /bsod nams thob dang lhung bzed sogs/ /'dod pa de rten bkag pa yin/ /yang dag bsam pa ma 'khrul bas/ /rang dam gzhan gyi pha rol bsad//
11a7(mdo 'grel): mi la 'chi ba'i bsngags pa dag /brjod grub des kyang mthar 'gyur ro/ /de 'chi'i thabs ni tshig gis sam/ /sbyor ba rnams kyis mngon bsngags shing/ /sems ni rjes su yi rang na/ /spom po'o me yi nags bsreg dang/ /mi yi yan lag gcod pa
11b1(mdo 'grel): da dang/ de yi sha ni za yang ngo/ /nad pa la ni nad g.yog dag /phan phyir byis pa legs par bsgo/ /mkhas pa 'am gnas brtan ngag la yang/ /sman ni yongs su dris nas su/ /nad pa dag la phan blos sbyin/ /gzhan du 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /gang gi nad
11b2(mdo 'grel): la ci 'dra ba'i/ /yo byad nad pa dag la bzhag /brtags pa za ba la sogs kyang/ /rjes su brtse bas nyes pa med/ /dge 'dun kun gyi nad pa ni/ /blta phyir brtson byar bka' stsal te/ /thams cad du ni rim pa bzhin/ /'dug nas kyang ni blta bya ste/ /nad pa'i nad
11b3(mdo 'grel): g.yeg dag gis kyang/ /'bad bas 'dug pa'i don du ni/ /gus pas rtag tu stan rtsams ni/ /nges par nye bar btab par bya/ /gal te nad pa nus med pas/ /skyo bar gyur pa de ltar na/ /de la 'dir ni ri mos kyis/ /yang dag bsgo bar brtag pa nyid/ /nad pa'i mdun du
11b4(mdo 'grel): gang zhig gis/ /thas sam tshor bar de yi sems/ /'chi ba'i 'dun pa skye 'gyur ba/ /de 'dra'i chos bshad mi bya'o/ /kye ma khyod kyi sbyin pa byin/ /tshul khrims kyang ni ma nyams bsrungs/ /dkon mchog gsum la gus byas te/ /mya ngan 'das pa bdun na gnas/ /khyod
11b5(mdo 'grel): ni lus dang bral ma thag /lha yi khang bzang thag ma ring/ /srog dang bral na myur du ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa lag na gnas/ /de skad gang smra'i dge slong ni/ /mi bzang ltung ba dag dang bcas/ /de bas khyod ni nang bral nas/ /yun ring chos spyod 'tsho bar shog /chos spyod ji srid
11b6(mdo 'grel): gson na ni/ /de srid bsod nams tshogs chen po/ /rdzogs par 'gyur zhes brjod par bya/ /nad kyis gdungs la sman dag dang/ /mkhas pas gdams ngag sbyin bya zhes/ /gnas dang gnas min mkhyan pas gsungs/ /skra can 'tshong na sbom po yin/ /lhung
11b7(mdo 'grel): bzed sogs chags gzhan dag la/ /gdal pa bzhan du brtse med par/ /gang zhig 'dod sems skyed byed pa/ /de la nyes byas nyid du rig /bzhad gang rgod bag ched du yang/ /ga ga chil ni mi bya ste/ /sngon gyi gzhon nu bcu bdun sdes/ /dge slong g.ya' bsgags shi bas
12a1(mdo 'grel): bcas/ /mchod rten la sogs las byed pas/ /khyim pa med tshe lci ba'i khur/ /mi khyer mi gzhug shing mkhan ni/ /shing bteg shi ba la rten bkag /so 'gags? bo la sogs ba/ /brdam sprad par sbyin mi bya/ /nyi ma zad bar dge slong gis/ /gla
12a2(mdo 'grel): mi bzhin du las mi bya/ /las kyi zhal ta blo ldan gyis/ /de dag la ni go byas nas/ /de rnams las dub spang ba'i phyir/ /khye su bza' btung gis tshim bya/ /gtsug lag khang ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /brtson par yang ni rjes su gnang/ /sems can dag la bltos med
12a3(mdo 'grel): par/ /ma bsams dbyug sogs mi 'bang ngo/ /khru bcu'i nang rol spyod yul du/ /rdo ba la sogs dor bar rung/ /bslab pa rjes dran bskyed pa yis/ /nang gi bdag nyid nyams mi 'gyur/ /gtsug lag khang gi las byed la/ /mtshan mo chos sgrogs gnas dag
12a4(mdo 'grel): tu/ /sgo sogs bsdams par byas sam zhes/ /gnas brtan gyis ni dri bar bya/ /gtsug lag khang 'joms bzlog pa'i phyir/ /gang la bcing ba brtag bya bar/ /bcing ba sngar ni brjod pa yis/ /gtsug lag khang ni bsrung bar bya/ /'khrul rten steng gzer
12a5(mdo 'grel): 'og 'jug dang/ /sgo lcags lde mig gyog po yang/ /gtsug lag khang gnas de dag la/ /zhal rta pa yis ci rigs sbyin/ /gcig dang gnyis dang gsum sogs kyis/ /tha dad bcing ba gzhug byas te/ /thams cad gzhug bar 'os na yang/ /rtog pa po
12a6(mdo 'grel): yis thams cad gzhug /ston pa'i bstan la gus pa yis/ /dge slong lus dub thang chad dag /lam du dge slong rnams kyis ni/ /pha bzhin bsgrub par mi bya'o/ /sngon byung pha rgan dal 'gro la/ /dus yol gyur pa'i 'jigs pa yis/ /bu yis phul bas
12a7(mdo 'grel): lam du de/ /dub nas 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /mu ge'i dus shig dge slong rnams/ /mi srid bla ma'i yon tan rnams/ /phan tshun bsgrags te go byas rgyus/ /'tsho ba byas tshe bkag pa mdzad/ /khyad par gyur ba'i rtogs pa rnams/ /ma thob par ni thob po zhes
12b1(mdo 'grel): mngon? pa'i nga rgyal med smra na/ /sdom brtson mdza' yi ltung ba 'thob/ /mi chos bla ma'i yon tan 'dir/ /bsam gtan rnams dang gzugs med sogs/ /zag zad phul phyin mya ngan 'das/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi thob smra'o/ /mkhas bas byang bar rtogs pa'i don/ /gangs sungs
12b2(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu bzhi po dang/ /sdug bsngal la sogs yul shes pa/ /bden pa bzhi po mthong zhes dang/ /bsam gtan zhes brjod bzhi po yi/ /de la reg pas gnas pa dang/ /sdug bsngal la sogs bdag gis shes/ /lha la sogs pa bdag
12b3(mdo 'grel): gis mthong/ /lha glu gnod sbyin dri za sogs/ /mthong ngo bdag gis gtam yang byas/ /de dag kyang ni bdag la smra/ /zhes smra dge slong mthar 'gyur ro/ /lha yi skad ni bdag gis thos/ /de ni mtshan mo bdag drung 'od/ /de bzhin
12b4(mdo 'grel): gnod sbyin sogs kyang ste/ /rang bzhin gyis ni pham par 'dod/ /de dag kun la shes bya ba/ /sbom po sha za mthong sogs te/ /'di na gang zhig lha sogs dag/ mthong ba yod ces smra na yang/ /rnam rnag mi rtag 'du shes sogs/ /
12b5(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu mngon shes rab ston na/ /mi 'dod na yang mdza' yi ni/ /mtshon chas mgo bcang thob par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'di na dge slong gang/ /dur khrod sha za mthong ba yod/ /bdag ces smra bar mi byed kyang/ /de skad brjod na nyes byas so/ /ltung
12b6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur 'chab dang rag pa dang lus bkan? bag med phyogs byed nyid/ /de bzhin dge slong phas pham bzhis/ /dge slong ma yi rtsa ba 'jig/ rgyal dang pham dang de bzhin du/ /char 'bab mtshan ni 'gyur ba sogs/ /dgongs su gsol zhes brjod bya
12b7(mdo 'grel): ste/ /gzhan du 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /dge slong ser skyas 'od srungs kyis/ /bstan la ngag rtsub rdzun smras pas/ /chu srin bco brgyad gdong skyes bcas/ /nyon mongs dgra pham khas blangs nas/ /nyen mongs dgra yi pham byas na/ /de 
13a1(mdo 'grel): phyir pas pham gyur pa ste/ /khrims bral zhes ni nges par brjod/ /phas pham pa yi chos dag tu/ /gang gsungs ma lus brjod nas ni/ /rim pa ji bzhin dge 'dun gyi/ /lhag ma rnams ni brjod par bya/ /rma sgo gsum ni ma gtogs
13a2(mdo 'grel): par/ /shes lus rang bzhin yan lag gis/ /bsams bzhin khu ba 'byin pa ni/ /dge 'dun gyis ni lhag mas reg/ sla dang ka ba nyid dang dmar/ /ser po dang ni sngon po ste/ /khu ba rnam pa sngar bstan pa/ /phyi ma 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyi/ /de yi bu ni
13a3(mdo 'grel): sngon po ste/ /de yi 'og tu ser po yin/ /dmar po de yi blon po ste/ /ska ba dbang po smin pa nyid/ /bud med kyis dub dbang po dag/ ma smin pa ni bla bar shes/ /thams cad du yang dge 'dun gyis/ /dag bya lhag ma'i ltung ba nyid/ /shes bzhin rtsig khung
13a4(mdo 'grel): bum pa yi/ /sbubs sogs khu ba 'byin pa ni/ /sbom po yis ni bcom pa ste/ /pha bong sbom pos snang ba bzhin/ /brtsams te khu ba ma phyin nam/ /chags pas dbang po 'jal byed dam/ /gar bsgyur mkha' la bskyod pas sam/ /mnye bshud kyis ni
13a5(mdo 'grel): tshung na yang/ /rdzi ldog chu rgyun bzlog phyogs su/ /gtong pa la yang de bzhin 'dod/ /rdzi phyogs rgyun phyogs mthun gtong pas/ /nyes byas 'gyur bar gsungs ba yin/ /chu bsti pa ni mthong sogs la/ /chags pa'i sems dang ldan yang ngo/ /
13a6(mdo 'grel): chogs pas don nyams rtsa ba ste/ /de bas rtag tu spang bar bya/ /jo ta'i shing sogs reg pas sam/ /brla sogs dag la bshung pa la/ /der ni khu ba byung yang ste/ /rmi lam na ni nyes med cha'o/ /dge slong tshogs la chos lhag par/ /rgyas par yang
13a7(mdo 'grel): dag bshad ba rnams /dge chul la ni thams cad du/ /nyes byas nges par shes par bya/ /mdza' las byung ba'i nyon mongs ngan/ /kun bslang nges par bshags bya ste/ /sbom po lci ba tshogs pa la/ /yang ba'i ming can bzhir brjod do/ /dge 'dun
13b1(mdo 'grel): lhag ma las byung ba'i/ /lci ba lnga la yang ba bzhis/ /dge 'dun lhag ma tshogs la ste/ /lhag ma gang zag gcig la'ang rung/ /sngar ni ltung ba byung ba yis/ /ltung ba mthun snang la mi 'dod/ /dri mas dri ma rnam dag pa/ /gang du yang ni rung ma yin/ /gang la
13b2(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun lhag mas gos/ /ji srid nges par 'chab byed pa/ /ji srid de ni dag bya'i phyir/ /spo ba dag la nges par bzhag/ dge 'dun lhag ma gang byung ba/ /ji srid de ni rjes bzung min/ /de srid de la spo ba yis/ /cho ga yongs su dag phyir bya/ /mtshan mo
13b3(mdo 'grel): dang ni sems sbyor las/ /'chab pa yang ni rnam pa gnyis/ /shin tu mi rung 'dir? sems pa'i/ /sems kyi ming du shes par bya/ /'dir ni spo ba la gnas te/ /gal te nyon mongs kyis pham pas/ /rmongs pas slar yang ltung spyod na/ /slar yang dngos
13b4(mdo 'grel): gzhi'i spo ba ni/ /gzhan dag kyang ni sbyin bya ste/ /'dul ba legs shes gang dag gis/ /lan gsum bar du de la sbyin/ /snying rje'i zhing ni de 'dra la/ /nyon mongs dbang gis 'jug shes pas/ /ngo tsha'i khur ni chen po yis/ /brgya lam zhig na 'dud par
13b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /de lta na yang mi dge las/ /gal te mi ldog pa nyid na/ /de ni mdo bzhin dor bya ste/ /ji srid skyo bar gyur gyi bar/ /yid ni yang dag skyo gyur cing/ /phyir bcos don du gnyer ba na/ /tshogs kyis dbyung bar 'dod pa yis/ /mgu ba spyod pa de la sbyin/ /
13b6(mdo 'grel): mgu ba'i chu yis rnams bkrus nas/ /dri ma lhag ma dag bya'i phyir/ /gang du dge slong nyi shu yis/ /de ni nges par dbyung bar bya/ /de la dge 'dun gtso bo ste/ /bsam pa mkhyen pa'i dge 'dun yin/ /dge 'dun gyis ni rjes gnang na/ /las kyi bya ba byed par
13b7(mdo 'grel): rung/ /dge 'dun nang du de yi las/ /bya phyir de yi rigs pa yis/ /tshogs las ldang ngo de yi phyir/ /dge 'dun lhag ma zhes byar brjod/ /gal te byin rlabs mgu bas kyang/ /gnas pa'i tshe na shi gyur na/ /dbyung ba ma byas na yang ni/ /nges bar mtho ris dag
14a1(mdo 'grel): tu skye/ /rang gis las kyi co dris pas/ /ngan 'gro ngag du mi skye mod/ /'on kyang snying rje'i bdag can gyis/ /btang snyoms mi bya rjes su bzung/ /gang zhig ming ni grags chen dang/ /mdo sde la sogs mang du thos/ /de dag gcig gi mdun du yang/ /
14a2(mdo 'grel): bshags pas dag par nges par rung/ /bsam pa yang ni che ba dang/ /de bzhin ngo chos bcas pa yang/ /de yi spong bar yongs brtags byed/ /de yi sgo nas chog bzhin/ /de ni mthol pa lan gsum yin/ /nang kyi chang pa nyid dang ni/ /gos kyis dkris
14a3(mdo 'grel): dang nyams pa'i sgor/ /byed na ltung ba che spangs nas/ /sbom po'i ltung bas 'joms par 'gyur/ /rkang pa nas ni spyi bo'i bar/ /chags bcas bud med yan lag la/ /gos kyis mchod reg na ltung/ /mchod pa la reg sbom po nyid/ /shing rta gru sogs
14a4(mdo 'grel): la 'jug dang/ /'phul ba dang ni 'then pa dang/ /bar bcas bar med pa la ni/ /reg pa dag byed sngar bzhin des/ /bud med kyis tshur dge slong la/ /reg cing chags sems bdag byed na/ /'dir yang sngar bzhin thams cad du/ /'dren pa la sogs byed kyang ngo/ /
14a5(mdo 'grel): 'khrig ba'i bsam pas 'di dag la/ /gnyen po stobs chung byed na ni/ /de la phas pham gyis bslang ba'i/ /sbom po yi ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /'di dag bud med bsten bzod de/ /gzhan du sbom po'i ming can yin/ /skyes pa'am ma ning la sogs sam/ /dud 'gro mo
14a6(mdo 'grel): la nyes byas yin/ /dge slong gang zhig bud med la/ /rtse phyir yang ni smad tshig smra/ /dge slong gzugs bsnyan nyid yin te/ /de yang dge 'dun lhag ma yin/ /'ga' zhig rma yi sgo gsum po/ /legs par dod la shin tu 'jam/ /yang na de dag legs par
14a7(mdo 'grel): ni/ /ma dod dga' ba mi skyed gnas/ /'di dang 'di ni khyod la sbyin/ /gang khyod khyo ni nor? ldan te/ /gang 'dir khyod dang lhan cig tu/ /bde myong de ni rnyed pa tshe/ /de la sogs pa'i 'khrigs tshig dag/ gang brjod dge 'dun lhag ma'o/ /'khrig dngos sbra?
14b1(mdo 'grel): na mi brjod na/ /sbom? po yi ni ltung bar gsungs/ /bud med ngo tsha las 'das tshig /tshur smra'ang de la ci rigs nyid/ /gang zhig 'khrig pa'i tshig gyur pa/ /de ni smra bar mi bya'o/ /smyos pa dang ni sems 'khrugs dang/ /smra mi shes dang las dang po/ /tshor bas gzir la
14b2(mdo 'grel): brjod ngan gyi/ /ltung ba dag ni mi 'byung ngo// //bam po gnyis pa/ /rang nyid bsngags pa'i bye brag dag /'khrig pa don gnyer bud med kyi/ /mdun du rang nyid kyis bsngags na/ /lhag ma'o dge 'dun gyis zad byed/ /longs spyod 'di yis
14b3(mdo 'grel): nyer gnas na/ /mchog dang phul sogs nges bstan pa/ /sring mo bsnyen bkur mchog tshig smra/ /gsol ba la sogs las kyis ni/ /tshul khrims ldan par gang bshad pa/ /tshul khrims phung por yang dag ldan/ /dge ba'i chos can nyid kyis na/ /ting 'dzin
14b4(mdo 'grel): phung por yang dag ldan/ /tshangs par spyod pa nges brjod pas/ /shes rab phung por yang dag ldan no/ /'khrig pa'i tshig ces bya ba 'dir/ /gnyis kyis gnyis sbrang sbyor ba yin/ /'di dag nang nas tshig gcig kyang/ /sdom brtson chags pa'i sems kyis
14b5(mdo 'grel): ni/ /brda sbrang bud med la smra na/ /ltung ba yin la dpyad mi dgos/ /'khrig pa gsal bar byed pa'i tshig/ gal te bung med kyang ni spu?/ /gang 'dir tshangs par spyod rnams la/ /'khrig pa longs spyod mchog ces dang/ /khyed lta'i tshul khrims ldan pa ni/ /
14b6(mdo 'grel): rtag tu dge ba'i chos can ngo/ /yon gnas khyad par 'phags pa dag/ rtsod? pa'i dus na snyed par dka' / /de la sogs brjod dge slong gang/ /dga' bas dang du len byed cing/ /lan gyi tshig kyang smra byed na/ /dge 'dun lhag mar gsungs pa yin/ /da lta bu
14b7(mdo 'grel): dang 'khrig sbyad na/ /bud med rnams kyang 'bras bu che/ /'khrig ming dngos ni mi brjod kyang/ /gang de sbom po'i ming can no/ /de bzhin 'khrig pa'i chos kyis ni/ /dge slong zhes sogs snga ma bzhin/ /de lta bu zhes mi brjod na/ /'di yang sbom po nyid du gsungs//
15a1(mdo 'grel): bud med kyis kyang de bzhin du/ /'khrig pa'i tshig dngos dor nas kyang/ /khyed lta bu zhes mi brjod na/ /de bzhin gnyis ka sbom po yin/ /bsten mi shes la 'khrig tshig dngos/ /brjod na bom? po las ni dmon/ /de lta bu zhes bya ba'i sgra/ /med pa
15a2(mdo 'grel): yang nyes byas 'dod/ /thams cad du yang sdom brtson ni/ /chags can la ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /'dir ni chags can zhes gsungs gang/ /sems ni chags pa dang 'brel nyid/ /gang bsten bzod la ltung ba ste/ /bsten mi bzod la sbom po yin/ /skyes
15a3(mdo 'grel): ba ma ning la sogs dang/ /dud 'gro mo? la nyes byas nyid/ /rang ngam gzhan byed 'jug kyang rung/ /bud med skyes pa phrad na ni/ /dge 'dun lhag ma'i ral gri yis/ /rang gi mgo ni gcong par byed/ /chu tshigs byin sogs mdor bsdu na/ /chung ma rnams pa
15a4(mdo 'grel): bdun du brjod/ /mdza' na mo bcu de dag gi/ mtshan nyid yang dag bshad par bya/ /chu yi rab tu byin pa yi/ /don la de ming rab tu btags/ /bud med gang zhig nor gyis nyos/ /rin chas nyos zhes de la rigs/ /rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ni mgos/ /
15a5(mdo 'grel): phrogs pa btsan phrogs zhes su brjod/ /ngas khyod nye gnas bya'o zhes /zer ba dang dam 'dus pa yin/ /zas dang gos kyi rgyu mtshan gyis/ /zhugs pa gos zas kyis 'tsho yin/ /gang khyod nor dang nga yin nor?/ /de yi mnyam srog 'tsho bya zhes/ /de skad
15a6(mdo 'grel): brjod nas zhugs pa gang/ /kha dum pa zhes bya ba'o/ /skad cig tsam zhig rtag tu min/ /de la thang 'gal phrang ces bya/ /rnam pa bdun po 'di dag ni/ /slar yang so so'i dbye bar 'dod/ /'thab pa'i mor dang 'thab pa'i 'og/ dum pa bcang pa rnam
15a7(mdo 'grel): pa gsum/ /rde'u gsum ni gtong pa dang/ /chang ma ma yin par ni bsgrags/ /cho ga rab tu btang ba dang/ /de bzhin bril bu bsgrags pa'o/ /dang ? po rnam pa gsum po la/ /bye ba nye bar sdums byed na/ /gcig gnyis gsum la rim pa bzhin/ /
15b1(mdo 'grel): zhes byas sogs par 'gyur ba yin/ /bzhi ba dang ni lnga pa gnyis/ /drug ste gsum la sbom pa yin/ /bdun pa bsdums byas brtul zhugs can/ /dge 'dun gyi ni ltag ma thob/ /'di ru mdza' mor 'dod pa ni/ /khyo ni shi 'am gzhan song tshe/ /ma yi 'bad pas gsungs
15b2(mdo 'grel): ba ni/ /ma yi bsrungs zhes brjod pa yin/ /de bzhin pha dang gyos sgyug dang/ /pha dang ma yi rang rigs skyes/ /des bsrungs? de ni slar yang ni/ /nye dus bsrungs zhes brjod pa yin/ /pha dang khyo ni med pa na/ /ming pos yongs su bsrungs pa 'am/ /phu mo nu mo yis
15b3(mdo 'grel): kyang bsrungs/ /spun zlas? bsrungs zhes brjod pa yin/ /bram ze mo 'am rje rigs mos/ /bsrungs pa rigs kyis bsrung ba yin/ /bdas la 'am ko sa la'i/ /rgyud kyis bsrungs pa rul chags bsrungs/ /chos sbyong brtul zhugs can dag gis/ /'khrul med
15b4(mdo 'grel): mar ni shes bya ste/ /rnam pa bcu bo 'di dag ni/ /mdza' na mo zhes shes par bya/ /gang 'dir mdza' na mor gsungs dang/ /bzhi pa la sogs chung ma rnams/ /thams cad du ni sdums byed pa/ /dge 'dun lhag mar nges par bstan/ /khyi'u 'am 'di bu mo 'di/ /ci
15b5(mdo 'grel): yi phyir na khyim mi byed/ /de skad la sogs smra ba yi/ /dge slong gis ni nyes byas 'thob/ /rang gi don du khang pa ni/ /gsol ba la sogs las kyis ni/ /tshang sogs yon tan ldan par bya/ /gzhan du dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur/ /gang du nyam de med spyod
15b6(mdo 'grel): pa/ /spyod lam rnam bzhi rung ba ni/ /'dug dang 'chag dang nyal bar grags/ /bzhi pa langs pa nyid yin no/ /chur ni bde bar gshegs pa yi/ /mtho ni bcu dang gnyis yin no/ /zheng du de nyid bdun yin te/ /de dag de yi tshang du gsungs/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i
15b7(mdo 'grel): mtho yi chang/ /gang gsungs mkhas bas shes par bya/ /'bring tshang mi yi khru dag ni/ /phyed dang gnyis ni yod pa yin/ /'bring tshad skyes bu yin no khru/ /bco brgyad chur ni yod pa yin/ /zheng du phyed dang bcu gcig ni/ /khang pa'i tshang du gsungs pa yin/ /sprul dang
16a1(mdo 'grel): sdig pa traM? bu ka/ tri la ta sogs kyis mi rung/ /rtsod bcas lam dang shing drung dang/ /lha rten rgyal po'i pho brang mdza' / /chu dang g.yang sa khron pa'i drung/ /brtsam du rung ba ma yin no/ /skyon ni 'di dag med pa ru/ /rigs pa yis ni khang par
16a2(mdo 'grel): bya/ /bka' yis ma gnang ba dag dang/ /gzhi mi rung dang brtsam mi rung/ /ma bstan rtsod pa dang bcas su/ /byed na dge slong sbom ltung thob/ /skyon kun gyis ni rab smad par/ /dge 'dun lhag mar gyur pa ste/ /skyon rnams kun dang bral ba yi/ /sa gzhir
16a3(mdo 'grel): rjes su bsngags pa nyid/ /las dang po dang de bzhin smyas/ /'khrugs dang nad kyis gdungs pa yis/ /byed kyang 'di las byung ba yi/ /ltung ba yod pa ma yin no/ /gtsug lag khang ni bdag bcas la'ang/ /tshad dang cho ga 'di nyid de/ /chen po nyid kyi tshad du ni/ /
16a4(mdo 'grel): nor gyis 'dir ni shes par bya/ /gzhi med pa 'am bag tsam gyis/ /sdom brtson nyams par 'dod phyir ni/ /phas pham pa yi smad na ni/ /gnyis ka dge 'dun lhag mar shes/ /gang zhig cung zad bden par smra/ /'di ni bag tsam yang dag grags/ /rgyu mtshan
16a5(mdo 'grel): med pa gzhi med yin/ /bag tsam nyid rab bstan pa ni/ /rab dang blo ldan dge slong ma/ /utpal na dog can zhes bya byung/ /rdzing bu rab zhi zhes pa'i 'gram/ /gyang nor can yod nye bar 'ongs/ /de dang ha cang mi ring bar/ /sa las skyes dang mdza' bo gnas/ /der ni
16a6(mdo 'grel): chu 'thungs 'ongs pa yi/ /ri dwags ri dwags mos spyod mthong/ /de mthong sa las skyes kyis ni/ /mdza' bos mdza' shes la dris pa/ /mi tshangs spyod dang dge slong dang/ /dge slong ma yang mthong dam ci/ /de yi mthong ngo zhes smras te/ /bag tsam 'di tsam
16a7(mdo 'grel): pas byung ba/ /gyang nor bdag gis brlag bya zhes/ /de yis khros nas spras? par zad/ /de la sogs pas kun bslang ba'i/ /bag tsam gyi ni bye brag dag/ yid bcugs dman pa dag gis ni/ /dran par bya phyir gsungs pa yin/ /bzhams te bsgo sogs
16b1(mdo 'grel): chog yis/ /lan gsum bar du bzlog na yang/ /mi nyan dge 'dun mthun 'byed na/ /dge 'dun gyi ni lhag ma thob/ /gsol ba ma gtogs bzlog pa'i tshig/ bzhams te bsgo ba zhes bya ste/ /tshe ldan khyod 'dir mchog gcig
16b2(mdo 'grel): la/ /'di ma byed ces rgyas par ni/ /bzhams te bsgo bas mi gtong na/ /las kyis de la bka' bsgro bya/ /de nas gsol dang bzhi las te/ /byis gang de yi grogs byed pa/ /mchog gcig bsam pa gcig pa las/ /
16b3(mdo 'grel): dbye ba rnam pa gnyis su gnas/ /tha dad dbye ba yang ni 'dir/ /rnam pa bcu bzhi dag tu bzhed/ /chos la chos ma yin brjod dang/ /chos min la'ang chos su brjod/ /'dul ba dang ni 'dul min nyid/ /bzhi po de la sogs pa brjod/ /
16b4(mdo 'grel): li? la dbang byed mkhas pa yis/ /'gyed pa dang ni mi 'dams dang/ /ltung ba dang ni bya ba ste/ /rnam pa bzhir ni shes par bya/ /sna tshogs rtsong dang tshogs pa med/ /dge 'dun bsam pa tha dad pa'i/ /rkyen la sogs pas 'byung ba ste/ /
16b5(mdo 'grel): rtsod pa yi ni dbang byas brjod/ /kun nas nyon mongs pas ltung ba/ /phan tshun dun i mi gdams pa/ /de na rtsod pa las byung ba/ /mi gdams pa zhes bya bar grags/ /lus dang ngag yid kyis bya ba/ /de ltar tha dad gcig dang ni/ /rnam
16b6(mdo 'grel): pa gnyis dang rnam pa gsum/ /ltung ba phyogs tsam brjod pa yin/ /khyim gcig dge slong bud med dang/ /gal te mi shes lhan cig nyal/ /nub gsum bsnyen par ma rdzogs dang/ /gnas gcig 'di ni lus kyi'o/ /bud med
16b7(mdo 'grel): dag la skad pa ni/ /lnga 'am drug gi chos ston na/ /ma bsams par ni lhag pa'i tshig/ smras pa la ni ngag gir brjod/ /gso sbyong dus tshe drin yang/ /skyon yod smra bar mi byed na/ /de la yid kyi ? pa ni/ /nyes byas nyid du mkhas 
17a1(mdo 'grel): pas rtogs/ /lus dang yid gnyis 'brel ba ni/ /yang dag bsams nas srog gcod dang/ /ma byin len dang chang 'thung sogs/ /brten pa nyid la'ang 'dod pa yin/ /yang dag bsams nas lnga dang ni/ /drug tsam smras pa lhag par
17a2(mdo 'grel): brjod/ /ngag dang yid las gyur pa de/ /rdzun smra sogs la'ang 'dod pa yin/ /brdeg ces kun nas bsams nas ni/ /brjod de lus can la brdeg na/ /'di ni lus dang ngag yid kyi/ /bya ba rnam ba gsum pa can /dge slong la ni mi dge bas
17a3(mdo 'grel): ltung bar 'gyur gyi sems dge na/ /mchod rten sku la skyes pa yi/ /rtsa sngon gcod par byed bzhin du/ /ji ltar dge ba'i sems kyis ni/ /ston pa la ni mchod 'dod pas/ /me tog phreng ba spel ba'i phyir/ /'thog pa de la de tsam min/ /ma
17a4(mdo 'grel): bsams thub pa'i bslab pa 'am/ /dge 'dun nang khrims dral gyur na/ /lung ma bstan par gsungs pa ste/ /ltung med dge ba nam yang min/ /yang dag bsams nas 'das na ni/ /mi dge ba nyid kho nar 'gyur/ /'di ni rjes su ma gnang yang/ /skabs
17a5(mdo 'grel): 'ongs zhar? la brjod pa yin/ /de ltar rnam pa du ma yi/ /ltung bas so so'i sgo nas 'ding/ /rtsod pa'i dbang du byas pa yi/ /ltung ba 'di ni mkhas pas gsungs/ /gsol ba la sogs las 'di dag/ rung ba min zhes smra ba rnams /rtsod pa dang ni 'thab mo
17a6(mdo 'grel): yang/ /bya ba'i yang ni rgyu ru 'dod/ /dge 'dun 'byed par gang brtson pa'i/ /blo chung gis ni nyes byas thob/ /bzhams te bsgos kyang mi gtong na/ /nyes byas nyid du rnam par bzhag/ dang po nyid du gsol ba'i las/ /brjod tshe mi gtong sbom po nyid/ /
17a7(mdo 'grel): brjod pa gnyis la'ang de yin te/ /mthar ni dge 'dun lhag ma nyid/ /snga ma'i brjod pa gnyis las ni/ /sbom po'i de rjes de la ni/ /gsum pa dge 'dun lhag pa ste/ /de ltar 'di ni legs par brtag/ gang yang de rjes 'brang ba yi/ /dge slong sdig ho can
17b1(mdo 'grel): rnams kyang/ /bzhams te bsgo sogs cho ga la/ /sngar bzhin 'di dag kun la'ang 'gyur/ /khyim sun 'byin ba yis ni gzhan/ /sun 'byin ngo ni rnam gnyis gsungs/ /gcig ni 'gogs pas yin te gzhan/ /gnyis pa yang ni longs spyod kyis/ /'grogs ba bud
17b2(mdo 'grel): med lhan cig tu/ /rtse 'jo 'phya g.yeng la sogs brten/ /longs spyod me tog 'bras bu dang/ /bza' btung la sogs lhan cig byed/ /mig rna yang sogs shes pa yi/ /mthong ba la sogs rnam gsum 'dod/ /bzhams bsgo la sogs rim byas kyang/ /mi gtong
17b3(mdo 'grel): sngar bzhin nyes sogs lta/ /bka' blo mi bde bas kyang ni/ /dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung bar bstan/ /bka' blo mi bde phan rnams la/ /brjod rung ma yin tshig smra ba'o/ /phas pham la sogs gang zhig bskab?/ /de ni bslab pa'i gzhi zhes bya/ /nyer bstan 'dul
17b4(mdo 'grel): bar gzu? gsungs pa/ /'di la chos ldan dge slong rnams/ /gang zhig ston pa'i bka' la gtogs/ /chos mthun rnams kyi nges par bsgo/ /bzhams te bsgo bal sogs la/ /mi gtong sngar bzhin nyes byas so/ /bcu gsum 'di dag dge 'dun las/ /
17b5(mdo 'grel): ldang phyir dge 'dun lhag ma'o/ /phyi ma bzhi ni gsum gyis te/ /snga ma dgu ni cig car du/ /mtshon pa tsam du sbyar ba yis/ /dge 'dun lhag mar nges bar bstan/ /ma nges pa yi chos gnyis ni/ /'dul ba las gsungs rab tu brjod/ /dge slong 'char
17b6(mdo 'grel): kas spod ma dang/ /lhan cig nyer gnas reg pa las/ /mgon pos dge 'dun tshogs dbus su/ /ma nges dang po'i chos bcas mdzad/ /dben gnas dge slong gcig bu zhig/ bud med gcig dang 'dug byed na/ /'dod bsten rung ngam mi rung yang/ /
17b7(mdo 'grel): ma nges gnyis pa'i chos su brjod/ /gang du gzhan med 'di dben te/ /skyabs yod kyi yang rnam pa ni/ /rtsig ba rib? ma mun pa dang/ /yol ba 'thibs po zhes bya lnga/ /gnas su 'gro dang 'dug pa 'am/ /nyal ba la sogs gang byas kyang/ /dad pa can gyis
18a1(mdo 'grel): tshig gis ni/ /dge slong de ni ldang bar 'os/ /yang na de dag 'gro la sogs/ /cung zad tsam yang ma gtogs na/ /de yi ngo bo shes bya'i phyir/ /gsol ba'i cho ga sngon 'gros byin/ /rab tu byung dang bsnyen rdzogs dag/ de yis gzhan la na ma yang ni/ /
18a2(mdo 'grel): gnas bca' ba'ang mi sbyin te/ /gzhan dang lhan cig 'chag pa 'ang min/ /'dug stan la sogs gcig mi bya/ /de la chang 'di ma shi'i bar/ /btung ba yongs su ma chong phyir/ /'di dag ma nges chas zhes brjod/ /de ltar ma des chos gsungs nas/ /de las ji
18a3(mdo 'grel): ltar ldang ba dang/ /gang zag lhag ma mang po yi/ /mdun du rab gnas mchog gis so/ /zhag bcu 'das par dge slong gis/ /chos gos ma brtags 'chang na ni/ /spang ba'i ltung byed sa rdul gyis/ /mgo bo g.yog par byed pa yin/ /chos gos drubs
18a4(mdo 'grel): dang tshon bsgyur pa/ /chos gos zin par gyur pa na/ /chos gos 'dzin par khas len pa/ /'dir ni blo yis khas blang ngo/ /mu bzhi can la 'dir brtag pa/ /sra brkyang dbyung ba byas nas ni/ /chos gos ma zin par ni min/ /de la sogs pas rnam
18a5(mdo 'grel): par bzhag /bal gos sha na nyi 'og dang/ /ras gos dang ni zan ma dang/ /? tam pa dang du gu la/ /chos gos rgyu ni rnam pa bdun/ /spang bar 'os ba mi spong dang/ /ltung ba bshags par mi byed dang/ /gal te phran tshogs de 'dra yang/ /nub
18a6(mdo 'grel): gcig bral bar mi byed pa/ /rigs tshigs gsum po 'di las ni/ /gcig ma tshang bar ma yin te/ /'di dag ma lus byas na ni/ /ltung ba med par gsungs pa yin/ /gang yang lhung bzed dra ba sogs/ /nye bar bsams nas der yang ni//
18a7(mdo 'grel): ngo tsha gzhan skyel bshags mi byed/ /spang ba'i ltung ba nyid du 'gyur/ /gang 'dir zad byed ltung ba ni/ /nges par spangs nas bshags bya ste/ /gang phyir gang gis ngan song du/ /ltung phyir ltung ba'i ming du btags/ /chos gos gsum gyi bstan?
18b1(mdo 'grel): bya ste/ /phyi rol 'di dag med par min/ /gzhan du dge slong nyes byas 'gyur/ /dge 'dun gyis gnang ma gtogs so/ /gnas gcig gnyis dang mang po yis/ /grong ni 'obs kyis bskor ba dang/ /rtsig pa rib ma'i khongs su chung/ /nyer spyod gcig dang tha
18b2(mdo 'grel): dad pa'o/ /nyer spyod spongs skyed mos tshal/ /lha'i gnas la sogs pa'o/ /'di la thun mongs gcig nyid de/ /tha dad sna tshogs nyer spyod nyid/ /rgyun srang gcig ni gtong pa dag /gnas gcig pa zhes brjod bya ste/ /gdol pha ri khrong pa la sogs/ /rigs
18b3(mdo 'grel): gcig ba yi gnas bzhin no/ /rigs gnyis gang tu bram ze dang/ /gdol la gnas pa gnas gnyis brjod/ /sna tshogs rgyun srang gtong pa la/ /mang po bar ni rab tu grags/ /nyer spyod nang gi ma lus dang/ /de yi phyi rol 'dom gang yin/ /khyim bya
18b4(mdo 'grel): 'phur chags tsam dag gam/ /gang du 'thag tshed la sogs tshangs/ /rigs dang tshong khang tshong 'dus dang/ /khang thog g.yu las mu stegs gnas/ /gru dang shing ljon shing rta dang/ /kun dga' ra gcig sna tshogs spyod/ /sbun rnams ma phye ba dang ni/
18b5(mdo 'grel): skyes bu gcig ge yang ni rung/ /ji ltar rigs par gsungs nyid kyis/ /de yi nyer spyod gcig pa yin/ /de yi nyer spyod snga ma ltar/ /nyer spyod sna tshogs pa yang ni/ /gang du 'di dag gi ni sgo/ /tha dad pa'am thun mongs brjod/ /mang po yang ni
18b6(mdo 'grel): rigs bzhin du/ /tshong khang la sogs 'dod pa yin/ /nyer spyod tshul ni ma lus pa/ /gcig dang sna tshogs dag tu dbye/ /nyer spyod gcig dang sna tshogs su/ /mu stegs lta bas phye ba ste/ /gang du phyi rol sbyod pa yis/ /gnas pa g.yang gzhi
18b7(mdo 'grel): can la sogs/ /'khor los spyod pa la sogs khyim/ /thun mong sngar gyi khyim kun te/ /gang du phyi rol rnga bla ma dang/ /gling bu la sogs 'grims pa'o/ /phan tshun yal ga ma bral na/ /shing sdong kun spyod gcig yin te/ /phyi rol nye 'khor phyed
19a1(mdo 'grel): grib bam/ /gang du thigs pas slebs pa'o/ /gang re du nyer spyod gcig pa der/ /chos gos gsum ni nyer bzhag nas/ /gzhan du dge slong nyal gyur kyang/ /ltung ba bskyed par 'gyur ma yin/ /lha rten dag la sogs pa yi/ /thun mong sgo drung dag tu
19a2(mdo 'grel): gos/ /sbas nas gzhan du dug na yang/ /zad byed ltung ba dang ldan ma yin/ /'dom ni bzhi bcu rtsa dgu'i par/ /chos gos gsum dang bzhi gcig tu/ /nyer spyod dag tu song ba na/ /'dug 'greng 'bral ba ma yin no/ /chos gos yang dag yod na yang/ /
19a3(mdo 'grel): gzhan dag bsgrub bar 'dod pa yis/ /byin gyi ma brlabs ma ? rtags par/ /zla pa las lhag bzhag mi bya/ /smin drug nas ni khra yi par/ /dus kyi gos ni rnam bar spyad/ /de las gang lhag dus min te/ /nye du sogs la yid brtan bya/ /dur khrod pa
19a4(mdo 'grel): dang mi shas dang/ /shes pa nyid kyi chos gos dang/ /song dang song ba ma yin pa dang/ /phyag dar khrod ni lnga pa yin/ /dur khrod pa ni dur khrod spyod/ /sbyin po mi shes shes pa nyid/ /song ba ro yi gos la sogs/ /phyag dar khrod ni por ba'o/ /rdul
19a5(mdo 'grel): gyi sbags dang dgon ba dang/ /srad por me lis tshig pa dang/ /mi gtsang gis gos phyag dar khrod/ /rnam pa lngar ni shes par bya/ /me yis tshig dang chu la bor/ /de bzhin ma mas byin pa nyid/ /byi ba'i so yis 'chos pa dang/ /de bzhin
19a6(mdo 'grel): be'us zos pa'o/ /gsar pa dang ni longs spyad bzod/ /chos gos rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/ /de yi cho ga ji skad bshad/ /de bzhin 'dir ni mngon par brjed/ /gsar pa'i gos la 'di bya ste/ /thog mar snam sbyar gnyis rim drub/ /de bzhin du
19a7(mdo 'grel): ni gding ba ste/ /chos gos gzhan la nam yang min/ /zla bzhi la sogs longs spyad pa'i/ /gos de sdom brtson gyis rtog na/ /snam sbyar la ni bzhi rim ste/ /gzhan dag la ni nyes rim bya/ /de las lhag pa mi sbyar te/ /rim pa de la sbyar
19b1(mdo 'grel): bya yang/ /bzo 'phror gyur te bzhag ba ni/ /zhag bcu'i bar du rung ba yin/ /snam sbyar rnams kyi tshal bu ni/ /snrel bzhi bya'o dgu sogs dgu/ snam phran nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bar/ /de dag dbye ba nges par bstan/ /glegs bu phyed dang gsum pa gsum/ /gsum ni
19b2(mdo 'grel): glegs bu phyid dang bzhi/ /tha ma gsum gyi glegs bu ni/ /phyed dang lnga par bya ba yin/ /sde tshan gsum po 'di dag gis/ /snam sbyar zhes byar gsungs pa ste/ /de dag tshad ni nges bstan pa/ /dang po khru ni lnga dang gsum/ /tha ma phyed dang gsum dang lnga/ /
19b3(mdo 'grel): de gnyis bar ni bar ma yin/ /de bzhin bla gos nyid kyang ste/ /lnga dang gsum par gsungs pa yin/ /gnyis lnga gnyis ni bzhi po dang/ /lnga pa yang ni thang gos yin/ /gal te de dag ma 'byor na/ /rdzas bzung don du 'khor gsum khebs/ /sbyor
19b4(mdo 'grel): na rang bzhin chang rnams la/ /khru yi tshad du bzhag pa yin/ /shin tu ring dang thung ba la/ /lus kyi chang du 'dod pa yin/ /dang po tha ma dag dang dbus/ /tshal bu'i sgo ni gsum du brjod/ /de yi sor ni bzhi dang gnyis/ /de yi bar ma rim pa bzhin/ /
19b5(mdo 'grel): khru yi chad las chung ba la/ /byin brlabs yid bstan mi dgos so/ /sbu can la yang de bzhin te/ /de gyon grong du 'jug mi bya/ /dge 'dun lhan cig zan mi za/ /mchod rten la yang phyag mi bya/ /'di ni sbyin bdag go'i
19b6(mdo 'grel): zhes/ /yongs su brtags nas bcang bar bya/ /ma dras chos gos gyon nas ni/ /grong du 'jug par mi bya ste/ /'jug na nges par dge slong dag/ nyes byas 'gyur te med ma gtogs/ /mi mthun byed dang 'khrug lod can/ /mu
19b7(mdo 'grel): cor? smra dang gtum po dang/ /'gro bar 'dod dang 'gro ba la/ /mkhas bas yid brtan phyir mi bzhag/ gal te yid ches dge slong zhig/ chu yi pha rol gnas na yang/ /de phyir de la chos gos kyi/ /yid brtan bya bar gsungs pa yin/
20a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan der gnas pa'i dge slong dag/ shi bar shes na chos gos ni/ /slar yang dge slong gzhan zhig gis/ /ming gi yid bstan bya ba yin/ /chos gos yid brtan bya ba 'dir/ /mi brtan la min mngon sum min/ /de bzhin dge
20a2(mdo 'grel): tshul rnams la yang/ /chos gos yid brtan bya ba min/ /gang dag gzhan gyis gtad nas ni/ /chos gos byin gyis brlabs pa na/ /de shin yang dge slong des/ /dge 'dun la ni dbul bar bya/ /chos gos gang brtags de yi mthar/ /
20a3(mdo 'grel): snag tshal sogs thig le bya/ /bye brag dag gis mtshan ma yang/ /khyad par rtogs par bya ba nyid/ /bar ma las ni yo byad drug/ de nyid nad g.yog la byin nas/ /shi ba'i yo byad lhag ma ni/ /dge 'dun bsod nams 'grub phyir bgo /
20a4(mdo 'grel): chos gos dras pa gsum dang ni/ /rdul gzan sham thabs gnyis gnyis te/ /g.yan pa dgag ba dang gding ba dang/ /ras chen dang ni skra bzed dang/ /gdong dang lag pa phyi ba ste/ /'di dag bcu gsum dbye bar 'dod/ /chos gos lhag sogs
20a5(mdo 'grel): yo byad rnams/ /'tsho ba'i yo byad bcu gsum po/ /dge slong chos gos rnams la ni/ /'char ba'i tshul ni 'di yin te/ /nges par byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ /de las gzhan pa yid brtan bya/ /rdul bzan mthong gos med par ni/ /chos gos
20a6(mdo 'grel): chen po longs mi spyad/ /gang phyir longs spyod shes pa yis/ /phal pa yang ni bgo bar bya/ /kha bsgyur 'os pa kha bsgyur zhing/ /drub par 'os pa drub pa dang/ /byin rlabs 'os pa byin gyis brlab/ /brtag par 'os ba yid brtan bya/ /sngon
20a7(mdo 'grel): po btsag dang dur smrig ni/ /'di dag rung ba'i mtshon gsum ste/ /chan chen dag gi chos gos can ni/ /kha bsgyur byed pa bkag pa yin/ /rgya skyegs le brgan rtsi dang tsod/ /rma shing rtsi dang mthing shing mtshal/ /si du ra dang gur gum
20b1(mdo 'grel): ste/ /'di dag tshon chen brgyad du 'dod/ /sing ba phru dang phying ba dang/ /la ba shin tu 'thug po dag/ 'di dag chos gos 'dod pa yis/ /dra bar bya ba ma yin no/ /spu can rnam par spang nas ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyi nang shun bya/ /gding ba la ni dra mi
20b2(mdo 'grel): dgos/ /rtag tu 'bral ba yang ni med/ /snam sbyar nges par dras te bcang/ /gzhan la ma nges gang gi phyir/ /'dod chung rang gis chos gos kyi/ /las kyi skyo ba skyed phyir ro/ /lnga pa sham thabs gyon nas ni/ /bya ba mdza' dag byed par rung/ /bla gos
20b3(mdo 'grel): sa phyogs gtsang mar ni/ /las yongs byed la bkag pa med/ /rnam sbyar dge slong 'dus pa dang/ /zas dang mchod rten phyag byed dang/ /grong sogs 'jug la bgo bya yi/ /gzhan dag du ni bkag pa yin/ /la ba phrug dang phyir
20b4(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /rnga mo'i la bdag dang ni/ /chos gos nyi rim gyon pa ni/ /mi gtsang phyogs su bkag pa yin/ /ma g.yogs gnas mal mi rung phyir/ /gzhan med bla gos bzhi bltab tu/ /byas te bting nas dran ldan pas/ /ldang
20b5(mdo 'grel): ba yang zhing nyal bar bya/ /gzhan du chos gos ma khyer bar/ /gnas na gzhan gyi dkar po 'am/ /dras pa ma yin na yang rung/ /byin gyis brlab par bya ba nyid/ /zas la nad pa ma gtogs par/ /gos gcig pa ni bkag pa
20b6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /sdom brtson bgo ba med par ni/ /khrus byed bkag go med pa rung/ /mang pos blangs na la ba sogs/ /gcig rnyed pa ni kun gyi spyad/ /rjes su gnang ba ma gtogs par/ /gcig pus bdag gir mi bya'o/ /kham bsgyur
20b7(mdo 'grel): bar nyin mo ni/ /phyi rol dur smrig nges par g.yog/ dge 'dun gos nani dran bzhin du/ /gnyis ka nas g.yogs spyad par bya/ /la ba'i spu ni phyir bstan nas/ /gyon te bcas par mi bya'o/ /srin sogs 'jigs pas 'dug pa dang/ /
21a1(mdo 'grel): nyal ba rjes su gnang ba nyid/ /dge 'dun rnams la be'u phrug ni/ /rjes su gnang ngo gang zag la'ang/ /par sig lab dge 'dun la/ /lab gzhan ni gang zag la'ang/ /rjes gnang kun kyang la bste/ /'on kyang par sig yul nas
21a2(mdo 'grel): byung/ /de ni par sdig la pa'o/ /smad g.yogs bsdams pa'i don du ni/ /ska rags kyang ni rung ba yin/ /ldeb ma dang ni shur bu nyid/ /gsum pa shur phu phre'u nyid/ /rang gi bzang po gang gyur pa/ /thams cad dge 'dun nyid phyir spyad/ /gding
21a3(mdo 'grel): g.yogs dag ni med par yang/ /nam yang mel sten longs mi spyad/ /dag par bya phyir sham thabs ni/ /btso lag mkhan la 'khrur mi gzhug/ brtse ldan rang ngam gzhan gyis kyang/ /snod kyi nang du dal bus bkru/ btso lag mkhan gyi
21a4(mdo 'grel): brtse med par/ /gos dag drag tu sprugs brdabs nas/ /tshags sran zad par byed pa'i phyir/ /bstan bcos las ni rab tu bkag/ tshul ldan ji srid legs par ni/ /chos gos la sogs longs spyod pa/ /de srid rgyun mi 'chad par ni/ /sbyin bdag
21a5(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi bsod nams 'phel/ /bsrung ba'i don du skra bzed ni/ /zheng du khru ni phyed dang gnyis/ /srid du khru ni gsum yin te/ /lhag pa brtag par mi bya'o/ /gal te chos gos 'tsher bag can/ /gzhan las dge slong gis rnyed na/ /'tsher bag tshu?
21a6(mdo 'grel): yis nyams byas nas/ /yongs su spyod gzhan du min/ /'tsher bag dang bcas 'jam po yi/ /chos gos bcang bar mi bya ste/ /'chang bar byed na de dag la/ /nges par 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /mdzes mas chos gos 'tsher bag can/ /
21a7(mdo 'grel): mdzes dga' la ni nan gyis byin/ /de la kun nas chags skyes pas/ /de phyir bstan bcos che las bkag /gang des yongs su longs spyad bar/ /bzod pa'i gos gzhan yod min na/ /rdul gyis 'jigs pas rnam sbyar la/ /rdul gzan bltab nas
21b1(mdo 'grel): bcad bya ste/ /zheng du mtho gang srid du khru/ /phyed dang do lus lhag mi bya/ /snam sbyar yongs su bsrungs byed pa/ /btsag yung rnams kyis kha bsgyur bya/ /khyab par duAng bla gos kyi/ /tha ma yongs su zegs pa na/ /snyug tshem la sogs yang dag sgrub/ /khab kyi
21b2(mdo 'grel): las kyang rjes su gnang/ /phyag dar khrod la dga' ches pas/ /bsams nas dral bar mi bya ste/ /nam yang chos gos don du yang/ /rma med ro las mi blang ngo/ /srin bu sogs kyi rma gtong kyang/ /rang gnas zhag bdun bzhag nas ni/ /dur khrod pa
21b3(mdo 'grel): yi dge slong gis/ /bkrus te kha bsgyur bcang bar bya/ /dge 'dun gyi ni mal cha dang/ /stan ni de la bkag pa yin/ /dge slong khyim du mi 'jug ste/ /sgo drung bsod snyoms blang bar bya/ /stan sogs 'dug par 'bod pa na/ /dur khrod ba zhes go byas
21b4(mdo 'grel): nas/ /gnang phyir khyim du zhugs nas ni/ /stan la 'dug pa las sogs bya/ /mchod rten dag la phyag byed tshe/ /'dom gang nang du dor byas te/ /nya dang sha sogs mi za zhing/ /der ni gnas khang brtsig mi bya/ /kha ma bsgyur dang kha tshang ca/ /be'u
21b5(mdo 'grel): ngas sogs dge 'dun rung/ /tshon can rgyal byed tshal phul bas/ /nges na be'u ras sogs bkag/ spang bar bya ba'i dngos gang rung/ /de ni dge 'dun la min te/ /gang gzhan phyis ni ster ba yi/ /gzhung lugs zhes pa dag la spangs/ /mi shes
21b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin du chags bcas gang/ /spangs nas zlog par mi byed cing/ /legs bsgo byas kyang mi ster na/ /de la stobs kyis dbrog par bya/ /'char ka'i khu ba'i thig pa gang/ /gos la babs mthong sbed ma yi/ /chags khyer bu yi rgyur gyur pas/ /
21b7(mdo 'grel): de yis kun bslang 'di rab bcas/ /dge slong gang zhig nye du min/ dge slong ma la gos 'khru dang/ /'tshed dang 'chag par byed pa ni/ /nges par ltung ba dang ni ldan/ /'khru ba la sogs byed 'jug na/ /gcig gis kyang ni nye bar 'joms/ /the tsom za na nye du
22a1(mdo 'grel): la'ang/ /nyes byas dri mar yongs su bsgrags/ /pha dang ma dang ma yi pha/ /nye bar bzung ste bdun brgyud ni/ /mkhyen chen gyis ni nye dur gsungs/ /de las gzhan ni gnyen min nyid/ /tshos khu dangs ma la sogs pa/ /re re la yang 'og gzhi gding
22a2(mdo 'grel): bslab? pa'i gzhi ni nyams byed pas/ /dge slong la ni ltung bar 'gyur/ /dge slong gang zhig nye du min/ /dge slong ma las bsams bzhin du/ /chos gos gang rung len byed na/ /de yi bslab gzhi nyams par byas/ /'di la slar sbyin dbrog mi bya/ /brdze
22a3(mdo 'grel): bal ni nyes pa med/ /ci ste brdzen mnyam pos sam/ /dge slong ma yi 'dod pa bzhin/ /rgya chen nor ldan dge slong nas/ /gal te 'bul na nyes pa med/ /de bzhin legs gsungs bsnyen rdzogs byed/ /bor rlag gyur dang dbul yang ngo/ /dge
22a4(mdo 'grel): slong chos gos gsum yod pas/ /nye du ma yin khyim bdag dang/ /de yi bdag mo las kyang rung/ /chos gos nam yang mi blang ngo/ /kun tu skyes pa khyim bdag ste/ /de yi bdag mor bud med brjod/ /bor rlag byung sogs slong ba ni/ /'di la nyes pa med par
22a5(mdo 'grel): brjod/ /dbul po la ni bslangs pa yis/ /kha tshar la sogs thob pa dang/ /gar mkhan la sogs pa yi gos/ /bzang po la yang nyes pa med/ /chos gos phrogs pa la sogs kyi/ /mang po rnyed par gyur na yang/ /dran pas stong g.yogs smad g.yogs
22a6(mdo 'grel): las/ /lhag par blang bar mi bya'o/ /khru ni bcu gnyis stong g.yogs gos/ /smad g.yogs yang ni bdun dang gnyis/ /re zhig 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i/ /stod g.yogs smad g.yogs zhes su gsungs/ /khru ni lnga gsum rnam sbyar te/ /nyis rims stong
22a7(mdo 'grel): g.yogs dag kyang ngo/ /khru ni lnga dang gnyis po dag/ re zhig bstan pa'i smad g.yogs so/ /bslangs nas dngos bo lhag pa dag/ gal te gshed nas ni rnyed/ /de ni go byas bzlog byas te/ /rjes su gnang na blang bar bya/ /khyim bdag mo'am khyim
22b1(mdo 'grel): bdag gam/ /gos kyi rin ni spags na dor/ /dge slong rnam par rtogs bzhin du// slong na de ni ltung dang bcas/ /sngar bzhin nye du min zhes bya/ /chos gos rnam pa bdun po dag/ yongs su spyad par bzad payis/ gos de rung ba zhes bya'o/ /rin spags pa zhes
22b2(mdo 'grel): bya zhi/ /gser la sogs pa ma smos shing/ /mgron du ma bos shes bya ste/ /pa rtog rung dran par brjod pa'o/ /lnga dang bcu pa'i rin dag gis/ /nyos la byin zhes brjod byed cing/ /sngon po sogs kyi kha dog ste/ /khru yi tshad kyi khru nyid do/ /rin la sogs
22b3(mdo 'grel): pa gsum dag gis/ /slong ba'i tshe na nyes byas te/ /thob na spang ba'i ltung bar 'gyur/ /ma bslangs na ni ma yin no/ /chos gos phrogs pa la sogs pas/ /gang yang rung ba blang bya ste/ /dge slong rtags kyis lus la 'dir/ /ma g.yogs nams yang
22b4(mdo 'grel): mdzes ma yin/ /so sor pags pa la yang ni/ /thams cad sngar bzhin kho na ste/ /ji ltar byas pas ltung ba dang/ /ltung ba med pa yang ni grags/ /bdag cag mi rung gnas brjod nas/ /pho nya las ni rin mi blang/ /legs sbyin chos gos bdag
22b5(mdo 'grel): cag rung/ /zhal ta pho nya de la brjod/ /de yis gang tshe chos gos rin/ /zhal te byed la gtad pa na/ /dge slong chos gos don gnyer des/ /lan drug bar du dran par bya/ /der ni mngon par grub na ni/ /der ni blang bar rung ba nyid/ /de las lhag
22b6(mdo 'grel): par brtson byed na/ /ltung ba'i tshang tshing nang du ltung/ /'di la lan drug bskul nas ni/ /rang nyid 'ongs nas ster byed na/ /dge slong gis ni 'di skad brjod/ /bdag gi 'di spangs dgos pa med/ /de lta na yang gal te de/ /shin tu phyag sogs
22b7(mdo 'grel): sngon 'gro bas/ /ster na dge slong len pa la/ /ltung ba med par gsungs pa yin/ /bud med dang ni rgyal srid la/ /dbang bskur gyur tam bram ze'am/ /rgyal po'i gnang chen ba la gtogs/ /blon po 'am dmag dpon la sogs 'dod/ /'dug sa
23a1(mdo 'grel): tshong khang chu gnas dang/ /'bod gnas dang ni khyim gnas so/ /tshong khang gang du nyo tshong byed/ /chu gnas chu snod sbed pa'i sa/ /'bod gnas 'breg mkhan dag dang ni/ /rdza mkhan la sogs min can gyi'o/ /khyim gnas khyim du rab brjod pa/ /
23a2(mdo 'grel): 'di dag 'bod gnas bzhir gsungs so/ /tshur sbyon legs par byon nam khyod/ /gdan 'di la yang bzhugs nas ni/ /phyag zhabs legs par bkru ba dang/ /bza' /dang btung ba dgyes bzhin gsol/ /lan drug bskul ba'i sgo der yang/ /ma thogs
23a3(mdo 'grel): par ni rdzong byed na/ /ltung med thogs nas rjod byed pa/ /ltung bar 'gyur ba kho na'o/ /gal te pho nya mi ma yin/ /sbyin bdag dang ni zhal ta pa'ang/ /sdom brtson nyes byas gsum gyi ni/ /dbyug pa rnams kyis mgo ba 'joms/ /sbyin bdag mi yin
23a4(mdo 'grel): pho nya dang/ /zhal ta pa ni mi min na/ /nyes byas gnyis so zhes ta tsam/ /mi ma yin na nyes byas gcig/ /gang du sbyin bdag pho nya dang/ /zhal ta pa yang mi yin na/ /de ni nges par ltung byed bskyed/ /khrims ldan ngan song gsum du 'phel/ /dge
23a5(mdo 'grel): slong gang zhig phan byed pas/ /dge slong gang la chos gos bskur/ /de nyid la ni yid bstan bas/ /yongs su spyod pa nyes pa med/ /gang der shin chos gos ni/ /gsal por de yi 'gyur ba yin/ /ma thob ba las spang ba dag/ gnyis ka la
23a6(mdo 'grel): yang med pa ste/ /snga mas yongs su btang ba dang/ /gzhan gyis bdag gir de ma byas/ /de la zhag bcu 'das na yang/ /gnyi ga la yang ltung ba med/ /gang yang dge slong srin bal gyis/ /gsar pa'i stan dag byed na ni/ /de la ltung ba'o de yang
23a7(mdo 'grel): gnyis/ /g.yog pa dang ni brlings pa'o/ /byin par gyur dang de bzhin du/ /longs spyad pa la nyes med de/ /sbyin bdag bsod nams 'dod pa'i phyir/ /dge slong gi ni blang bar bya/ /lug bal nag po 'ba' zhig gis/ /gsar pa'i stan ni mi bya ste/ /de
23b1(mdo 'grel): tshol ba yis sdug bsngal gyis/ /klog dang kha ton nyams par byed/ /dkar nag dang ni 'khob bal gyi/// /cha gnyis cha gcig bsres nas ni/ /brlings pa nges par byed na ni/ /stan des ltung ba med pa yin/ /nag po rang bzhin gyis gnag nyid/ /mgrin pa rgyal dang/
23b2(mdo 'grel): glo gnyis dkar/ /spyi bos lto dang tshe'u 'gab/ /'khob bal dkar nag zhes su brjod/ /dkar nag 'khob bal dkar po ni/ /srang phyed tsam gyis nyung ba zhig/ byas nas gsar pa rtsom byed na/ /de la ltung bar the tshom med/ /de las gzhan pa ma rnyed na/ /nag po kyang
23b3(mdo 'grel): ni bya ba yin/ /gzhan las rab tu thob pa ni/ /ci bde bar yang yongs su spyad/ /lo drug bar du nan tan gyis/ /byas pa'i stan de bcang bar bya/ /lo drug tshu ro ba de byas ltung/ /nyes med tshogs kyis gnad ba yin/ /lo gcig la yang gnyis pa dag /gal
23b4(mdo 'grel): te dge slong rtsom byed na/ /rtsom la nyes byas gcig yin te/ /yongs su rdzogs la dngos gzhing bzhag/ de bzhin gnyis gsum bzhi dang lngar/ /brtsams pa la yang nyes byas 'thob/ /lo drug bar du zhugs gyur nas/ /rtsom pa la ni nyes pa med/ /gdi?
23b5(mdo 'grel): ba gsar pa byed pa na/ /rnying pa la yang nges par mdza' / /kha dog ngan par byed 'dod pas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i mthe gang glan/ /gal te mtho gang chad de las/ /bsams bzhin cung zad tsam spyod kyang/ /de skabs ltung ba'i dbyug pa yis/ /mgo
23b6(mdo 'grel): bo gcag par byed pa yin/ /gal te shin tu zegs pa 'am/ /spyad mi bzod cing dengs pa na/ /de tsam nyid dam chung ba gang/ /glon pa la ni nyes pa med/ /sdom brtson rang gis bal dag ni/ /dpag tshad gsum las lhag mi 'khur/ /nyud du zhal
23b7(mdo 'grel): sogs pa'i phyir/ /mngon par khyer yang nyes pa med/ /grong las rgyang grags phyed du yang/ /sdom brtson khur na nyes byas te/ /grong khyer nas ni grong khyer du/ /rgyang grags gcig khur ltung ba yin/ /dge slong gang zhig dge slong ma/ /nye du min la? bal
24a1(mdo 'grel): dag ni/ /rmel? ba la sogs byed 'jug na/ /de yang bslab las nyams ldan 'gyur/ /rmel ba la sogs re res kyang/ /mdza' dag gis kyang kun nas bskyed/ /sdom brtson ltung ba dang bcas na/ /nyes byed bzhin du 'og tu 'gro/ bcom ldan brtse bas
24a2(mdo 'grel): dge slong dag/ sa le spram len bkag pa yin/ /chos gos lam rgyags nad pa yi/ /sman gyi rgyur ni ma gtogs so/ /gser dngul mu tig nor bu dang/ /mus la gar b+ha g.yas su 'khyil/ /dmar dang shang ka shi la dang/ /bya ru la sogs reg na ltung/ /thub
24a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i dge slong don nyung dang/ bya ba nyung ba mdzes pa de/ /mang po dben pa dang ni dga' / /nyung du rtsam zhig bcad bar bya/ /sdom brtson gang zhig nor ldan pas/ /bskyed kyi don du gtong byed na/ /bskyed thob ltung ba'i rdo rje yis/ /bdag nyid 'joms
24a4(mdo 'grel): par byed pa yin/ /sbyor ba dang ni rab sbyor dang/ /bsgrub dang brje ba de bzhin de/ /byed pa mi byed zhes bya dang/ /mngon tshan can ni rnam pa bzhi/ /shing rta la sogs snod 'grems shing/ /yul phyogs zong ni 'dra byed la/ /grogs po dag ni 'tshol byed pa/ /
24a5(mdo 'grel): 'di dag sbyor bar 'dod pa yin/ /rab sbyor bdun sde la sogs pa'o/ /skyed phyir nor ni gtong byed pas/ /dbang po gro ga snag tsha dang/ /smu gu tshol bdag la 'dod/ /'dod pas rnyed la chags pa yi/ /nyes 'gyur la sogs spel ba'i phyir/ /
24a6(mdo 'grel): gro ga la sogs sgrub byed pa/ /de ni bsgrub par gsung ba yin/ /nor bu mu tig bya ru sogs/ /rdzas rnams yongs su brje ba na/ /snag tsha gro ga la sogs 'tshol?/ /de ni brje bar yongs su grags/ /bskyed ma thob kyi bar du 'dir/ /nyes byas
24a7(mdo 'grel): du mar yongs su grags/ /gang tshe skye ba thob de 'di tshe/ /gsal por ltung ba nyid du grags/ /byed pa mngon tshan can la sogs/ /gtong par brjod do mi byed pa/ /slar yang gser sogs mi gtong ba'o/ /cho ga 'di yang sngar bzhin te/ /dkon
24b1(mdo 'grel): mchog gsum gyi ched du ni/ /rnyed pa 'dod pas sbyor ba dag/ 'jig rten spyod pas gzhan min brtag/ rigs ldan zhal ta la rung ste/ /rgyal po dang ni rgyal po'i 'khor/ /sbyin bdag rnams kyi drung du ni/ /nam yang sbyor ba mi bya'o/ /'di dag rnams las rnyed med
24b2(mdo 'grel): dam/ /'on te dka' bas snyed kyang rung/ /khyer nas mi ster gta' ma blang/ /khyer yang ster nus de lta min/ /nyo byed shes rab can med na/ /gang nyo 'dod pa'i dge slong gis/ /rdzas rnams rjes su brtags nas ni/ /nges par lan gsum bar du brjod/ /rnyed
24b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i don du mi btsong zhing/ /nam yang nyon ltung ba nyid/ /dgos pa rjes 'brel dor byas nas/ /nyo tshor la ni nyes med de/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun phyir/ /'jig rten chos lugs rjes 'brang ba'i/ /zhal ta pa yis nyo tshong
24b4(mdo 'grel): bya/ /gzhan du gzhan gyi ma yin no/ /mchod phyir gus pas rtag tu ni/ /gtsug lag khang du tshong byed na/ /de la bskyed dang bcas sbyin te/ /sbyin bdag dang ba bskyed phyir ro/ /so ba til dang mun ga sogs/ /srog chags dang bcas
24b5(mdo 'grel): ma brtags pa/ /bsil grib kyi ni sa phyogs su/ /de ni rab tu bkram ste bzhag/ de lta na yang de nas de/ /gal te bral bar ma gyur na/ /de tshe slar yang gnas khang du/ /bzhag nas sgo ni rtag tu bsdam/ /zhag bcu las 'das lhung bzed ni/ /
24b6(mdo 'grel): brtul zhugs can gyis bcad mi bya/ /lcags dang sa las byas rang bzhin/ /lhung bzed rnam pa gnyis su brjod/ /tshad ldan chung ma /chen po ni/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i don phyir yang/ /mang po yin na yang ni rung/ /'chang ba la ni
