24b7(mdo 'grel): smad pa med/ /lhan pa gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhis/ /lhung bzed gzhan dag bslang mi rung/ /dge ba'i sems kyis bag yod par/ /rim gyis nyo la nyes pa med/ /sdom brtson mi brtan ldan pas ni/ /lhung bzed bug rdol glan
25a1(mdo 'grel): mi bya/ /rgya skyegs tshogs mtshon mo ste/ /sra? tshil bu ram sas ma yin/ /brtan po lhan rings gang brjod dang/ /phye ma yang na lhan pa nyid/ /tham phran dang ni lhan thabs nyid/ /de bzhin chu srin so yang ngo/ /chos kyis yongs su brje
25a2(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /nyes pa med do gzhan du spar/ /slong ba'i tshon nyes byas te/ /thob pa na ni sbang bar 'gyur/ /grub na dge bas lhung bzed de/ /dge 'dun la ni grim par bya/ /de yang lhung bzed tha ma ni/ /de yi lung bzhin du ni bcang/ /bre chung do zan
25a3(mdo 'grel): tshod mar bcas/ /blugs nas bzhag pa de la ni/ /lag pas bkab tsho mi reg pa/ /de ni chen po'i tshang du brjod/ /bre chung gang zan tshod mar bcas/ /shong ba chu dud rab tu grags/ /'di dag gnyis kyi bar dag ni/ /'bring por brjod
25a4(mdo 'grel): de lhung bzed gsum/ /gang zhig lhung bzed gas dang rdol/ /de ni gus pas glan par bya/ /de byed pa yi 'tshog chas? kyang/ /dge 'dun gnas khang bzhag par bya/ /'gro na? lhung bzed bcas yin te/ /gal te lhung bzed med nyid
25a5(mdo 'grel): dam/ /bzhan du rkun pos 'jigs pa 'am/ /slar log 'dod pa yin na rung/ /thags mkhan nye du ma yin la/ /gla rngan med par 'thag 'jug na/ /ltung bcas ltung ba med pa ni/ /nye du yin nam gla byin na'o/ /des par dge slong
25a6(mdo 'grel): ched du ni/ /khyim bdag chos gos 'thag 'jug na/ /de yis der song thams mkhan la/ /snyan tshigs bsngags te grub na ltung/ /zheng che thar chags bzang sogs don/ /bsod snyoms kyis ni 'dod mi bskyod/ /de ltar byed na sdom
25a7(mdo 'grel): brtsan la/ /thob pa'i tshe na spang bar 'gyur/ /zhed che ba ni tshang chen te/ /mnyen 'gyur 'jam pa zhes bya'o/ /thar gyi zhag pa 'jur mdung med/ /tshags thar bzang ba dam pa yin/ /bsod snyoms kyang ni 'dir shes bya/ /bzas sogs lha yi
25b1(mdo 'grel): rigs la byung/ /ston mo lha mi rigs dag ni/ /de yi rgyags su rnam par shes/ /chos rgos dge slong la byin nas/ /gzhan du khro dang chags pa yis/ /de phyogs na ni nyes byas te/ /phan par 'dod pas nyes med do/ /lus kyi rab g.yo lus kyis ni/ /byed pa'o
25b2(mdo 'grel): dag gi g.yo ba yang/ /brjod pa yis ni 'phrog byed na/ /gnyis sam gcig gis kyang ni rung/ /ji srid chos gos gra yang ni/ /lus dang bral bar ma rgyur pa/ /de srid nyes pa tsam yin te/ /bral na spang ba'i ltung ba yin/ /dbyar ni dbyar kyi rnyed pa nyid//
25b3(mdo 'grel): rab tu 'gyed par byed na ni/ /nyes byas de ni 'das nas sam/ /de ma yin la ma yin no/ /dbyar gang bdag gir byed mi 'o dang/ /chos gos sped pa med par ni/ /chos gos gtang pa las byung ba 'am/ /dbyig la sogs pa rung ba yin/ /'chi phyir dang
25b4(mdo 'grel): ni 'chibs gtad/ /nad pas nad pa nyid phyir ro/ /'gro bar chas pas gang byin pa/ /'di dag gtad pa las byung lnga/ /mdza' yi zhag bcu'i nang du ni/ /sogs kyang rung ba nyid yin te/ /sbyin pa'i dus las 'das par ni/ /nam yang bcangs na dngos gzhi'o//
25b5(mdo 'grel): chos gos byin pa'i dus gang ni/ /mkhas pas yang dag bstan pa 'dir/ /dgag dbye bya pa'i nang rol tu/ /zhag bcu'i de las lhag pa min/ /'dir bdag rang gi lag nyid kyis/ /rab tu dbul zhes sbyin bdag la/ /gal te 'jog par byed na ni/ /
25b6(mdo 'grel): nam yang dge slong skyon yod min/ /dpag dbye'i dus kyi rnyed pa gang/ /thams cad dbyar gnas gang de dbang/ /gang zhig dbyar gnas ma bcas pa 'am/ /gang dang lhan cig dgag dbye byas/ /'jigs bcas dgon par gnas ba yis/ /chos gos gsum po dag las ni/ /gcig ni
25b7(mdo 'grel): khyim du bzhag bya ste/ /bag yod dge ba 'dod pas so/ /dgos pa'i phyed du gzhan du ni/ /zhag drug 'das kyang nyes med de/ /der yang mtshams gcig chos gos kyis/ /bdun pa'i skya rengs shar na ltung/ /dbyar gyi nang du za shol thob/ /dbyar gnas
26a1(mdo 'grel): phyi mar rab tu grogs/ /'jigs bcas zhes brjod gang du 'dir/ /nges par rkun no? pa'i 'jigs bcas 'dod/ /seng+ge stag sogs 'jigs pa ni/ /dogs bcas 'dod par shes par bya/ /sha sbrang la sogs 'jigs pa dag/ dogs bcas
26a2(mdo 'grel): 'dod par shes par bya/ /'jigs pa tha dad yin par gsungs/ /so ga'i zla ba lhag ma la/ /khrus don lus rab spa ba'i phyir/ /dbyar gos ras chen ming can gyi/ /chos gos brtul zhugs can gyis tshol/ /'di ni dbyar zla gsum dag las/ /zla phyed
26a3(mdo 'grel): bar du bcang bya ste/ /snga bar tshol lam lhag par ni/ /'chang ba la yang ltung bar 'dod/ /dgag dbye'i dus kyi gos bzang ba/ /sra brkyang gi dad pa'i don du ni/ /tshogs la gsol ba sngon 'gro bas/ /las byed pa la yang dag bsgo/ /tshogs
26a4(mdo 'grel): kyis yang dag gnang nas ni/ /'phags pa'i tshogs kyis gus byed la/ /gsol ba rkyang ba nyid kyis gtang/ /de yis ji ltar rig par ni/ /kha bsgyur la sogs byas nas ni/ /sod nas tshogs kyi dbus su zhu/ /de nas cho ga bzhin du 'dir//
26a5(mdo 'grel): gding byas brkyang bting ba yin te/ dge slong rnams la phan yon mang/ /phan bzhed ston pas yang dag gsungs/ /zhag bcu zla ba nges pa dang/ /ma brtogs par ni 'chang ba dang/ /snam sbyar med par grong sogs 'jug/ yang yang za ba nyid
26a6(mdo 'grel): ba ni/ /'dus shing za ba nyes pa ming/ /sgo ba ma byas par yang 'gro/ smin drug dang ni khra yi bar/ /sra brkyang gding ba dus su gsungs/ /mgu ba spyad dang mgu ba byas/ /spo ba dang ni de las langs/ /dbyar ma rdzogs dang dbyar bral dang/ /
26a7(mdo 'grel): dbyar ni phyi mar gnas de bzhin/ /lkog tu gyur pa'i dge tshul dag/ bslab pa spyod par byed pa ste/ /'di dag la ni phan yon med/ /rnyed pa kho na ma bkag go/ lta dang tshul khrims dri ma can/ /gang zhig dge 'dun gyis rab spangs/ /chos ma yin
26b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyogs lhung dang/ /de bzhin gzhan du dbyar gnas te/ /lnga po 'di la rnyed pa dang/ /phan yon yang ni med par gsungs/ /'dir ni bzang dang mkhas kun la/ /yon tan dang ni rnyed pa yod/ /dge 'dun la bsngos rnyed pa gang/ /brtul zhugs can dag dbang
26b2(mdo 'grel): byed na/ /spang ba'i ltung byed lcag tshan gyis/ /sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ /rnyed pa gos dang dbyig la sogs/ /bza' ba la sogs zangs zing yang/ /gnyi ka'ang bsngos pa bsgyur pa ni/ /rab tu bkag pa gsungs pa yin/ /tshogs kyis
26b3(mdo 'grel): gzhan la gzhan kyi red/ /rnyed pa phan tshun sgyur byed na/ /nyes byas dang ni yang dag ldan/ /dngos gzhi ru ni mi rtag go/ dge 'dun mthun pa nyid kyi ni/ /dge 'dun gzhan la bsngos pa yi/ /rnyed pa bdag gir slong byed na/ /thob pa'i tshe na spang bar 'gyur
26b4(mdo 'grel): gang zag sku gzugs mchod rten dang/ /dud 'gro rtswa dang nam mkha' la/ /bzhag sogs sa la ka ba ste/ /khang bzang sogs la nyes byas yin// //bam po gsum pa/ /dang por byin len byas nas ni/ /mar sogs dge slong byin
26b5(mdo 'grel): gyis brlag /rang gis blang nas spyad bya ste/ /zhag bdun de las lhag par min/ /sdom brtson de don la mkhas pa/ /spang bar 'os pa spangs nas ni/ /de nas ltung de las ldang phyir/ /nub kyi chod nas bshags pa bya/ /mkhas pas bskul ba byas
26b6(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /gnyis pa la ni blang bar bya/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i brtag pa dag/ mi byed pa las ltung bar 'gyur/ /ltung ba bcos pa'i don du ni/ /bdag gi don du chos gos sogs/ /cung zad tsam yang de dag gis/ /gzhan las blang bar mi bya'o/ /ltung
26b7(mdo 'grel): 'di spang bar ma byas na/ /gzhan du grol par 'gyur ma yin/ /sdang bar yang ni shes bya la/ /chos gos la sogs spang bar brjod/ na spang ba'i ltung byed sum cu po/ /bslab bya dang bcas bshad nas ni/ /de rjes ltung byed 'ba' zhig pa/ /dgu
27a1(mdo 'grel): bcu rab tu gsal bar bya/ /rgyal po'i khab du bcom ldan 'das/ /blta 'dor khyim ba rnams kyi ni/ /bcom ldan 'das nyid gang ni zhes/ /sgra gcan 'dzin la dris pa dang/ /gzhan na bcom ldan bzhugs bzhin du/ /gzhan
27a2(mdo 'grel): du nye bar bstan las bcas/ /de bzhin mdo yas gsungs pa gang/ /ston pas tshigs bcad gnyis 'di gsungs/ /chos gcig las 'das gang yin pa/ /lus can rdzun du smra ba ste/ /'jig rten pha rol spangs pa yin/ /'di yis
27a3(mdo 'grel): sdig pa mi bya med/ /lcags gong ma lce 'bar bdag/ zos par gyur pa mchog yin gyi/ /tshul 'chal mang dag mi sdom pas/ /yul 'khor bsod snyoms za ba min/ /bslab pa'i gzhi ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /nges par rdzin
27a4(mdo 'grel): tshig bkag pa ste/ /lag brgyud smra ba'i khyu mchog gnas/ /brtsams te rdzun du smra rnams la/ /shes bzhin du ni rdzun smra pa'i/ /dge slong la ni ltung byed brjod/ /rdzun tshig rnam pa dgu yin te/ /rnam pa gnyis kyi bar du brjod//
27a5(mdo 'grel): sdom brtson dag la drungs 'byin chos/ /las pham la sogs rnam pa lnga/ /tshul khrims lta ba cho ga dang/ /'tsho ba yin smra ma dgu/ mthong sogs rnam pa gsum yin te/ /de dag gis ni smra ba la/ /brdzun tshig rnam pa
27a6(mdo 'grel): brgyad ces 'dod/ /tshul khrims lta spyod chog 'tsho/ /mthong dang thos dang dogs pa yis /sdom brtson rdzun du smra ba la/ /gang mang rnam pa bdun nyid brjod/ /smra 'gyur de bzhin smra ba dang/ /smras pa zhes phyi tshig gsum dang/ /mthong ba
27a7(mdo 'grel): la sogs tshig gsum ste/ /rdzun du smra ba drug du brjod/ /de ltar re re dor ba yis/ /tshig gis 'dir ni shes bya ba/ /rdzun tshig rab tu shes pa la/ /brjod nas go ba rnam pa gnyis/ /slar yang pas pham la sogs lngas/ /pas pham
27b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur bar shes bya ste/ /phas pham gnas su gang brjod pa'i/ /sngar smras mdza' ni mas pham nyid/ /gzhan la nam yang mi bzhed do/ /dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ba ni/ /bag tsam gyis sam rtsa bas bskur/ /chos la chos min la sogs des/ /gang zhig
27b2(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun dbus smra na/ /de la sbom por 'gyur ba yi/ /rdzun tshig ce sim? rnam par bzhag/ gso sbyong dus gying las dag la/ /'di la dag gam zhes brjod tshe/ /kha dog nyes pa sped byed na/ /nyes byas dri mar 'gyur bar brjod/ /de ltar de dag gang bstan
27b3(mdo 'grel): pa/ /rdzun gyi tshig ni rnam pa bzhis/ /de las gzhan pa ltung byed du/ /'gyur ba'i rdzun tshig zhes byar bstan/ /ma mthong sogs la mthong sogs dang/ /mthong sogs la'ang de las bzlog/ shes bzhin du ni smra byed na/ /don rig pa na ltung
27b4(mdo 'grel): byed 'dod/ /dud 'gro la yang rwa chags sogs/ /skyon nas tshig > smras pa na/ /sems zhum las byed mi brtson na/ /shes ldan mi rnams smos ci dgos/ /re phyir sems can thams cad la/ /phan bzhed bcom ldan 'das kyis
27b5(mdo 'grel): bka' / /mi rnams la ni skyon brjod pas/ /dge slong la ni ltung byed yin/ /skyon brjod bsam pa'i dge slong gis/ /khyod ni bram zer ba byung zhes/ /bram ze lin rigs dris na/ /de la nyes byas ltung bar 'gyur/ /de 'dra'i sems kyi
27b6(mdo 'grel): rgyal rigs la'ang/ /smra byed nyes byas kho na te/ /de bzhin rdza rigs dmangs dag la /smra byed sdom brtson ltung byed yin/ /thags mkhan lha rten lham mkhan dang/ /shing mkhan chil bu smrig ma mkhan/ /de la sogs pa'i rigs rnams
27b7(mdo 'grel): kyis/ yongs su smra na ltung byed brjod/ /rdza mkhan dang ni mgang ba dang/ /ban dang ko lpags mkhan dang ni/ /bya shor nyi pa rngon pa dang/ /gtum po sogs brjod nyams par 'gyur/ /khyod ni bram ze khyod kyi ni/ /rigs kyi bya ba gcing?
28a1(mdo 'grel): spra sogs/ /bslab bya khyod la dge slong gis/ /ci bya zhe na'ang nyos byas nyid/ /khyod ni rgyal rigs khyod kyi las/ /mtshon cha'i rigs pa mdung dang ni/ /mnga' sogs slobs shig ces smra ba/ /gang yin de yang nyes byas
28a2(mdo 'grel): so/ /de bzhin rje rigs dmangs rigs kyi/ /las la nges par sbyar yang ngo/ /thags mkhan smyig ma mkhan sogs la/ /ltung byed kyi ni ltung bar brjod/ mchod sbyin dang ni gdol pa sogs/ /khyod kyis rang las byos
28a3(mdo 'grel): shig ces/ /smra yang mi mkhas de dag la/ /snga ma bzhin du nyes byas yin/ /'thang po zhar ba lag rdum dang/ /sgur po mi thung 'on dang long/ /zhes sman yang ltung byed kyi/ me yin dang bsag pa 'thob/ /khyed ni mdze
28a4(mdo 'grel): can khrag nang skyug/ nyams chung g.yan pa 'og grol dang/ /de la sogs brjod da na tshig rnams/ /sdom brtson la ni ltung byed 'dod/ /khyod ni ma dag ltung bas ba tsam/ /gdug pa dang bcis 'gyod pa can/ /khyod ni
28a5(mdo 'grel): khro bas sems bsreg pa/ /zhes smras sogs la'ang de nyid do/ /dge slong skyon brjod bsam pa yis/ /bud bu sogs kyis gshe byed cing/ /rgya gdal sogs kun ldang bas/ /spyod na ltung byed kyis reg 'gyur/ /de ltar
28a6(mdo 'grel): rigs dang bzo dang ni/ /las rnams dang ni rtags dang nang/ /lta dang khro ba la sogs pa'i/ /tshig gi smra bar mi bya'o/ /the tshom bsal ba'i don du ni/ /sangs rgyas gdung ni gang yin pa/ /rgyal rigs las gang rab byung ba/ /zhes sogs
28a7(mdo 'grel): smra la nyes pa med/ /dge slong phra mo smra na yang/ /ltung ba 'di nyid yang dog ldan/ /phra ma pha rol dbye ba'i phyir/ /nyon mongs can gyi tshig yin te/ /dper na 'dag mkhan gyol po khyod/ /de skad su zhig smra zhe na/ /smra ba dga' byed kyis sme
28b1(mdo 'grel): zhes/ /'di ni phyogs tsam bstan pa ste/ /'dir yang thams cad snga ma bzhin/ /rigs dang bzo sogs smras pa las/ /nyes byas la sogs shes pa ste/ /blo ldan gyis ni spang bar bya/ /dge 'dun mchog gcig pa yis ni/ /gang zhig mthun par gyur pa na//
28b2(mdo 'grel): las la skyo sdogs byed pa des/ /zab byed ltung ba thod par 'gyur/ /mchog gcig bsam pa gcig pa yis/ /chos bzhin cho ga bzhin du ni/ /'gyed pa la sogs rnam bzhi yi/ /dbang byas bstan pa de dag gis/ /las la skyo sdogs zhes bya ba
28b3(mdo 'grel): 'di ma legs zhes rtsod pa yi/ /rdzogs mthe tshom gyis rkyang ni/ /skyo sdogs byed na ltung bar bcas/ /byas sam 'on te ma byas zhes/ /the tshom gyis kyang skyo sdogs na/ /nyes byas 'gyur te de la ni/ gcig shos min zhes mkhas pas gsungs//
28b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan dag gis ni dbang byas la/ /gzhan gyi dbang byas 'du shes sam/ /rdzogs lam rdzogs zhes pa la/ /ltung ba'i tshul ni sngar bzhin no/ /gnyug mar gnas dang las byed dang ? /'dun pa phul dang lnga ba smra/ /glo bur ba ste 'di dag ni/ /gang
28b5(mdo 'grel): zag lnga zhes yongs su grags/ /thog mdza' dbus su gang rig de/ /gnyug mar gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /las kyi dbang du byas pa bas/ /gang zhig de byed de las byed/ /der ni gang gis 'dun pa phul/ /de ni 'dun pa phul pa'o/ /lta ba
28b6(mdo 'grel): smra ba zhes bya gang/ /gang dag dge 'dun dbus su ni/ /zhu tshe bdag gis 'di ltar mthong/ /'di ltar min shes smra pa'o/ /thog mdza' dbus su mi shes pa/ /de ni glo bur 'ongs par 'dod/ /dang po rnam pa gsum po yis/ /las la rtsod na
28b7(mdo 'grel): ltung byed do/ /dam pa'i las la rtsod pa la/ /tha ma gnyis kyis nyes byas so/ /tshig lnga 'am drug las phar lhag par/ /rig pa'i skyes pa med par ni/ /bud med dag la chos ston na/ /ltung byed skyon du 'gyur ba yin/ /mdza' ngag gzugs
29a1(mdo 'grel): ni mi rtag cing/ de bzhin tshong dang 'du shes dang/ /'du byed dang ni rnam par shes/ /mkhas pasa tshig lngar nges rtogs bya/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/ /lus dang yid kyang mi rtag ces /tshig drug brjod pa 'di yin bar/ /mkhas pa
29a2(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis gsungs ba yin/ /tshig lnga bstan par bya'o zhes/ shes bzhin tshig drug rjod byed na/ /ltung pa'o de bzhin drug pa yang/ /bdun ba rjes su ston pa'o/ /'brel med sgra la nyes med de/ /shin tu smra ba myur yang ngo/ /dris lam
29a3(mdo 'grel): mkhan gyi bud med ni/ /rigs ldan la ston nyes pa med/ /bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang tshig/ mnyam por chos brjod pa las ltung/ /rjes su 'brang la nyes med de/ /'don dang kha ton sbyong ba la'ang/ /gnas ngan len dang
29a4(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i tshig/ tshogs kyis gnang med brjod mi bya/ /de yang phas pham pa dang ni/ /dge 'dun lhag ma'i gnas ngan len/ /yang dag bla mar gyur ba'i chos/ /bsnyen par ma rdzogs gang zag la/ /sdom brtson gang zhig
29a5(mdo 'grel): smra byed na/ /'di la yang ni ltung byed 'gyur/ /'dir ni sgrib pa rnam pa lnga/ /mi rnams kyi ni chos su thos/ /de zad bla ma'i chos su 'dod/ /bsam gtan rnams ni bla ma'o/ /ma gnang bar ni dge 'dun gyi/ /gang zag dag la ster byed
29a6(mdo 'grel): ces/ dbyin nas rtsod pa rtsom na ni/ /sdom brtson de yang thad ltar 'gyur/ /zla ba phyed phyed gso sbyong dus/ /so sor thar pa 'don pa'i tsho /gang zhig khyad gsod da la yang/ /zad byed ltung bar 'dod pa yin/ /phra zhing phra pa 'di dag
29a7(mdo 'grel): 'dir?/ /nyer bstan dgos pa ci zhig yyod/ /gang dag nyon mo nges dbang gis ni/ /bslab pa khyod gsod 'di skad smra/ /rtsis kyi phyir yang khyad gsong phyir/ /bsreg phyir yongs su gdung ba'i phyir/ /de bzhin rna 'gabs don du zhes/ /
29b1(mdo 'grel): tshig 'di re nges zad ba ste/ /phran tshogs lung sogs las gsungs pa/ /ji srid 'dul ba dang 'brel bas/ /der ni dge slong khyad gsod na/ /de nyid ltung ba dang bcis 'gyur/ /dge slong dad? dam gzhan gyis kyang/ /sa bon tshogs ni ma rul dbang
29b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur po'i gnas ni 'jig byed na/ /gsal por ltung byed du ni 'dod/ /gang zhig rtsa ba'i ngo bor skye/ /de ni rtsa ba'i sa bon te/ /yung dang sge'u gsher gla sgang sogs/ /sdong bu'i sa bon de yang ni/ /sa gang la ni legs btsugs pas/ /
29b3(mdo 'grel): slar yang sdom bu skye ba ste/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang u dum wa ra/ /a sho dkar? bi re sogs/ /gang zhig bcad pa'i rtse mo yang/ /'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ba gang/ /ka shi bur shing 'dam bu smyig/ de dag thog dgu'i ming can yin/ /bkas pas
29b4(mdo 'grel): skya ba bkas pa yi/ /sa bon ji lta bu zhe na/ /a ja ka dang sam bu dang/ /'dzam bi ra dang yan dzi ka/ sa bon sa bon til mud ka/ gang gzhan de 'dra'i sa bon yang/ /'byung po'i sgra can sems can gyi/ /rigs kun lani nges bar brjod/ /
29b5(mdo 'grel): 'bu sin bye ma leb la sogs/ /de yi gns ni shing sogs grags/ /de la deng 'du shes pas sam/ /the tshom gyis kyang gcod na'o/ /de ltar sa bon rtsa sngon dag/ de 'joms na ni ltung bar 'dod/ /sa bon gzhan la gzhan 'du shes//
29b6(mdo 'grel): the tshom gyis kyang ltung bar 'dod/ /gtun tu sa bon rnam pa lnga/ /blugs nas nyams par bya'o zhes/ /dge slong lhur len nyams na ni/ /ltung byed lnga nyid 'dod pa yin/ /ma nyams na ni de dag la/ /nyes byas kyang ni rnam pa lnga/ /
29b7(mdo 'grel): mor 'thug na yang tshul de nyid/ /khu tshan la sogs par yang rung/ /sems de lta bus rtsa sngon pa/ /'chag par byed pa dag kyang ngo/ /nyams na dge slong ltung byed de/ /ma nyams na ni nyes byas so/ /shing dang re lde la sogs pa//
30a1(mdo 'grel): sngo sar la ni 'dud pa dang/ /khu tshan thug pa la sogs pa/ /'bong pa la yang 'dod pa yin/ /sbyor ba gcig nyid kyis kyang 'dir/ /shing gcig gcod par byed pa na/ /de la nyes byas gcig dang ni/ /zang byed ltung byed gcig yin no/ /
30a2(mdo 'grel): sbyar ba yang na gnyis dag gis/ /sdom brtson shing sogs gcig gcong na/ /nyes byas gnyis dang ltung byed gcig/ de ltar sbyor ba ji snyed pa/ /de snyed du ni nyes byas 'dod/ /rdzas kyi tshang ni dbye ba yis/ /zang byed ltur phyir tha dad 'dong/ /'dab
30a3(mdo 'grel): sngon ma tog 'bras bu dang/ /kho 'bus pa dang rtsa ba nyid/ /sdong bu dang ni chu ba gcong/ /nya lcibs 'od na yang ltung byed nyid/ /dgun? ba dang ni 'ang ba skya dang/ /mtsho skyes dag ni rgyas pa nyid/ /gcod pa la ni nyes byas gsungs/ /'di dag mdod bsdus tshul
30a4(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /so shing rtsab shun ba dang/ 'dab ma me tog sogs 'dod na/ /bslang bya ri las tshong dang shog/ zhes sogs tshig ni spangs nas so/ /sbrang tshang dang ni sha bal nyid/ /sha mo 'bu srin tshang de bzhin/ /bya tshang dang ni sbreng sha dang/ /brgya yang ni dbyag
30a5(mdo 'grel): mi bya/ /rung bas gcod dang 'don pa la/ /thams cad du lang? nyes spyod min/ /'di dag shes par gyis shig ces/ /brjod na 'di ni rung ba yin/ /gsar ba'i las la las byed kyis/ /shing gi lha la gsol btab cing/ /gtong ma me
30a6(mdo 'grel): tog la sogs bas/ /cho ga bzhin du tshod nas bya/ /rgyud chags gsum pa 'don byas nas/ /dam chos nyan pa sbyin bya ste/ /de la las lam bcu bo ni/ /dge dang mi dge brjod par bya/ /dge bas 'bras bu bde ster te/ /cig shos gyis
30a7(mdo 'grel): ni ngan song yin/ /ser sna'i skyon dang bcas dag la/ /sbyin pa'i yon tan legs brjod bya/ /gang zhig dga' tshal la sogs su/ /lha mo'i tshogs dang lha rnams kyis/ /rtse 'jo? yun ring sa bde myong ba/ nang ni sbyin pa'i 'bras bung
30b1(mdo 'grel): gsungs/ /bkres dang skom sogs me dag gis/ /lus ring lce mgrin skam pa yi/ /skal ngan 'khor byed yi dags gang/ /mi yi gzugs 'dra sdug bsngal can/ /de ni thogs med srid pa yi/ /bag chags kun khyab mthu ldan pas/ /mchog tu don
30b2(mdo 'grel): med 'gyur ba ste/ /ser sna'i 'tshe ba yin par 'dod/ /khrag 'dzag pa la sogs pa yis/ /zhag bdun rnam 'gyur mi ston na/ /tshul 'di legs par rig nas ni/ /shing chen gcod pa la sogs bya/ /dge slong la ni 'phya ba dang/ /gzhogs 'phyas kyang ni
30b3(mdo 'grel): rnam pa mang/ /byed na'ang ltung ba sngar ji bzhin/ /'dir yang ltung ba kho nar brjod/ /'di dag 'phya ba nyid dbang byas/ /dge slong gzhogs 'phyas mkhan yang 'dir/ /gsol ba'i las ni sngon 'gro bas/ /dge 'dun gyis gang bskos pa yi/ /gus
30b4(mdo 'grel): bas las ni nges ldan pa/ /de la dge spong gang zhig 'phya/ /khro sems ldan na ltung byed do/ /cig shos nyid ni nyes byas nyid de/ /gtsug lag khang gtong zas dang ni/ /'o thug 'bras bu 'gyed pa dang/ /phyi de nyin par yang ni dung/ /phran tshogs
30b5(mdo 'grel): dag ni 'drim pa dang/ /stong sbyad 'du ba dod sra brkyang gi/ chos gos dag ni sbyed pa dang/ /chos gos rnams ni 'gyed pa dang/ /dbyar gyi ras chen sbed pa dang/ /khang skyong de yi mdag bzhugs dang/ /de bzhin sder spyad zhal ta pa/ /tsong pa 'gegs dang
30b6(mdo 'grel): chu 'dri ma dang/ /bya rog la sogs skrod pa dang/ /mal stan 'dug stan stobs pa dang/ /zas 'dun 'jig rten bzlog pa dang/ /gsol dang gnyis kyi las gang yin/ /'di dag dge 'dun gyis ni bsko/ /gang phyir dang po bcu gnyis la'ang//
30b7(mdo 'grel): 'phya dang gzhogs 'phyas kyis ltung 'gyur/ /gzhogs 'phyas bden pa med pa'i tshig/ 'phya ba pha rol la snong pa'o/ /bsgo ba rna gzon ltung pa'o/ /bsgo ba zhes bya dri bar brjod/ /rnal gzon pa ngan sems kyis/ /des pas lan gzhan smra ?
31a1(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /gzhan byis pa na gzhan du ni/ /gzhan gdung bya phyir smra yang yin/ /gzhan du gsang bya'i gang zag ni/ /dgra bos dris tshe 'di skad du/ /nam mkha' 'am sen mo bdag mthong gi/ dam ba'i don du sems can min/ /zhes ni la
31a2(mdo 'grel): nas bslu tshig dag/ brjod pa la ni bkag pa med/ /rna la gzon pa'i bsam pa yis/ /dris tshe sdom brtson mi smra 'dug/ nyes byas kyis ni ngan song du/ /sdug bsngal mthar ni smra bar 'dod/ /dge 'dun mal stan khre'u sogs/ /blag ba med
31a3(mdo 'grel): par bor nas kyang/ /gzhan la ma bcol bar yang ni/ /'gro na zad byed ltung ba 'thob/ /brtul zhugs can ni 'gro ba na/ /ji srid khre'u la sogs pa'i/ /phyi yi mtshams ni ma 'das pa/ /de srid du ni nyes byas so/ /slar log tshe na ma nyams
31a4(mdo 'grel): na/ /nyes byas dang ni ldan 'gyur te/ /ji ste phan tshun gyur na ni/ /de la zad byed ltung byed do/ /me dang rlung dang char pa yi/ /dbye bas phan tshun gsum du gsungs/ /rim pa gnyis par tshig na ni/ /me yi phan tshun zhes bya'o/ /rim pa
31a5(mdo 'grel): gnyis dag bzlog na ni/ /rlung gi phan tshun nyid ces bya/ /char ba zhes bya char chu yis/ /rim pa gnyis bar phigs na yin/ /gtsug lag khang du zhugs pa na/ /me la sogs pa'i phan kun la/ /nyes byas la sogs rnam bzhag
31a6(mdo 'grel): dag/ snga ma bzhin du yang dag bshad/ /lam du rab zhugs de lta'i gzhi/ /gal te dran par gyur na de'i/ /mod la byis pa'i rang bzhin zhes/ /bdag nyid la ni yang dag snang/ /de yis ji srid dge slong gzhan/ /mthong na nye bar song nas
31a7(mdo 'grel): ni/ /gnas mal mal stan sba ba'i phyir/ /gus pa sngon 'gros gsol ba gdab/ /gal te de yis thob nas kyang/ /de dag sba brtul mi byed na/ de yang ltung byed mda' yis na/ /phog pa'i sdug bsngal nyams myong 'gyur/ /khyim
31b1(mdo 'grel): pas mgron du bos pa'i tshe/ /'dug stan la sogs g.yar ba na/ /dge tshul dag gam khyim pa yis/ /dkur bar bya yi rang gis min/ /gtsug lag khang du khyim pa dag bzan? za'i tshe nas rdzogs kyi bar/ /'dug stan sprin bya de dag la/ /rang don mnyams
31b2(mdo 'grel): pa yi bsrang/ /nad ba dang ni nang g.yog dag/ rgan por gyur dang tshul khrims 'chal/ /nang bcas bsnyen par ma rdzogs la/ /nam yang yid brtan mi bya'o/ /stan cig la ni 'dug ba na/ /gsar bus de dag brtul bya zhing/ /gnyi ka gsar bu yin
31b3(mdo 'grel): na ni/ /sten gang phyi nas dong pas yin/ /dam pa'i chos nyan la sogs dus/ /gnas brtan mkhar mi tshugs pa yis/ /gang du 'dug der 'dub stan ni/ /bzhag bya 'gyel ba nyid phyir yang/ /de phyir mkhyen mchog bcom ldan gyi/ /bsnyen
31b4(mdo 'grel): bku de? chog thams cad ni/ /gnyi ka la yang phan 'dod pas/ /bla ma la brten bya bar gsungs/ /rings pa'i rkyen ni byung ba na/ /rtsig pa'i drung dam shing drung du/ /bzhag pa la ni nyes med de/ /glo bur zas ni bcad mi bya/ /gang du song nas mi lta
31b5(mdo 'grel): ba'i/ /ji srid chos gos nye 'khor ni/ /sngar gsungs de srid mal stan gyi'ang/ /shin tu bde bsgrub byed pa'i/ /rin chen chos ni ston pa na/ /ston pa'i bka' ni mchod byas pas/ /stan mtho mjos la 'dug par bya/ /gang du song nas mi lta
31b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i/ /ji srid chos gos nye 'khor ni/ /sngar gsungs de srid mal stan gyi'ang/ /shin tu bde bsgrub byed pa'i/ /rin chen chos ni ston pa na/ /ston pa'i bka' ni mchod byas pas/ /stan mtho mjos? la 'dug par bya/ /gru bzhi rab mnyam
31b7(mdo 'grel): bde ba'i stan/ /rgyab rten rkang rten skas dang bcas/ /chu 'chang bla res legs bkod pa'i/ /seng+ga'i khri yang bcang bar bya/ /nor yod de tsho rjes gnang phyir/ /'dus byas mi rtag yid ches pas/ /rin chen kun gyis mdzes par ni//
31b8(mdo 'grel): lags pas de la 'dug bya nyid/ /de ltar yid la byed ba dang/ /sbyin bdag la yang phan pa'i phyir/ /bsdom brtson rin chen sna tshogs kyis/ /mdzod pa'i khri la 'dug par bya/ /gnor sbyin gnas dang kru yi yul/ /lha min lha
32a1(mdo 'grel): yul bskyon med de/ /gang 'di de dag bsod nams las/ /legs gyu ba phyir zhes thub pas gsungs/ /dge 'dun gtsug lag khang dag du/ /sdom rtson rtswa sogs ba nyid nas ni/ /ma bsdus ma bcol gyi nang yang/ /rkyen med 'gro
32a2(mdo 'grel): bar byed na ltung/ /mal stan gyi ni rigs la yi/ /rjes la bstan pa 'di la yang/ /'dul ba'i cho ga la mkhas pas/ nges pa ja ltung ba nyid du bshad/ /gtsug lag khang du thob pa yang/ /chu yi nang du dor nas sam/ /khyim gzhan du yang mi
32a3(mdo 'grel): brtul lam/ /ci dgar ma brtul nyes byas so/ /bsam gtan pa yi 'chag pa'i sa/ khru ni bco brgyad dag tu bya/ /kha ton pa yi khru bcu gnyis/ /rtsub na pang thang la sogs gding/ /gzhan du nad bskyed 'gyur ba ste/ /sa gzhi dag tu
32a4(mdo 'grel): gding bar bya/ /bag yod shes bzhin dang bcas bcag /zla ba phyed cing skyang nul bya/ /dge 'dun gtsug lag khang nas ni/ /sdang bas dge slong phyir skrod na/ /dge slong la ni ltung byed gsungs/ /de 'dra'i rkyen can ma gtogs so/ /gal
32a5(mdo 'grel): te dang min dge slong gzhan/ /sdang bcas skrod du 'jug na yang/ /de dag gnyi ka la yang ni/ /ltung byed kho nar gsungs pa yin/ /dge tshul la sogs rnams kyis kyang/ /sdom brtson skrod du 'jug byed na/ /dge slong la ni ltung byed de/ /de
32a6(mdo 'grel): dag la ni 'gal tshobs? can/ /kha zas ngan dang bzang pos sam/ /grang dang dro sogs kyis kyang dud/ /dge slong la ni mtho 'tsham na/ /ltung byed kho nar 'gyur ba yin/ /bsnyen bkur sa dang khrus khang dang/ /khang pa'i sgo mo nyid dang ni/ /gnas
32a7(mdo 'grel): khang mdzod dang khang grangs? su/ /dge slong nyid la gtad nas ni/ /'dug stan gnas dang gnas mal la/ /dge slong snga nas gnas pa la/ /'tshe ba phyis gnon ltung byed in/ /gtsug lag khang steng gnas su ni/ /spang leb sogs kyis
32b1(mdo 'grel): phub pa la/ /'dug par bya ste khri khang dag/ 'byung ba la ni ltung byed 'dod/ /de bzhin legs par gnas bcas dang/ /rtsa ba 'byung ba zhes bya gang/ /gtsug lag khang gi steng gi thog/ shin tu mkhreng ba ma yin la/ /mnan pas rtsa ba phyir 'byung ba'o/ /rkang rten byas
32b2(mdo 'grel): pa nyid dang ni/ /bkan te bzhag nas 'dug pa la/ /'dir ni bkag pa yod min te/ /nyal ba la ? chu la 'di nyid/ /lcags kyi gzer bus bsdams pa dang/ /rtsa ba brtan po dag la yang/ /bal pa dza sogs bcings kyang rung/ /phur ba lta bu bkag
32b3(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /srog chags bcas pa'i chu mis ni/ /rtsa shing sogs la bde bas byed dam/ /'debs su 'jug ba nyid kyang dung/ /sdom brtson la ni ltung byed yin/ /srog chags bcas la nger 'du shes/ /the tshom gyis kyang sdom can ltung/ /med
32b4(mdo 'grel): par 'du shes nyes med de/ /the tshom gyis kyang nyes byas nyid/ /bum pa sbyad thag bcas par ni/ /slong ma steng byed nyes pa med/ /rnyog pa ka ta ka sogs kyis/ /dangs par byas te brtags par bya/ /rnyog pa nyid dangs byad bzhin gyis/ /
32b5(mdo 'grel): gzugs brnyan gang du ltar yod tshad?/ /de ni 'bad pas btsags nas ni/ /shin tu dag pas chu btung ngo/ /khron pa bkod mas rnam dag dang/ /zhabs tshags can sogs dam bo dang/ /dge bdun dge slong gis dag pa/ /rung ba'i chu lnga yang dag
32b6(mdo 'grel): gzung/ /ril tshags zhes bya'i rnam pa dang/ /de bzhin grol bar bde pa'i ras/ /gru gsum pa dang zhabs tshags te/ /bum tshags gce'u can yang? lnga/ /ji srid dag par nges pa'i bar/ /rtse gcig pa yi rgyun du ni/ /'bang bas chu rnams yongs
32b7(mdo 'grel): brtags te/ /'on kyang ba la 'og yang yang min/ /mag ? pa'i smyug mas gang/ /ba lang drug pa'i shing rta ni/ /yongs su 'khong ba'i dus gang gi/ tshang der chu ngo yongs su brtag/ snod kyi skyon la sogs pa yis /gal te tho tsham 'gyod skyes na/ /
33a1(mdo 'grel): de ni slar yang brtag bya ste/ /the tshom med par yongs su spyad/ /rgyang grags lnga yi bar dag tu/ /song nas phyin sa de na ni/ /grol byed ras la sogs pa yi/ /chu tshags yod pa yin na 'gro/ slar logs pa yi bsam pa yis/ /
33a2(mdo 'grel): dpag tshang phyed 'gro nyes med de/ /don mthun pa ni yid brtan pas/ /shin tu rgyang ring song yang ngo/ /chu ba'i rgyun bzhin 'gro ba la/ /brtags ba'i chu 'thung nyes pa med/ /chu gzhan dang ni ma 'dres na/ /rgyang grags re rer brtag par bya /rgyun
33a3(mdo 'grel): las bzlog phyogs 'gro ba yis/ /'jug dogs re rer brtag par bya/ /chu gzhan dang ni 'dres ba la'ang/ /sngar bstan tshul 'di nyid shes bya/ /khron pa la sogs chu blangs nas/ /chu de gang gi yin pa dang/ /de yi lhag ba'i lha yi
33a4(mdo 'grel): phyir/ /bde gshegs kyis gsungs tshigs bcad 'don/ /bum ba'i kha ni bzlog pa yis/ /nam yang chu btud mi bya ste/ /lo ma la sogs ma snyed na/ /dben bar 'thungs la nyes pa med/ /ril tshags la sogs khang dag ni/ /'dab
33a5(mdo 'grel): ma sogs kyis nges par dag ba/ /chu 'thungs de rjes bum pa sogs/ /ma bkab yal dong nyes byas yin/ /bum pa la sogs dri ma ni/ /rab tu 'bad bas bkru bar bya/ /bskam 'os dus na ji srid du/ /drung ba'i don du nye bar bskam//
33a6(mdo 'grel): khyim bas khyim pa nyid la ste/ dge tshul gyis ni mi rung ngo/ /dge slong gis ni khyim pa dang/ /dge tshul gzhan la rung ba yin/ /dge slong de yis rnam brtags pa/ /gang phyid khyim pa la yang rung/ /dge slong yang dag gnas pas
33a7(mdo 'grel): brtag/ bzhin du bslab la g.yel bas min/ /khron pa rdzing bu la sogs pa'i/ /chu rnams zas sogs dri ma can/ /tha tshom med par btsags nas ni/ /de yis rtog pa de med bya/ /khyim pa rnams kyi khron pa sogs/ /yongs su brtags
33b1(mdo 'grel): pas dag pa yin/ /de yi gnas skabs shes nas ni/ /dus ma yin par yang ni rung/ /ba lang lhas la sogs par ni/ /dge slong song tshe chu med dam/ /nyung na zhog chu 'am ni/ /'o ma sogs kyi rkang bkrung rung/ /bshad ba chang dang
33b2(mdo 'grel): gci ba yi/ /snod dag rnam par spang bar bya/ /mar khu la sogs pa yi snod/ /me dang chu yis yongs su spyad/ /nya dang rus sbal gyis bldag ba'i/ /gshed gyi dri ma spang ba'i phyir/ /rub ba'i chu ni skom pa la/ /dus ma
33b3(mdo 'grel): yin par yang ni spyad/ /bud med dag la dge slong gis/ /chu sogs blud bar 'dod pa na/ /rgyun gyis sbyin par mi bya ste/ /kun nas chags sems kyis kyang min/ /sgo leb ngos khung dag dang ni/ /smad du chu khung gtod pa
33b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ skar khung 'bab stegs bcas pa yi/ /gtsug lag khang chen bya ba yin/ /char dang rlung ni bzlog pa'i phyir/ /steng nas gnan par bya ba ni/ /rtsa bcas 'jim pa'i gong bu dag/ gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du'o/ /de las
33b5(mdo 'grel): lhag par gang 'jog pa/ /nges par ltung byed 'gyur ba yin/ /so phag jo bo ngag gis sam/ /thams cad shing byed nyes pa med/ /tshul khrims ldan dang thos pa 'dzin/ /gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu dang/ /phun tshogs tshig
33b6(mdo 'grel): ldan lus kyis ni/ /dge slong ma ni sun ma phyung/ /chos lnga 'di dang ldan pa la/ /dge 'dun gyis ni bskos ba dag/ dge slong ma la 'doms pa ste/ /gzhan du ltung ba nyid yin no/ /mdo sde 'dul ba chos mngon dang/ /'brel ba'i don ni
33b7(mdo 'grel): rab ston pa/ /gdams pa yin par 'dren pa yis/ /rtsod pa med par gsungs pa yin/ /gnas brtan gyis ni bstan pa'i tshig/ 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis bzhed pa ni/ /slar yang gdams pa gzhan 'di ni/ /gnyis par yang ni gsungs
34a1(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ /dge slong ma yi dge 'dun khyed/ /thams cad yongs su dag gam dris/ /khyed la rjes su ston pa ni/ /dge slong su yang spro ba med/ /ngan song gsum 'gro 'jigs byed bas/ /ji ltar bslab pa mi 'khrugs ba/ /
34a2(mdo 'grel): thub ba'i bstan la rtag tu ni/ /bag yod bsgrubs zhig sring mo rnams/ /gdul bya'i 'gro la rjes brtse bas/ /'dul ba gang de rgyal sring brjod/ /de ltar 'di ni legs pa ste/ dge slang rgyal po zhes bya'o/ /ri zhag gdams par 'dod pa
34a3(mdo 'grel): ni/ /tshul ldan rnams kyis bskos pa yang/ /nyi ma 'jig rten pa yi mig/ ji srid ma nub bar du'o/ /nub la der ni 'du shes sam/ /the tshom gyis kyang gang ma dag dang/ /rjes su ston na zang ba yi/ /ltung byed dang ni yang dag ldan/ /ma
34a4(mdo 'grel): nub nub par 'du shes sam/ /the tshom gyis kyang ngas par ni/ /nyes byas mda' yis phog pa yi/ /sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur/ /sgo'am sgo dang nye bar yang/ /gal te char ni 'bab gyur na/ /shin tu yun rings 'doms
34a5(mdo 'grel): pa la/ /nub nas kyang ni ltung ba med/ /dge slong ma ni mkhas rnams kyis/ /bla ma ci nus bsnyen bkur bya/ /de yi sbros dang bsod nams dag/ spel phyir bla ma yis kyang spyad/ /phrag dog dri mas bsgos sems kyis/ /de la smod byed dge
34a6(mdo 'grel): slong ni/ /ltung bas kun nas bslad pa yis/ /dmyal me sbor bar byed ba yin/ /yang na zang zing 'dod pa yi/ /sred ba kho na'i dbang gyur pas/ /gdams pa byed na bden par ni/ /smra byed nyes pa yed ma yin/ /nye du ma yin dge
34a7(mdo 'grel): slong? ma'i/ /chos gos byed na ltung byed do/ /'di la ster na'ang ltung byed do/ /rjes su bstan pa kho na'o/ /dge slong 'gron lam 'gro ba ni/ /dge slong ma yi grogs byed bkag/ chom rkun la sogs 'jigs bcas pa'i/ /lam
34b1(mdo 'grel): du ltung bar mi 'dod do/ /dge slong rnams kyi dge slong ma 'am/ /dge slong yang ni dge slong mas/ /lam du nan bkur bya ste/ /khur byed ye med gyur na'o/ /dge slong ma yi 'ongs ba yi/ /lam rgyags dge slong la ni dud/ /dge slong gis 'ongs de la yang/ /
34b2(mdo 'grel): rnam pa kun tu bgag pa med/ /dge slong dge slong ma dang ni/ /lhan cig rgyun dang bzlog phyogs su/ /grur 'jug pa ni bkag pa yin/ /'jigs bcas thad 'gyo nyes pa med/ /dben par bud med gcig dang ni/ /dge slong ba cig pu lhan cig paS?/
34b3(mdo 'grel): 'dug pas gnas par mi bya ste/ /khyad par dge slong ma dang 'greng/ dge slong gi ni zang zing zas/ /dge slong ma yi skyor bcug pa/ /sdang ni gron du gnyer ba yis/ /yongs su sbyod ba nyes pa med/ /sgrub pa dang ni thos pa yis/ /sbyor bcug pa ni rnam pa gnyis/ /sgrub pa
34b4(mdo 'grel): rgyun du zhugs pa nas/ /ji srid dgra bcom gyur gyi bar/ /thos ba mdo sde 'dul ba dang/ /mo ma 'dzin pa nyid kyang ste/ /de nyid bden pa yin na ni/ /yongs su spyad kyang nyes pa med/ /mi bden yon tan smra ba yis/ /rnyed pa sbyor bcug zos
34b5(mdo 'grel): na ltung/ /nang dang chos gos las dang lam/ /dus ma gtogs par sdom brtson ni/ /zas ni gzhan du 'dod pa yis/ /yang yang zan ltung byed yin/ /lan cig zos pas mi 'tsho ba/ /de ni nad pa zhes bya'o/ /yul bzhir khru gang tsam gyis
34b6(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /chos gros kye ni dus su 'dod/ /gtsug lag khang dam mchod rten la/ /tha na re lde tsam yang rung/ /byug gam kun nas snyom byed na/ /las byed dus su brjod pa yin/ /dpag chad phyed du song nas ni/ /sdom? brtson slar yang log pa na/
34b7(mdo 'grel): de ni lam dus shes bya ste/ /yang yang za la nyes pa med/ /chos gos bcas par rjes gnang bas/ /chos gos med par khas mi blang/ /phyi ma'i bza' ba 'ba' zhig la/ /dang du blangs na nyes byas yin/ /dang por gos ni med pa dang/ /phyi ma'ang
35a1(mdo 'grel): gos bcas yin grang na/ /gang phyir ston mo gnyi ga yang/ /za ba la ni bkag pa med/ /dang po yang ni gos bcas la/ /phyi ma'ang gos bcas yin na ni/ /gnyi ga la yang ci 'dod du/ /za ba bkag pa yod ma yin/ /chos gos bor
35a2(mdo 'grel): nas med gyur te/ /gos bcas dang du len pa la/ /kun tu gos ni mi rnyed phyir/ /kun mkhyen thugs rje can gyis gnang/ /grong du mgron du gnyer ba na/ /dge 'dun mdza' dag go byas nas/ /rgan po gtsug lag khang skyong gis/ /dus su gaN+Di
35a3(mdo 'grel): brdung byas na/ /dge slong rang gi sde pa dang/ /glo bur lhag pa mthong ba la/ /'gro ba'i ched du bskul bya ste/ /gzhan du 'ga' chabs can du 'gyur/ /dge slong mu stegs 'dug gnas su/ /'dug nas der ni g.yos pa'i zas/ /zhag gcig
35a4(mdo 'grel): las lhag zos na ni/ /nad ba las gzhan ltung bar 'gyur/ /nad ba min pas nyin zhag ni/ /gnyis par gnas na nyes byas yin/ /bza' bzos na ltung byed de/ /gzhan nas der zan yang ngo/ /sbyir na rje bos gsungs bani/ /nye
35a5(mdo 'grel): du 'brel pa kho na la/ /lam brgya bza' ba zos kyang ni/ /ltung ba'i dri ma yod ma yin/ /ci bder stobs pa ma yin par/ /dge slong phye dang khur ba yis/ /gang ba'i ltung bzed gnyis gsum las/ /lhag par len na ltung
35a6(mdo 'grel): pad? yin/ /lhung bzed chen po gnyis dang ni/ /chu du gnyis dang chen po phyed/ /lhung bzed chu du gsum dang ni/ /'bring po gnyis su gang bstan pa/ /'bring po gnyis dang chu du gcig/ chen po gcig dang chud du gcig/ len
35a7(mdo 'grel): pa ltung ba yod min te/ /'breng po gsum du len pa la/ /nyes byas des par thob pa yin/ /bstan bzhin lhung bzed gang ba las/ /gzhan len dge slong ltung byed yin/ /gzhan du lhung bzed gang bar ni/ /len par
35b1(mdo 'grel): byed la nyes pa med/ /phan sems nye du'i khyim las gang/ /len la nyes pa yod min te/ /de blangs lhan cig gnas pa yi/ /dge slong rnams la bgo bsha' bya/ /bza' ba spangs nas gang ? ba/ /dge slong rnams lam brtags yin/ /ltag por legs
35b2(mdo 'grel): par ma byas pa/ /de la nges par ltung byed 'dod/ /bza' bar bya ba spangs nas 'dir/ /nam yang rjes su ma gnang ste/ /bza' ba spangs nas slar yang 'dir/ /bca' ba 'cha' ba nyid kyang ngo/ /sna tshogs chan dang zan dang sha/ phye dang khung ?
35b3(mdo 'grel): bza' ba ste/ /rtsa ba sdong bu me tog 'bras/ /lo ma yang ni bca' ba lnga/ /gang du zang zing zhes byar brjod/ /bza' ba rnams su shes bya ste/ /de ster de yi rnam 'gyur dang/ /spangs par stan ni bor ba ste/ /gnas ni lnga po 'di dag la/ /dge
35b4(mdo 'grel): slong spangs pa zhes byar brjod/ /gzhan du 'di dag min pa la/ /spangs pa yod pa ma yin no/ /re zhig tshig dang ldan pa yis/ /tshim par gyur pa'i mthar phyin te/ /de bzhin song zhig brjod pa yi/ /spangs par gyur la nyes pa med/ blo
35b5(mdo 'grel): nas ma yin rgyab nas min/ /pang du ma yin nam mkhar min/ /dkyil 'khor dag gi stang du yang/ /nam yang lhag? por mi bya'o/ /'bad pas lag pa rab bkrus nas/ /kha zas de ni yongs su blang/ /'dugs ma bor dge slong gis/ gang
35b6(mdo 'grel): zos de ni lhag por yin/ /'dug sa mang por dge slong gis/ /gang zos de ni lhag por min/ /gus pas de yi mdun du ni/ /tsog por 'du gnas 'di skad brjod/ /btsun pa dgongs shig bza' ba dang/ /lhag por byas pa bza' bar
35b7(mdo 'grel): 'tshal/ /'di ni bdag gi phun tshogs pa'i/ /bza' ba la sogs rung ba ste/ /lhag por mdzad nas gsol cig ces/ /gus dang bcas pas brjod par bya/ /des kyang de la kham gnyis sam/ /kham gsum zos nas de la khyod/ /song
36a1(mdo 'grel): zhig ji ltar bde bar ni/ /'di dag rnams ni bza' bar gyis/ /de ni zos nas spangs pa dang/ /gnas nas ma langs pa yis ni/ /yon tan can gyi mdun 'dug nas/ /chog snga ma bzhin du bya/ /de yis ma zos pa na yang/ /de la de ni
36a2(mdo 'grel): bya ba ste/ /song la 'di ni ci bder? zo/ /tshul 'di lhag por cho gar brjod/ /sdom brtson mgul par btung bya ba/ /'o ma zho la sogs pa la/ /tshul 'de nges par brtag mi dgos/ /nas la sogs pa'i thug pa ni/ /thug pa sor rjes yod pa dang/ /
36a3(mdo 'grel): gang du steng ni bla bar gnas/ /gting na ska bar gnas mthong nas/ /skad de 'dzub mos ldag byed la/ /spangs pa yod pa kho na ste/ /spangs pa der ni 'du shes pas/ /thos sam the tshom gyis gyang rung/ /ltung byed dmyal ba'i lam rnams
36a4(mdo 'grel): spyod/ /gang du ma spangs bar yang ni/ /gang phyir spang bar 'du shes sam/ /the tshom kho na yis kyang rung/ /nyes byas sdug bsngal ster byed yin/ /dge slong gang zhig rab spangs nas/ /lhag por ma byas dge slong gis/ /gang phyir
36a5(mdo 'grel): ngan sems bsam pa yis/ /bza' ba stobs pa ltung byed do/ /lhung bzed rkang ba gnyis dag gis/ /mnan nas nam yang bza' mi bya/ /bder gnas yin na ltung 'gyur te/ /nad can dag la nyes pa med/ /mchil lha mgyon
36a6(mdo 'grel): nas bza' ba dag/ mi rung dge slong nang ma gtogs/ /des kyang mchil lham steng du ni/ /rkang pa bzhag gi gzhan du med/ /'dren byed rgyab dang rgyang ring dang/ /glo dang chog mi shes dang/ /dge slong gis bskyod blang mi bya/ /lag
36a7(mdo 'grel): pa ma bkan pas kyang min/ /'dren pa nye bar gnas pa dang/ /mdun du 'dug dang chog shes/ /lag pa dag ni bkan pa yis/ /dge slong gis ni legs par blang/ /lhung bzed byin gyis brlabs par ni/ /bza' ba gang zhig lhung
36b1(mdo 'grel): gyur pa/ /the tshom med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /byin len byas yin bza' bar rung/ /rdul ni me tog 'bras bu zan/ /ltung ba dang ni gos kyang rung/ /gang zhig gsog 'jog de las gzhan/ /rung ba dang ni mi rung gang/ /brtags pa 'di dag dgu po ste/ /
36b2(mdo 'grel): bcu po rdul gyi rdul yin no/ /gzugs ni gsal po ma yin pa/ /de dag la ni nyes pa med /gsog 'jog byas pa de dang gang/ /byin len ma byas pa yi zas/ /de yis gos sogs 'bags gyur na/ /bkru'o
36b3(mdo 'grel): gzhan du nyes byas yin/ /lan tshwa la sogs bri mas nas ni/ /gsar bus blang bar mi bya ste/ /zas la mi mthun med bar ni/ /ji bzhin dus su nges par bstan/ /gang zhig rgan po'i gong du za/ /des pa 'am the tshom gyis kyang ni/ /de la nyin
36b4(mdo 'grel): zhag re re la/ /nyes byas nges par 'phel ba yin/ /brtag pas des par gzhan phyir bya ni/ /de ni sred pas cung zad cig/ byin len byas kyang de la de/ /de tshe spyad bar rung ma yin/ /sbyin pa po yis bltos med bar/ /gang gtang len pas
36b5(mdo 'grel): thob pa ni/ /de ni byin len dag pa ste/ /zos pa na yang nyes pa med/ /nga la 'di las 'di byin zhes/ /'dren pa po la smra mi rung/ /rigs pas thob par bza' bya yis/ /gzhan min nang bas nyes pa med/ /sdom brtson zos nas lhag ma
36b6(mdo 'grel): yin/ /chang bu yang na ci bder bzhag/ bya rog sogs la dmigs pa yi/ /kun slong khyad par mi bya'o/ /glo bur lhags dang 'gro 'dod dang/ /dge skos dang ni nang ba dang/ /de yi nad g.yog nyid la yang/ /bza' ba sngar ni sbyin par bya/ /gro
36b7(mdo 'grel): bzhin skyes kyi dbang byas nas/ /btung ba dge 'dun la yang gnang/ /de yi phyir na zhing dag ni/ /gzugs can snying pos phul bar bshad/ /'bras chan thugs pa zan dron dang/ /nya dang sha ni rung ba ste/ /'tsho ba srung phyir 'di dag ni/ /bza' bar 
37a1(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i sman du gsungs/ /rgun 'brum a shwad 'dra go dang/ /ku shu chu shing rtsub 'gyur dang/ /u dum wa ra rgya shug dag/ btung bar rjes su bsngags pa yin/ /khyim pa dang ni dge tshul gyis/ /legs par mnyes shing yongs su btsag?/ 'di
37a2(mdo 'grel): dag btung ba thun chod pa/ /skyur po zho kha chu de bzhin/ /'bru mar bu ram sbrang rtsi dang/ /mar dag zhag bdun par ni gsungs/ /sha khar bye ma ka ra dag/ 'di dag chul bsdus pa ste/ /gnan yang ji srid 'tshe ba'i sman/ /rtsa ba sdong bu sogs sbyar ba/ /
37a3(mdo 'grel): chul bzhin du ni byin brlabs te/ /yongs su spyad bar dung ba yin/ /rtsa ba gla sgang sge'u gsher sogs/ /sdong bur yongs su grags pa ni/ /tsan dan thang shing sle gres dang/ /yung dang pad+ma dkar la sogs/ /'dab bdun ba to la sogs ni/ /lo
37a4(mdo 'grel): ma'o de dag me tog kyang/ /'bras bu na le sham dang ni/ skyu ru aru ba ru sogs/ /shing kun spra tshil rgya skyegs dang/ /de bzhin thang chu dag kyang ste/ /til chigs la sogs 'gyur byed lnga/ /de gzhan du yang tsha lnga'o/ /a mra a mra'i nang
37a5(mdo 'grel): shun dang/ /'dab bdun pa dang shi di? sha'i/ /shun pa dag gi sman rnams ni/ /ji srid 'tsho ba zhes bya'o/ /gang gzhan de 'dra'i rigs dag ni/ /bza' pa'i don du bcad min pa/ /zos kyang bkres pa mi sel phyir/ /'di dag ji srid 'tsho ba'i
37a6(mdo 'grel): sman/ /rgu? 'brum ba la se'u 'bra go dang/ /a mra la sogs 'bras bu ste/ utpal la sogs rtsa ba dag/ mkhas bas dus su rung bar gsungs/ /dus su rung sogs 'di dag ni/ /phan tshun 'dras par gyur ba na/ /snga ma snga ma'i dbang byas
37a7(mdo 'grel): nas/ /yongs su sbyang la nyes pa med/ /nya dang rus sbal phag pa dang/ nya sgong chu srin byis pa gsod/ /ngo ma dang ri bong phag sgod dred/ /chil zhag byin len byas spyod rung/ /sha rjen za ba dag la 'dir/ /dri zhim rdzas kyi phye mar bcas/ /
37b1(mdo 'grel): sman pa'i dag gis nad sogs gnang/ /de las phar ni ma yin no/ /sha ni za bar ma yin pa/ /mi dang lto 'phye glang po sogs/ /'dri ma na dge slong mkhas rnams kyis/ /'di ni gang gis sha zhes 'dri/ /mchod rten nye 'khor bla gam med/ /sgo
37b2(mdo 'grel): dang bang rim chu yi gnas/ /khyim dang gnas khang dag du ni/ /bza' sogs 'chod de pa rnam par spang/ /sems bsdus la sogs cho ga yis/ /rung ba'i gnas ni rnam pa lnga/ /'dren pas gtsug lag khang du ni/ /zas gnas
37b3(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun don du gsungs/ /gtsug lag khang gi thig ba rkyang nas/ /sa phag nye bar 'jog pa na/ /lag gi gla ni mkhas pa yis/ /phan 'dod sems bskyed bya ba nyid/ /tshogs kyi rung ba'i gnas su ni/ /sa phyogs 'di ni
37b4(mdo 'grel): byin gyis brlabs/ /dag tu yang na lin gsum brjod/ /de ltar sems bskyed sngon 'gro bas/ /gtsug lag khang phyed zin pa na/ /lag blas dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas/ 'di la sems rab bsdus shig ces/ /lan gsum
37b5(mdo 'grel): bar du brjod par bya/ /'di nyid zas kyi gnas nyid du/ /mdzes ba'i dngos por byin gyis brlab/ /de ltar byed la sems bsdus pa'i/ /mdza' las byung bar mkhas bas gsungs/ /gtsug lag khang chen mang po dag/ sna
37b6(mdo 'grel): tshogs sgo ni tha dad na/ /gcig tu legs par bya ba ste/ /kun nas ba lang lhas bzhin no/ /gtsug lag khang rnying nyams gyur cing/ /dge slong rnams kyis bor ba na/ 'phral byung gyur la tshig gi mthar/ /gang de phyin gyis brlab
37b7(mdo 'grel): bar brjod/ /gzhan yang 'dod don gcig pa dang/ /las brjod pa ni sngon 'gro bas/ /dge 'dun mthun pas las dag gi/ cho ga zhes bya rdzogs la'o/ /de ltar zas? kyi gnas gang dag/ sdom? brtson gyis ni ma byas na/ /gang zhig bcas
38a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i zas dang ni/ /zhag lon? pa yang rung ma yin/ /sen mo ni co mi mtshon sogs/ /rnyings dang dbugs dang brdol ba dang/ /bcad dang gsheg pa'i ming can gyi/ /sa bon bcas pa'ang rung ba yin/ /rgan po'i mdun du
38a2(mdo 'grel): 'dren pa yis/ /sam prab ta zhes brjod bya ste/ /de sgra bza' dang btung ba rnams/ /shin tu ngag bar bya phyir yin/ /gnas brtan gyis kyang bden par ni/ /snoms par brams? zhes brjod par bya/ /shes bzhin ldan pas bza' 
38a3(mdo 'grel): bya zhing/ /zos nas kyang ni yon bshad bya/ /yon bshad la ni 'jug pa na/ /dge slong gang gis bzar mi rung/ /de ma thos la nyes med de/ /gzhan der ci bder? bza' bar bya/ /tshigs bcad dang po brjod pa na/ /nye bar gtad de
38a4(mdo 'grel): bsdad nas kyang/ /tshigs bcad mthar yang nyan byed na/ /de za ba la bkag pa med/ /dge 'dun gyi ni rgan po 'am/ /nus ldan gzhan gyis kyang ni brjod/ /sbyin bdag rnams kyis 'dod pa dang/ /bsam pa ji bzhin chos bstan
38a5(mdo 'grel): to/ /chos ni 'chad ba po la yang/ /nye gnas g.yog 'khor don du ni/ /dge slong rnams ni sbyin bya ste/ /gcig pu grong du mdzes ma yin/ /dga' ston dus tshe sku gzugs ni/ /rgan po'i gong du rtag tu bzhag/ ston pa dang ni
38a6(mdo 'grel): dge 'dun bcas/ /'jig rten gsum snang khyab bdag yin/ /mtshan mo sgron me med par ni/ /chos nyan pa dang bshad mi bya/ /dbyar gyis dus su rtag tu ni/ /'od khang mig brgya pa yis dgab/ khyim nas khyim du dge slong rnams/ /
38a7(mdo 'grel): dgos pas mgron du pos pa na/ /khang bzangs gzhan du nas yang ni/ /de nas de dag 'gro mi bya/ /'phags pa'i dge 'dun tshul bzhin du/ /ci bder bza' bzos nas ni/ /sbyin bdag gis ni gnang ba dang/ /'gro bar byang la nyes
38b1(mdo 'grel): pa ming?/ /sha dang nya sogs 'jig rten na/ /dam pa'i skye bos ma skad? gang/ /lhung bzed 'ongs pa de bza' ? sde/ /de 'dras lhung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig ched du byas pa'i sha/ mthong dam thos sam dogs pa ni/ /nam yang bza' bar bya min par/ /'gro
38b2(mdo 'grel): kun phan? par bzhed pas gsungs/ /rol brkam pas gsod byed pa/ /sling rnga med pa'i bsam pa spang/ /grang zhig srog gnas ched du ni/ /sha za ba la nyes pa med/ /stag gi mche bas bzung ba ni/ /mthong dam thos pa nyid na yang/ /
38b3(mdo 'grel): de ni bza' bar mi bya ste/ /de yis nam yang mi gtong phyir/ /skog skya la sogs sman rnams ni/ /nad pa dag la rjes gnang ste/ /gang phyir tshe srog de dge ba yi chos rnams kyis ni snod yin phyir/ /gang du dge slong rnams kyi dri/ ma dad ba
38b4(mdo 'grel): yi mi snom nad?/ de la nyes sbyor rnams kyis kyang/ /gnas kyi bya ba'i rgyur shes bya/ /bya ba rdzogs pa'i mthar yang ni/ /lus ni rnam par dag bya ste/ /dri ma lhag ma med pa na/ /slar yang gtsug lag khang 'jug bya/ /nub mo 'dun dang nub
38b5(mdo 'grel): mo gsum/ /de bzhin nub gcig rim bzhin du/ /sgog skya dang ni breg tsong dang/ /se'u yang ni dag par gsungs/ /bsod snyoms dag la 'jug pan/ /khang bzang sgo mang rgyu bya ste/ /zas la sogs ba'i mtshan ma ni/ /sgor yang phyir ldog
38b6(mdo 'grel): 'dod pas bzhag sgra ldan 'khar gsil khyer bya ste/ de yis sbyin bdag go bar bya khyi dang ba lang la sogs bsdigs/ /nam yang brdeg par mi bya'o/ /rtsa ba 'bras bu bza' bya dag/ dal gyi dal gyis dum bur bya/ /mnyes sam
38b7(mdo 'grel): dum bur bsil nas ni/ /grong du dge slong dul bas bza' / /mgron du bos tshe dgos med bar/ /'chol ba'i gyal gyis zas mi bza' / /dus ma yin pa'i zan dag kyang/ /sman pa la dris gnang na rung/ /mu ga'i dus na mgron gnyir ba/ /
39a1(mdo 'grel): shin tu mang yang dang du blang/ /sbyin bdag gis n gnang ba na/ bgo bsha'? yis ni yongs su spyad/ /gtso bor mgron du bos pa yis/ /phyed zos kyang ni sbyin bya ste/ /tshangs par spyod la rab mkhas des/ /nyams de bdag
39a2(mdo 'grel): yongs su bskyang/ /thub pa'i bstan pa dang phrad srogs/ /nyam gcig kyang rnyed dka' bas/ /yun rings 'tshe par 'dod pa gang/ /de dag gis byang yongs su spyad/ /gal te lhung bzed 'phan can du/ /khu tshigs dag ni mthong ba na/ /dngos po
39a3(mdo 'grel): gang gis de bas la nag lan gsum bar du bkrus te spyad/ /zos nas kha yi drim ni/ /sa dang lci ba sogs kyis skyang/ /chu khyod gsum mam lhag pas kyang/ /bkru bshal yongs su dag par bya/ /dge slong min bas reg gam zhes/ /blta
39a4(mdo 'grel): bya the tshom mang na bza' / /gzhan du reg par gyur lta na/ /slar yang sbyin len bltos pa yin/ /lam tu ? tshe lam rgyags dag/ khur byer skuAng mde pa na/ /brje ba yi ni 'du shes kyis/ /rang nyid kyis ni khung bar bya/ /brje ba gzhan dag
39a5(mdo 'grel): med pa na/ /nyis dang po zan bcad bya/ /gnyis pa la ni spad gang tsam/ /bza' yi de las lhag pa min/ /nyi ma gsum par spang ba gnyis/ /de las phar ni ci bder bya/ /rang nyid 'bad pas bsgrubs nas kyang/ /srog bsrung 'dod
39a6(mdo 'grel): pas bza' bar bya/ /sa brkos nas ni rtsa ba 'am/ /shing la 'dzegs nas 'bras bu blang/ /dge slong 'chi ba thug pa yis/ /bkres pa gsal ba'i don phyir spyad/ /bcas pa'i kha na mtho 'dir/ /gnas skabs rkyen dbang gis rjes
39a7(mdo 'grel): gnang/ /rang bzhin kha na mtho 'dir/ /tshul ldan srog la thug kyang min/ /'dod na nye du dang stan cig legs? blos bzad rlung kho na te/ /gal te lam 'jigs snod med na/ /dge tshul dang yang rung ba nyid/ /dge spyod za ba'i dus kyi tshe/ /lhung
39b1(mdo 'grel): bzed la gang g.yon pas bzung/ /? gcod la sogs byed ba'i dus/ /lag ni rtag tu dran pas bsrung/ /gang du bag med/ bdag? gis/ /zas la reg pa de gyur pa na/ /chu re gnye 'khor dong nas ni/ /bza' ba de la brtag mi dgos/ /mang dang 'bru mar
39b2(mdo 'grel): bur ma sogs/ /gzhan yang dge 'dun gyis ni rdzas/ /khyed nas dran pa brjed pa yis/ /gang lus de ni dor mi rung/ /tshogs sam gang zag gis kyang rung/ /? ba de ni yongs su blang/ /las kyi dus la phab ba na/ /legs par zos nas las
39b3(mdo 'grel): 'jug bya /bu ram 'das phye 'dres gyur na/ /gtsang ma'i chu yis yongs sbyangs nas/ /dus min par yod sbyor ba la/ /zas kyi nyes pa yod ma yin/ /thun tshong rung ba la sogs sman/ /dus su rung dang 'dres pa na/ /dus ma yin par mi
39b4(mdo 'grel): spyad cing/ /reg nas byin? len? ma byas min/ /thun tshong rung ba'ang de las gzhan/ /zhag bdun pa dang 'dres ni ?/ /thun tshong las gzhan sdom brtson gyis/ /spyad min byin len ma byas min/ /zhag bdun pa yang ji srid du/ /'tsho bar dmigs
39b5(mdo 'grel): dang 'dres ? yang/ /zhag? 'dun bar ni spyad bya ste/ /lhag par ma yin byin len bya// //? pho bzhi pa/ /dge slong gcig gis bu ram gang/ /rang gis spyod phyir byin brlabs te/ /phan tshun yid bcugs gyur pa yi/ /lnga
39b6(mdo 'grel): po rnams la rjes su gnas/ /nad pa nyid dang zan? chod dang/ /dge skos dang ni lag gi bla/ /lam du zhugs pa'o 'di lnga las/ /gzhan dag la ni rung ma yin/ /zang zing phra mo 'dres pa yis/ /bu ram chu shing mnyes nas ni/ /btsags
39b7(mdo 'grel): nas sdom brtson 'thub ba ni 'dus? min par yang rung ba'o/ /rnyed dka' i 'bras bu me tog sogs/ /yang 'phrog bza' bar bya ba gang/ /rnyed nas spang bar byas kyang ni/ /'dod na 'ga' ? bar gnang ba yin/ /bsod snyoms yang dag thob pa'i tshe/
40a1(mdo 'grel): bsod snyoms pa yi sbyod yul du/ /khyim gzhan gnas te za ba ni/ /sbyin bdag bsod nams spel phyir rung/ /slar yang za bar 'dod ltan/ /spyod yul dag nas 'ongs nas ni/ /bza' bya mu ge'i dus dag du/ /sngar blangs bsam bas rung
40a2(mdo 'grel): ba yin/ /khyim du zos pa'i lhag ma dag/ gal te sbyin bdag gis bkur na/ /sdang blangs pa yi bsam pa yis/ /nyam nga ba na de yang ngo/ /gtsug lag khang? gnas kun tu yang/ /dus gsum kun tu gtong ma sbyin/ /dus dang dus min za ba nyid//
40a3(mdo 'grel): gnod sbyin zas phyir 'dod rnams sbyin/ /bu dang bcos pa'i 'phrog ma la'ang/ /gtsug lag khang ni bsrung phyir dang/ /bstan pa yang ni phun tshogs phyir/ /bde gshegs kyis ni gtor ma gsungs/ /na sogs dus ni ma gtogs par/ /
40a4(mdo 'grel): 'dus shing za na ltung byed do/ /dge 'dun las ni gang cung zad/ /byin blangs de la ltung ba med/ /slob bur gnyug ma'i bza' ba gang/ /de yang 'dus shing za bar 'dod/ /na dang las dang lam gyi dus/ /sngar ni rab tu bstan pa nyid/ /gru dang
40a5(mdo 'grel): gru chen zhugs la sogs/ /dpag tshad phyed lam song nas ni/ /log nas gal te za byed na/ /dge slong ltung ba yod ma yin/ /gal te sbyin bdag mang po yis/ /dge slong rnams la so sor gnang/ /sbyin bdag dag gi nus pa'i dod/ /
40a6(mdo 'grel): sbyin ba'i dus ni lnga pa'o/ /mu stegs dge sbyong gis zhus nas/ /sbyin bdag de yis gal te 'dren/ /de dag dad pa khyad par du/ spel phyir bza' bar bya ba nyid/ /mtshams nang der 'du shes pa 'am/ /the tshom gyis kyang ltung byed yin/ /
40a7(mdo 'grel): gsum po la ni nyes med do/ /so sor ma 'dus 'dug la sogs/ /so sor nges pas thob pa dang/ /gtsug lag khang du tha dang za/ /sbyin bdag rnams kyi 'dod pa'i dor/ /bkag pa yod pa ma yin no/ /nyi ma phyed kyi dus nas phar/ /
40b1(mdo 'grel): phyi ma'i sgya rangs ma shar bar/ /dge slong bza' ba za byed na/ /ltung byed 'khor las rnam par 'joms/ /bza' ba la sogs dge slong gis/ /gsog 'jog byas ba zos na ltung/ /snga phyi gnyis su spyod ba yis/ /de ni rnam pa gnyis su gsungs/ /sder
40b2(mdo 'grel): spyod byin len byas pa ni/ /phyi dro spyod ba bkag ba yin/ /phyi dro byin len byas pa ni/ /thun tshong 'das pa rung ma yin/ /chos gos lde mig kyog bo dang/ /lhung bzed lhung bzed dman ba la'ang/ /lag ? 'bags pas mi reg ste/ /
40b3(mdo 'grel): tshul de'ang rkyen dbang ma gtogs so/ /sdom brtson gang zhig bza' ba sogs/ /byin len ma byas za byed na/ /de yang bslab ba zad byed de/ /chu dang so shing ma gtogs so/ /yang zhig ma tshos tshos pa 'dra/ /bsod snyoms pa yis rnyed pa
40b4(mdo 'grel): na/ /sra ba nyid ni sum cha bangs/ /tshos la byin len byas ba rung/ /nya dang sha dang 'bras bu sogs/ /kha dog yongs su gyur ba na/ /pa'o la sogs lan gsum khol/ /byin len bya bar rung ba nyid/ /de gnas byin len mi bya ste/ /nyam
40b5(mdo 'grel): da'i dus na bkag pa med/ /'dab ma can dang so shing dag/ 'o ma can ni yongs su sbang/ /dge slong rnams la sbyin pa dag las/ /bza' ba gal te bor na ni/ /sgra mi snyan pa'i dbang byas nas/ /dus yol nas ni bza' bar bya/ /mgul
40b6(mdo 'grel): du ming ba ma yin na/ /'di la byin len mi bya zhing/ /ji srid 'tshol par bsgrub ba ni/ /byin rlabs ma byas mi bcang ngo/ /tshang ni sog par mi nus pa/ /spang ma 'am ti ti ka la sogs/ /de ni dor nas spyad bya ste/ /byi ba sogs kyis nges par
40b7(mdo 'grel): 'jig/ lag pa yis ni lag ba dang/ /de dang 'brel ba des byin dang/ /lag pa de dang 'brel pa yis/ /de dang 'brel ba dag du yang/ /byin len bya'o mi bden/ /rgyang ring na yang rung ba nyid/ /'di la cad shes glang po dang/ /spre'u yis kyang byin len 
41a1(mdo 'grel): byin len rung/ /mar dang 'o ma nyid dang zho/ /sha dang nya sogs bdag nyid kyi/ /don du dge slong bder gnas pas/ /blang bar bya ba min ba ste/ /nad bas ston mo'i dus su ni/ /slong bar byed la ltung ba med/ /men ba yis slong ba na/ /nyes byas
41a2(mdo 'grel): zos na ltung byed yin/ /bsod snyoms dag la rgyu ba na/ /kha rog 'dug ste spyod yul du/ /ci sbyin zhes ni 'dri ba la/ /ji ltar 'dod ba blang bar bya/ /srog chags bcas ba'i chu rnams la/ /phyi rol khrus la sogs sbyod dang/ /nang du 'zung bar brjod ba
41a3(mdo 'grel): yis/ /longs spyod nam yang bkag pa yin/ /'dir ni ltung byed ltung ba yin/ /gzhan la ni yongs su btsag? pa'o/ /rtsa sogs dag la 'debs pa rnams/ /gang 'dir slar yang ma dri pha so/ /longs spyod bcas pa'i khyim gang zhig/
41a4(mdo 'grel): skyabs bcas par ni 'dug pa dang/ /'greng ba gnas skabs dge slong ni/ /rkyen dbang las gzhan ltung ba yin/ /gang du skyes ba bud med bcas/ /chags ldan 'dod ba sbyod gyur ba/ /bud med skyes bas longs spyod las/ /de ni longs
41a5(mdo 'grel): spyod? ces byar bstan/ /mu stegs rnams la rang nyid kyi/ /lag gi bza' sogs mi sbyin te/ /lta las slar ldog don du ni/ /.dum bur byas te rjes su gnang/ /snod ni sa la bzhag pa la/ /snying rje ldan pas sbyin bya ste/ /de ni rjes su bzung
41a6(mdo 'grel): phyir yin/ /nam yang gus phyir ma yin no/ /'thab du chas pa'i dmag pa sogs la/ /nam yang lta phyir mi 'gro ste/ /de lta bu yi rkyen dag gis/ /gyur ba la ni bkag pa med/ /gal te dgos pas song yang de/ /nub gnyis las ni phar mi
41a7(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /yun rings dus su nang du ni/ /gnas na'ang gang zhig 'jigs pas sam/ /rgyal bo 'am ni blon po sogs/ /mdza' bshes tshig gis kyang rung ste/ /gnas ba na yang chog ni/ /rta dang glang sogs phyed mi blta/ /dmag tshogs rnams
41b1(mdo 'grel): kyi bkod pa dang/ /dpung dang rgyan mtshan mchog gi yang/ /rgyal po dang ni blon po yis/ /bshams pa dkrug par mi bya'o/ /de la dbung mchog gang du dpung/ /de yi bkod pa spras la bya/ /gang du gnas pa'i rgyal mtshan mchog/ de ni rgyal mtshan mchog
41b2(mdo 'grel): ces bya/ /khros ba'i sems kyi dge slong la/ /sdom brtson brdag par byed mi rung/ /'dren pas bla ma'i dbang byas nas/ /brdeg par bzas pa'ang de bzhin bkag/ 'dir ni ser mo gcig gis kyang/ /brdeg par byed na'ang par 'dod/ /mgo
41b3(mdo 'grel): bo ku chur rkang dang lag/ rda dbyug pod ba sogs brdeg ltud/ /phyag ma la sogs kyis brdeg na/ /de yi nyag ma ji snyed pa/ /de snyed lus la reg pa'i grangs/ /sdom brtson dag la ltung byed gsungs/ /de bzhin sran ljang drung sogs kyis/ /
41b4(mdo 'grel): brdag na'ang ltung byed kho nar brjod/ /de ni lus la ma phog par/ /'phangs pa yang ni nyes byas nyid/ /ma rungs gdul phyir ltung med de/ /gzhan par sdags grub mthu ldan gyi/ /dge slong dag gis brdeg pa dang/ /gzas pa'ang lhung bar mi
41b5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /dge slong rnams kyi gnas ngan len/ /shes nas 'chab pa yang bkag ste/ /'jigs pas ma gtogs 'jigs gyur na/ /gnas ngan len ni bca' bya nyid/ /phas pham pa nyid gtsor byas nas/ /ji snyed ltung bar brjod pa
41b6(mdo 'grel): dag/? de snyed bslabs pa'i gzhi 'di la/ /mkhas pas gnas ngan len ces gsungs/ /nad pa ma yin dge slong la/ /nyon mongs bcas pa'i sems kyis der/ /nam yang zan gcad mi bya'o/ /ji ste byed na zad byed lhung/ /dus ma gtogs
41b7(mdo 'grel): bar me dag gis/ /nye bar sbor byed smad bar gsungs/ /me gsod ba dang bsro bdag/ nyam da'i dus na nyes ba med/ /skra sen spu dang dar snabs dang/ /mchil ma lung pa 'jug pa dang/ /ma lce me mar mur la reg/ nyes byas 'gyur ro
42a1(mdo 'grel): dus ma gtogs/ /dkon mchog gsum dang pha ma dang/ /tshangs bar mtshungs sbyod bla ma dang/ /chos kyi don du nyes med de/ /reg pa'i dus su brjod pa yin/ /'dun pa dbul zhes smras nas ni/ /dge 'dun las ni nye ba
42a2(mdo 'grel): na/ /sdom brtson slar yang mi dbul na/ /de ni ltung bas 'joms pa yin/ /bsnyen par ma rdzogs gang zag dang/ /nub gnyis lhan cig nyal rung ste /de las phar ni nub gsum sogs/ /ma yin gal te nyal na ltung/ /'thams cad g.yogs
42a3(mdo 'grel): shing thams cad bskor/ /gnas khang bskor zhing g.yogs pa bzhin/ /phal cher g.yogs shing kun nas bskor/ /ngos bzhi pa yi khyams bzhin brtag/ thams cad g.yogs shing phal cher bskor/ /ngos gsum pa yi khyams
42a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin te/ /phal cher g.yogs pa'i khang pa dang/ /khad bzang bzhin te rim bzhin no/ /de ltar khyim ni bzhi bo ru/ /sdom brtson lhan cig nyal byed na/ /nyi ma gsum pa'i skya red 'ong/ /'char tshe
42a5(mdo 'grel): gsal bor lrung ba yin/ /sngo dang ser dang dmar po ste/ /skya rang rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /sngon po nyid tshe'ang ltung 'gyur na/ /gzhan dag tshan smos ci dgos/ /gang du sgra don so sor go/ khyams dang khang bzangs sogs pa/ /de 'dra ded yang
42a6(mdo 'grel): sdom brtson ni/ /nyal du rung ba ma yin no/ /gnang ba dang bcas gnas su ni/ /nang pa dag la rjes gnang ste/ /de yi nang g.yog dag kyung ngo/ /de las gzhan gyis nam yang min/ /stobs chung min na pa la ni /nyin mo nyal ba bkag ba
42a7(mdo 'grel): yin/ /bsam gtan klog dang ldan pa la/ yud tsam rjes su gnang ba yin/ /gnyis sam gsum po dag gis kyang/ /khri gcig la ni nyal mi bya/ /rgya chen yin na gos sogs kyis/ /bar chad nyal ba rjes su gnang/ /mun khung dag tu
42b1(mdo 'grel): sa la mgo/ gtugs nas bla mar phyag mi bya/ /der ni tshig gi bya ba 'am/ /yid kyis des par phyag bya'o/ /dge tshul dang ni lhan cig tu/ /lam du nyal tshe gnyid mi log/ mi nus ldang blos skyil grung dag/ bcings te cung zad gnyid log rung/ /ma
42b2(mdo 'grel): nus ba na nyes pa med/ /thams cad du ni 'bad pa yis/ /dge tshul dag ni brkyang bar bya/ /sangs rgyas ljon shing myur gu ste/ /de ni dgra bcom sgo nga yin/ /dge slong blo gros dman gang dang/ /dge tshul gang yang 'ang skad chos/ /'dod pas bar du
42b3(mdo 'grel): gnos bstan mod/ /bar du gcod pa min ? na/ /de 'dir lan gsum par bzlog ste/ /'on kyang lha te mi gtong na/ /'dil las lhag sdig yod min pas/ /de yang rgyang ring spar bar bya/ /nyams pa de dang smra ba dang/ /nam yang yang dag smra mi
42b4(mdo 'grel): bya/ /gnas dang longs spyod la sogs kyang/ /mi bya gal te byed na ltung/ /yang dag smra ba la ton yin/ /smra ba klog pa yin par 'dod/ /gnas pa 'dug pa gcig tu ste/ /longs spyod chos dang zang zing ngo/ /lta ba bzlog pa'i ched du 'am/ /
42b5(mdo 'grel): nyi duAm nad pa yin na ni/ /smra la sogs pa rjes su gnang/ /longs spyod nam yang ma yin no/ /chos gos gsar ba rnyed pa na/ /kha dog ngan par byas te bcad/ /de yang dkar po gsar bar dgongs/ /kha dog ngan pa rnam pa gsum/ /rang bzhin
42b6(mdo 'grel): dang ni bcos ma yin/ /sngon po dang ni gcig? tu grags/ /me tog 'bras bu 'dab ma dang/ /shun pa'i khu ba dur smrig 'dod/ /mdog bzang gzhan ni ma yin no/ /drag po sbrul gdug reg ba yi/ /dug la rtag tu reg bla yi/ /rin po che la dge
42b7(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ /rin chen smos ba de lta min/ /nor bu mu tig byu ru sogs/ /rin chen de ru smos pa yang/ /g.yul 'gyed yan lag mtshon sogs dang/ /rol mo'i yan lag rnga zlum sogs/ /gtsug lag khang dang skyed mas tshal/ /thams cad nang
43a1(mdo 'grel): gar brjod ba yin/ /nad ma yin par slar yang ni/ /phyi rol nye 'khor yin par gsungs/ /phug pa'i nor bu mu tig sogs/ /reg pa la mi ltung byed de/ /ma phug pa la reg pa dang/ /'ching bu dag la nyes byas nyid/ /pi wa da
43a2(mdo 'grel): gling bu rda zlum sogs/ /mtshon cha mda' dang gzhu sogs kyang/ /yan lag tshang dang ma tshang la/ /dge ba ltung byed nyes byas yin/ /gzhan 'dir go cha la sogs la/ /dge slong reg na nyes bya yin/ /mda' dang gzhu sogs chas pa yi/ /
43a3(mdo 'grel): mtshon cha la reg smos ci dgos/ /sku gdung dang bcas mchod rten dang/ /sku gzugs la reg ltung byed de/ /sku gdung med la gang reg pa/ /de la nyes byas mda' yis reg/ gang dang rol mo glu sogs dag/ mig dang sna ba'i
43a4(mdo 'grel): yul du bkag/ 'thab mo bre mo gtam sogs kyis/ /nyes zhi mi byed 'ba' zhig zad/ /gang dang glu sogs chags pa yis/ /gang zhig mchod rten phyag byed na/ /der 'gro gom pa re rer yang/ /nyes byas phung po re re sogs/ /de phyir
43a5(mdo 'grel): ? pa zad 'dod pa'i/ /dge slong rnams kyis gzugs sdug dang/ /skra snyan la sogs chags pa yi/ /sems su nam yang mi bya'o/ /sa la sbram sogs smos pa gang/ /skyed tshal khang du rnyed pa na/ /rtswa sogs dag gis bkab nas ni/ /
43a6(mdo 'grel): zhag brgyad bar du bsrung bar bya/ /su dag don gnyer byung na de'i/ /mtshan ma dris nas ? par bya/ /med na dge 'dun nang nyid du/ /zla ba drug tu brtag phyir bzhag/ gzhan gyis kha dog mtshan ma dang/ /khyad par rtags kyis mtshon na sbyin/ /
43a7(mdo 'grel): min na dge 'dun longs spyod phyir/ /de ni brtan ba'i dngos por bya/ /gal te snod du byas nas kyang/ /de thos blo chung slong byed na/ /de la de ni rim gyis sam/ /sbyin bya bskyed ni nam yang min/ /sdom brtson zla phyed nang rol tu/ /dus ma
43b1(mdo 'grel): gtogs par khrus byed bkag/ na dang las dang lam dang rlung/ /char dang de dag tshogs skyon med/ /na ba'i dus ni gang du de/ /khrus byas sos par gyur na'o/ /las lam dus ni sngar bshad bzhin/ /rlung du grags ba'i dus bstan pa/ /gang du chos gros
43b2(mdo 'grel): rne'u ni/ /rlung gis bzlog par byed ba'o/ /lus la char thigs gnyis phog pa/ /char pa'i dus su grags pa yin/ /rlung dang char pa 'dres pa ni/ /de dag tshogs pa'i dus zhes bstan/ /gzhan yang tsha ba'i dus zhes pa/ /zla ba phyed dang gsum pa'o//
43b3(mdo 'grel): chos gos ma lus bzhag nas khrus/ /byed 'dod lte bar ma sleb byas/ /nyes byas lte ba nub par ni/ /khrus byed de ni nyes par zad/ /chu bo pha rol brgal ba dang/ /brgyal ba sogs la 'debs byed rung/ /'ba' zhig tu yang chu klung dag/ zab
43b4(mdo 'grel): mo brgal la nyes pa med/ /dge slong grung zhugs pha rol tu/ /chu bo dag la 'gro ba'am/ /gzhan du rgya mtsho la yang rung/ /bshang gci sogs byed bgag pa med/ /'jug dogs gang du bud med dam/ /rgyal po 'am ni de yi dmag/ skyes
43b5(mdo 'grel): bu g.yon can khrus byed ba/ /de ni rgyang rings spang bar bya/ /'og tu gting ring byi 'jul lam/ /yang na steng du nya brgal lam/ /chu la rkyal ba la sogs kyang/ /rtsed mo'idon du mi bya'o/ /gal te rgyal ni slob pa 'am/ /nang dang bral bar 'dod pa yis
43b6(mdo 'grel): shin tu dben pa'i gnas su ni/ /rgyal la sogs pa kun tu spyad/ /shes bzhin rang dam gzhan gyis kyang/ /sdom brtson dud 'gro'i skye gnas gang/ /gsong na lhung byed me lce yis/ /dge pa'i sdug bsngal nyams myong 'gyur/ shes bzhin
43b7(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs se nas/ kyis ni/ /tshangs spyod dang ni bcas rnams la/ /'gyod pa skyad byed des bkag ste/ /byed na ltung byed gzhan du min/ /khyod lo nyi shu ma lon na/ /khyod kyis bsnyen rdzogs gang na ste/ /mkhan po'ang tshul khrims 'chal pa
44a1(mdo 'grel): yin/ /de ni mtshams kyi phyi rol yin/ /'gyod pa bskyed pa'i don du ni/ /de la sogs pa smra byed na/ /de la ltung byed bden pa yi/ /skyon 'gyur brjod na nyes pa med/ /blo chung ser mo gcig gis kyang/ /dge slong rtse phyir
44a2(mdo 'grel): g.ya' sgog na/ /ltung byed rme ba nag po dag/ ston pa la ni nyes pa med/ /dga' g.yengs chu la rtsed mo dag/ byed na zad ltung 'gyur ba yin/ /de yang tshu rol tu/ /phar brgal tshar brgal byed sogs so/ /ma bsrungs bud
44a3(mdo 'grel): med lhan cig tu/ /gal te nang dam phyi rol du/ /dge slong nyal du mi rung ste/ /sgo bcings pa la nyes pa med/ /'dir ni legs dang nyes smras don/ /gang zhig so sor rtogs dang ldan/ /mi mod ni bud med ces/ /shes rab ldan pas
44a4(mdo 'grel): yang dag gsungs/ /thams cad g.yogs dang yongs bskor zhes/ /bya ba 'di yang snga ma bzhin/ /nyal bar brjod pa gang yin pa/ /glo ni sa la phab pa'o/ /sdom brtson gnyid kyis non dus su/ /rig pa'i rlung gis spar ba yis/ /ltung
44a5(mdo 'grel): byed me ni gang yin pas/ /kun nas sreg par byed pa yin/ /gnas khang sogs su bud med dag/ gang na yod ba'i skas sogs brtul / /srung byed bzhag nas dge slong ni/ /nyal ba la ni smad pa med/ /khyad par nyin mnyal ba yi/ /chog yang
44a6(mdo 'grel): ni 'di yin te/ /mdud pa bor nas rjes su gnang/ /gzhan du nyes byas 'gyur ba yin/ /dge slong rang dam gzhan gyis kyang/ /dge slong sdongs par byed pa bkag/ sems can kun la mi 'jigs mdzad/ /bla ma sangs rgyas la dmigs nas/ /sha
44a7(mdo 'grel): za gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i/ /sdig can gzugs ni gzung nas kyang/ /de yi gzugs sgra dri rnams kyis/ /sdangs par byed la zang byed ltung/ /gya nom lha dang dri za dang/ /bram ze la sogs 'jigs pa yi/ /bzung nas khyod ni bsad ces
44b1(mdo 'grel): brjod/ /gal te brda phrad nyes byas yin/ /phan par 'dod pas mi bzad pa'i/ /sdug bsngal ltung ba'i 'jigs bskyed phyir/ /dmyal ba yi dwags dud 'gro'i gzugs/ /gal te 'jigs sten nyes ba med/ /dge slong gzhan gyi lhung bzed sogs/ /yo byed pa ngos po nam
44b2(mdo 'grel): du yang/ /bzhad gang kyi ni dbang byas nas/ /dge slong gis ni sbed pa bkag/ dge slong chos gos byin pa la/ /gded med par ni yongs spyod na/ /ltung byed gal te mdza' bro 'am/ /mchod 'os bla mas nyes pa med/ /sdom brtson dge 'dun lhag ma yis/ /dag
44b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i dge slong skur 'debs na/ /ltung byed nyid du des bstan te/ /phyi ma rnams kyis nyes byas so/ /lam du skyes pa med par ni/ /bud med dang ni mi 'grogs te/ /'grogs na de yi spyi bor ni/ /ltung byed gnam lcags 'bab par 'gyur/ /grong der sdom
44b4(mdo 'grel): brtson nam son dus/ /nges par ltung byed nyid 'gyur te/ /grong gi lam phyed phyin pa na/ /nyes byas tsam du brjod pa yin/ /rang nyid snga phyi byas nas ni/ /lam mi shes pa bstan par bya/ /nyam da'i lam du bud med dag/ khrid na ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /
44b5(mdo 'grel): gang zhig rkun ma'i grogs dang 'grogs/ /de la'ang ltung byed kyis reg 'gyur/ /'di la yang ni nyes med de/ /gal te sngar bzhin song na'o/ /tshod pa'i sho gam la sogs pa/ /'phrog pa byed de rkun mar 'dod/ /grong dang lam la sogs pa dag/ gang
44b6(mdo 'grel): 'joms drag pa smos mi dgos/ /lo ni nyi shu ma len 'di/ /gang phyir bkres skom la sogs gnod/ /mi bzod mi brtan lus blo'i phyir/ /bsnyen par rdzogs par mi byar brjod/ /mtshar lo la der shes bzhin/ /gang zhig smra yang bsnyen rdzogs
44b7(mdo 'grel): na/ rdzogs byed de dag zad par ldan/ /the tshom gyis kyang ltung bar brjod/ /gang zhig mtshang tshang ba'i blos/ /lo ni tshang bar smra ba la/ /rdzogs byas ltung ba yod pa yin/ /tshang la tshang bar 'du shes gang/ /tshang ba nyid smra dag kyang ste/ /the tshom gyis kyang smra ba/
45a1(mdo 'grel): la/ /de la ltung ba med pa nyid/ /de ltar 'dir ni phyogs tsam zhig/ mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin/ /brtul zhugs dang bcas blo ldan rnams/ /shin tu nges dang bcas par bya/ /dge slong gis ni shes bzhin du/ /sa mi brko bo brkor mi
45a2(mdo 'grel): gzhug so phag 'ba' zhig pa dag dang/ /kun nas bye na yin nyes med/ / /skyed byed skyed byed ma yin pa'i/ /sa ni rnam pa gnyis su grags/ /char 'bab rjes su gyur ba la/ /zla ba drug gi skye ba ste/ /skyed byed la ni 'dir nges yin/ /sa mad bye ma nyung na
45a3(mdo 'grel): lhung/ /nyes byas 'gyur ro bye ma dang/ /gseg ma dang ni rdo ba dag lhag par bcas la mi skye'i phyig/ /lhung byed dang ni nyes byas su/ /'dul ba'i de nyid rig bas bshad/ /sa gzhi dang ni rtsig ngos la/ /phur pa brdeg na ltung byed yin no/ /de nyid
45a4(mdo 'grel): 'don dang bzhon pa'am/ /'dam bskyod pa la nyes byas so/ /rtsig pa 'am de bzhin zhal zhal lam/ /chu dogs rti ba na zad ltung 'gyur/ /chad pa 'am ni gas pa la'ang/ /rko bar byed na nyes byas 'dod/ /chu 'gram 'dam ni bskyod pa la/ /'gro bar
45a5(mdo 'grel): 'dod pas nyes pa med/ /rtsas kyi don du ri mo yang/ /sa 'am rtsig ngos 'dri ba dang/ /skyed mos tshal sogs rgyu ba na/ /'jigs min dus su rung ba nyid/ /dbyar gyi zla ba bzhi las ni/ /mgron du pos pa kha mi slad/ /yang yang rtag tu ba dang
45a6(mdo 'grel): dus/ /so sor mgron du pos ma gtogs/ /rtag tu mgron pos gang yin pa/ /gang du rtag pa nyid du 'bod/ /so sor mgron du bos pa ni/ /so so tha dad nyid la brjod/ /dus ni ji srid 'dod pa des/ /yang yang zhes brjod yang yang dad/ /mgron
45a7(mdo 'grel): pos 'di dag ma gtogs pa/ /gsal por ltung byed nyid du brjod/ /gya nom ba la gos bzhin du/ /sdom brtson dman pa slong ba na/ /slong ba'i tshe na nyes byas te/ /de longs spyod na'ang nyes byas so/ /dman pa la ni pos pa na/ /bzang po slong ba dus
45b1(mdo 'grel): ji srid/ /nyes byas longs spyod pa la ni/ /zad byed ltung bar brjod pa yin/ /'o ma la pos sha dang zho/ /yang na 'o ma la ni mar/ /slong ba'i tshe na nyes byas te/ /zos na nad pa ma gtogs ltung/ /dad ldan yo byad phun tshogs shing/ /sbyin phyir gtong la 'jigs
45b2(mdo 'grel): med ba/ /de ni yun rings bsod nams phyir/ /dang du len pa bkag pa med/ /gang tshe bslab pa 'di la khyod/ /bslab par bya zhes dge slong gis/ /rab bskul de tshe lan du gang/ /de la byis pa sogs brjod smod/ /blo chung de ni ltung byed kyi/ /dbyung/
45b3(mdo 'grel): pas phog nas nges par 'gyel/ /'jigs ltung 'bar ba'i sgo nas ni/ /dmyal ba'i me yis g.yengs par 'gyur/ /byis pa zhes bya ngan sems can/ /rmongs pa mod sogs mi mkhas pa/ /mi gsal 'dul ba'i tshig la ste/ /mi mkhas de yi
45b4(mdo 'grel): don la'o/ /byis pa rmongs sogs tshig las ni/ /re re yis kyang bzlog pa na/ /dmyal ba'i mer ni 'jug byed pa'i/ /ltung byed kyis ni dge slong ltung/ /de yisi de tshig bzung nas ni/ /mkhas pa dag la dri bar bya/ /mkhas pa'i tshig gis bya ba ste/ /
45b5(mdo 'grel): long pa rnams kyis tshad ma de/ /yang na rdzun pa nyid du ni/ /byis pa la sogs tshig gis kyang/ /mkhas pa min yang bsgo pa na/ /bden don smra na nyes pa med/ /phan+t sun mi mthun dge slong gang/ /glags skabs tshol zhing co 'dri na/ /kha rog nyan nas
45b6(mdo 'grel): 'dug na ni/ /de yang ltung byed yang dag gnas/ /gnas khang la sogs gsang gtam dag/ byed tshe sgra brda ma byas bar/ /zhugs pas sgra don gtso bo ni/ /ma thos sgra nyan nyes byas 'gyur/ /de ltar khang bzang skas dang sgo/ /lam du 'jug che
45b7(mdo 'grel): tshul ldan la/ /ltung byed sngar bshad ji bzhin te/ /zhi bar bya phyir nyes pa med/ /gsol ba'i las la sogs pa yi/ /chos ni gtan la 'bebs pa'i gtam/ /byed cho gzhan lam smras par/ /sdom brtson de bor 'gro mi bya/ /las kyi ge? gsu
46a1(mdo 'grel): ma gyur tam/ /ces bsams rab tu bsgo bar bya/ /de ltar mi byed dge slong ni/ /myur du ltung ba byed rgya mtshor ltung/ /ma gus pa la ltung byed de/ /dge 'dun dang ni gang zag gnyis/ /dge 'dun la ni ltun byed brjod/ /gang zag dag
46a2(mdo 'grel): la nyes byas so/ /dge 'dun nang na dge sgos kyi/ /chog ni rab tu bzlog pa yang/ /ltung byed bla ma'i dge 'dun dang/ /rgan po gang zag gzhan la min/ /don med pa yi chag la ni/ /rigs bas bshad kyis sbyod ba yis/ /zlog byed smra ba po la
46a3(mdo 'grel): 'dor/ /ltung ba med bar gsungs ba yin/ /'bruAm bcos ba'i chang dag ni/ /ku sha'i rtse mo tsam yang spang/ /'di dag 'thung dam ster/ /yang/ /gnyis ka bag med khang chen yin/ /kha yi nang la bur phag tu/ /bsrel btsam la nyes ba med//
46a4(mdo 'grel): sman pa'i dag gi 'thung bar ni/ /srog la bab kyang 'dod mi bya/ /phabs dang 'bras phye zan gyis tshogs/ /rnam 'gyur bye brag las skyes ba/ /'jig rten btung ba'i khyad par gang/ /de ni 'bru yi chad zhes bya/ /sdong bu me tog 'bras rnams
46a5(mdo 'grel): kyi/ /khu ba rnams ni yongs gyur ba/ /bcos ba'i tshad du des bstan te/ /sbrang rtsi rgun sogs las byung ba'o/ /gang tshem red nyams pa yis/ /myos byed nus pa zad ba na/ /chang gi rgyu mtshan spangs ba'i phyir/ /'thungs kyang de tshe nyes pa med
46a6(mdo 'grel): su? lu ka dang zho ba chu/ /sug ta skyer bo btsags nas ni/ /hu bsres ltung ba'i don du ni/ /dus min par yang bkag pa med/ /'bru chang skyar bor gang gyur ba/ /su lu kar ni yongs su grogs/ /bcos chad skyur bor gang gyur ba/ /sug ta zhes
46a7(mdo 'grel): byar brjod pa'o/ /? ta ba sogs bkag pa'i phyir/ /'bru chad bcos pa 'ang zhes smos/ /ma rede nyams la chang gi ni/ /dngos po bsog phyir myos 'gyur smos/ /chang gi mdog dang de bzhin dri/ /ro dang myang bdag gis kyang/ /gal tre myos?
46b1(mdo 'grel): zad chad gi ni/ /dngos med nyes byas gzhir 'dod do/ /de ltar kha dog la sogs pa/ /gsum gnyis gcig 'thung myos nas zad/ /gsum gnyis de bzhin gcig bu la/ /myos ba'i nus med nyes byas rnams/ /rtsa ba sdong bu me tog 'bras/ /'das ma yang ni
46b2(mdo 'grel): myos byed dang/ /phabs dang zan chab bsres ba dag/ zos na 'gal tshangs can du 'gyur/ /sdom brtson grogs yod ma smras par sdom gnas dus min grong 'jug na/ /de 'dra'i rkyen la nyes pa med/ /gzhan du zad ba thob bar 'gyur/ /nyi ma phyed kyi mtshams
46b3(mdo 'grel): gnas par/ /phyi mi skya rang ma shar par/ /dus ma min zhes 'dod pa ste/ /dus dang dus min mkhas pas so/ /dge slong dus min 'jug byed cing/ /dus min dus su 'du shes dang/ /the tshom gyis kyang rnam par 'joms/ /dus la dus min 'du shes dang/ /the tshom
46b4(mdo 'grel): zan nyes byas yin/ /khyim bas khyim du dge slong rnams/ /gang phyir mgron du bas pa na/ /nan yang khyim gzhan dag du ni/ /de ni de ltar 'gro mi bya/ /'phags pa'i tshigs la ci bder ni/ /bden pas gdugs tshod gsol smras nas/ /sbyin bdag gis kyang
46b5(mdo 'grel): gnang na dang/ /song ba la yang nyes ba med/ /gang zhig rgyal po'i sgo gtan nam/ /de yi nye 'khor nyid dang yang/ /skya rengs tha ma ma shar 'das/ /bder gnas de yang sdig byed yin/ /grong khyer rgyal ba'i pho brang dang/ /gsum pa btsun mo'i 'khor dag gi/
46b6(mdo 'grel): sgo gtan de dang nya ba na/ /nye 'khor zhes ni brjod ba yin/ /dge slong nam ni ma langs bar/ /ma langs pa yi 'du shes kyis/ /grong khyer sgo gtan 'das ba la/ /sdom brtson nyes byas bskyed bar 'gyur/ /mi yi bdag bo'i sgo 'am ni/ /btsun mo'i 'khor
46b7(mdo 'grel): du 'das pa la/ /ma langs de ru 'dud shes sam/ /the tshom gyis kyang zang ltung reg/ cig shos dag tu 'du shes pas/ /thams cad la ni nyes byas so/ /rin chen ma bsdus zhes bya ni/ /sba btul ma byas pa la brjod zla ba ba phyed phyed yang dang yang/ /so
47a1(mdo 'grel): sor thar ba thos nas kyang/ /'di dag mdor ni gtogs ba dang/ /chos su rang byung gis bstan pa/ /ji bzhin rnam bzhag de byas dag/ ma lus bdag gis da gdod shes/ /de ltar go byed tshul 'chos can/ /sdom brtson de ni ltung byed 'dod/ /rus pa
47a2(mdo 'grel): ? so dra yin/ /rang bzhin khyab ral gang zhig byed/ /blo dan de 'dir ltung byed kyi/ /chu srin kha du ltung 'dod yin/ /de yis khab ral bcas nas ni/ /ltung ba de ni bshags bya ste/ /rigs pa'i khab ral byed de la/ /bya ba'i chog 'di yin te/ /spu gu dang ni
47a3(mdo 'grel): chang ba yi/ /rnam pa de dang 'tsham pa'i tsh+d/ /lab dang gri gu yang dge ldan/ /de las gzhan du nam yang min/ /khab kyang zangs ma 'khar ba dang/ /ra gcu lcags dang rnam pa bzhi/ /gri gu lcags nyid kho nang gsungs/ /de la rab 'bring tha mar 'dod/ /rab
47a4(mdo 'grel): chad sor ni brgyad shes te/ /tha ma yang ni sor bzhi yin/ /bya gag gshog pa'i rnam pa ni/ /gri gu'i dbyibs su bya ba yin/ /gang tsha grong gzhan 'gro ba na/ /dge slong rings bar gyur kyang der/ /khab kyi bslab bya bsrung ba'i phyir// cig tsam nges par
47a5(mdo 'grel): khyed bar bya/ /dge 'dun khri dang khri'u sogs/ /byed na bder gshegs sar gyis ni/ /rkang ba la ni sor brgyad bya/ /lhag bar dge slong mi bya'o/ /bde bar gshegs ba'i sor brgyad la/ /khru gang tshad du 'dod pa yin/ /de las lhag pa dge slong gis
47a6(mdo 'grel): bcad nas ltung ba so sor bshags/ /tho 'tsham don du dge slong gis/ /dge 'dun mal stan la sogs la/ /shing bal la sogs bdal mi bya/ /bdal na de zad ltung bar 'gyur/ /ras bal lug bal ka sha dang/ /shal ma la yi bal yang ste//
47a7(mdo 'grel): dngos po de ni bsdus nas su/ /ltung ba bshags par bya ba yin/ /steng du 'grems par byed ba gang/ /de 'dir bdal bar shes par bya/ /gang dang 'brel bas dge slong gi/ gos dag mdzes par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /srid du bde bar gshegs pa yi/ /
47b1(mdo 'grel): mtho gsum de las lhag par min/ /zheng du phyed dang gnyis yod de/ /brtul zhugs can gyi gding ba bya/ /ltag ba bcad nas ltung ba ni/ /gang la bshegs par byed pa na/ /tshul ldan des kyang khyod kyi 'di/ /bcad dam zhes ni dri bar bya/ /'di nyid dbang byas bzhi dang
47b2(mdo 'grel): gnyis/ /mchu dang zhing du bsdags ba ste/ /dge slong g.yan pa dgab pa ni/ /de las lhag na lhung byed de/ /dbyar gos ras chen zhes bya ba/ /srid du drug yin shes par bya /rgyar ni phyed dang gsum yin te/ /gang phyir ston ba'i mtho yi'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i
47b3(mdo 'grel): chos gos kyi/ /tshad du chos gos mi bya ste/ /mnyam pa 'am ni lhag bar yang/ /de la mtho ni bcu dang drug/ bslab pa nyams byed byi pa gang/ /mi zad ngan song gsum dag tu/ des ltung 'jigs brgya bskyed pas na/ /de phyir ltung byed ces bya'o/ /ltung
47b4(mdo 'grel): byed yang dag bshad nas kyang/ /de yis nas thogs brjod par bya/ /rang gi mtshan nyid dbye ba yis/ /so sor bshags ba rnam pa bzhi/ /sdom brtson rang gi spyod yul du/ /nye du ma yin dge slong ma/ /de las bsod snyoms blangs nas ni/ /zes na so s r
47b5(mdo 'grel): bshags pa yin/ /khyim gang dag du dge slong rnams/ /gsol tshe dge slong ma gang zhig/ 'di la mar sbyin 'di dag la/ /zas sogs byin zhes gal te smra/ /dge slong rnams ni zan za'i bar/ /srid mo ma smra zhes ni bzlog de las gcig kyang mi smra
