47b6(mdo 'grel): na/ kun la so sor bshags ba yin/ /nang dang bar dang phyi gnas ni/ /sum char bdugs tshong gsal rnams te/ /dge 'dun gyis ni gnas brtan nam/ /yang na gsar bu kun gyis brjod/ /dge slong rnams ni gsal gyi bar/ /'di ni ma sma 'dug ces so/
47b7(mdo 'grel): dge slong ma lam bzlog gam/ /zhes ni phyi rol gang pa dri/ /bar nas za ba rnams kyis ni/ /ma dris zos na ltung ba yin/ /phyi rol ba la nyes byas te/ /gal te gcig kyang mi smra na/ /dge 'dun gnas brtan la sogs pa/ /kun la so sor bshags pa yin//
48a1(mdo 'grel): de yang ltung byed ji bzhin du/ /sdom brtson gcig gi mdun du bshags/ /dge slong ma yi dbyar khang du/ /bsgo bsham byed la bkag pa med/ /de ni de yi rang rdzas te/ /khang bzang rgya chen 'gar yang ngo/ /dge 'dun mthun pas slob ba yi/ khyim
48a2(mdo 'grel): gang bslab pa'i sdom can gyis/ /dge slong brubs nyen na yang/ /mgron du ma bos zan mi bza' / /mar dar zho dad 'o ma dang/ /sprang rtsi bu ram btung ba dang/ /nya sha sha dang sha skam dang/ /mar dang bcas ba bkag ba yin/ /lo ma me tog 'bras bu sogs//
48a3(mdo 'grel): dang du len pa 'gal ba med/ /dam pa'i chos ni ston ba na/ /mal stan spyod pa la yang ngo/ /sdom brtsan khyim gzhan zos nas ni/ /bza' lhag khyim du byis pa la/ /dum bur bgos te sbyin bya ste/ /tshul ldan la ni de dag dga' / /gang zhig 'jigs dang
48a4(mdo 'grel): bcas pa yi/ /dgon pa'i gtsug lag khang gnas pa'i/ /dge slong phyi rol 'ongs nas ni/ /bza' ba len pa bkag pa yin/ /de thob der ram gzhan du 'am/ /gtsug lag khang du mi za yang/ /nags nyul nas ni ma gtogs te/ dge slong la ni
48a5(mdo 'grel): ltung bar 'gyur/ /de ltar byas na ci rigs par/ /kun dga' ra bar sdom brtson mdun/ /bdag la mi rigs smad pa'i gnas/ /byung ngo zhes ni so sor bshags/ /de ltar so sor bshags rnam bzhi/ /gang du ji bzhin bshad nas ni/ /da ni
48a6(mdo 'grel): gang zhig bslab pa'i chos/ /mang po'i skabs son bstan bar bya/ /sham thabs steng gi gros gyon pa/ /de ni shin tu zlum por bgo/ ha cang rtsengs pa ma yin dang/ /ha cang 'jol ba ma yin brjod/ /glang po'i sna ltar ma yin dang/ /ta la'i lo ma
48a7(mdo 'grel): ltar mi 'dod/ /sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka lta bu dang/ /sbrul gyi mgo bo nyid ltar min/ /brtul zhugs ldan bas sham thabs ni/ /'bru yi phur ma ltar mi bgo/ stong g.yogs stobs kyi lta bzhin du/ /dge bar yang ni mo bya'o/ /shin tu bsdams
48b1(mdo 'grel): dang legs par bgo/ gnya' shing gang tsam lta ba dang/ /lta ba i? yengs pa yin ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyis grong 'jug bya/ /mgo bo g.yogs dang brdzes pa yis/ /grong du 'jug bar mi bya'o/ /mi bzar ba dang gnya' gong gzed/ /cog pu de bzhin dkur mi brten//
48b2(mdo 'grel): sdom brtson chongs sogs mi bya zhing/ /lag pa mi sbrel phrag mi sprang/ /lus dang lag ba mgo bo dag/ bsgyur zhing kyogs pas gong mi 'jug/ ma brtags pa dang ma bsgo dang/ /lus kun gyi ni ljing mi dbab/ /rkang ba yis ni rkang pa dang /lod bu lod
48b3(mdo 'grel): pu bsdol? mi bya/ /rkang pa mi brkyang mi dgug cing/ /mi gang ba phyin pa bsnol mi bya/ /brla yang phan tshun pa snol mi bya/ /khyim du mnyam gzhag min mi 'dug/ lhung bzed la lta mthar chags dang/ /tshod ma mnyam dang byur bu yis/ /yongs su blang bar
48b4(mdo 'grel): mi bya zhing/ /zas steng lhung bzeb mi bzhag go/ bza' ba nye bar mi stobs par/ /lhung bzed sdar bzed mi byi'o/ /slar yang 'dod pas tshong ma dang/ /zan ni phan tshun dgab mi bya/ /ro la chags pas mi bza' zhing/ /shin tu mang po ma yin no/ /zas
48b5(mdo 'grel): la ma gus brnyas bcas dang/ /kham ni che min chung ma lin/ /kham na mi gzas par du ni/ /ba gdang mi bya 'gram mi bskyod/ /dge slong kha bkang smra mi bya/ /zas la sgra ni gsal ches min/ /tsug tsug zhes kyang mi bya ste/ /phu phu la sogs kun mi bya//
48b6(mdo 'grel): dge slong zas la 'phyas mi gdags/ /tha dang phye nas mi bza' ba'o/ /'gram pa zas kyis mi dgang zhing/ /kham ni 'phro yis bcad mi bya/ /nam yang zas ni za pa'i phyir/ /lce brkyang ba yis dam yin no/ /lag pa dag ni mi bldag cing/ /ltung bzed yang
48b7(mdo 'grel): ni byog mi bya/ /lag pa sbug par mi bya ste/ /lhung bXed bskyoms par mi bya'o/ /mchod rten rnam par byas nas ni/ /bcom ste bza' bar mi bya'o/ /drung na 'dug ba'i lhung bzed la/ /smad pa'i don du mi lta'o/ /lag pa zas dang bcas pa yis/ /chu snod dag la
49a1(mdo 'grel): bzung mi bya/ /zas dang bcas pa'i chu yis ni/ /drung na gnas la gtor mi bya/ /zas bcas chu dang zas lhag ni/ /lhung bzed kyi ni dor mi bya khyim pas rjes su gnang ba na/ /khyim gzhan du ni gnyes pa med/ /gang kha dang ni g.yang kha dang/ /dkan
49a2(mdo 'grel): ngos lhung bzed mi bzhag cing/ /langs nas bkru bar mi bya'o/ /'bab chu brag tu 'bab pa yi/ /rgyun las bzlog nas lhur bzed kyis/ /chu ni blang bar mi bya'o/ /lhung bzed kun tu mi rnyed phyir/ /'dug la 'greng bas chos bshad min/ /nyal ba la ni
49a3(mdo 'grel): 'dug pas min/ /'dug stan dma' mos mthon pa dang/ /phyi bzhin 'ongs pas chos mi bstan/ /de bzhin lam min 'dug nas kyang/ /lam nas 'gro ba la yang min/ /mgo la zhwa 'am cod pan thogs/ /phreng ba 'am gtsug tor can la min/ /glang
49a4(mdo 'grel): chen rta dang khyogs la zhon/ /mchil lham gyon pa dag dang ni/ /gdugs 'dzin pa dang dbyug thogs dang/ /mgo bo g.yogs pa la sogs pas/ /gnas pa la ni mi rung ste/ /dge slong dag gis chos bshad pa/ /nad pa la ni 'gal ba med//
49a5(mdo 'grel): sdom brtson rkyen med langs nas ni/ /gshang gci dor ba'i bya ba dag/ mi bya lus ni bder gnas pas/ /byas na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /gang yang sdom ldan bder gnas pas/ /chu 'am rtsa sngon dag la yang/ /gshad gci dang ni
49a6(mdo 'grel): skyugs pa dang/ /mchil ma ngar snabs mi dor ro/ /ci ste 'dor byed de la 'dir/ /nyes byas bskyed par the tshom med/ /de 'dra'i rkyen dag byung na ni/ /sdom brtson ltung ba yod ma yin/ /rkyen ma gtogs par mi gang las/ /lhag par shing
49a7(mdo 'grel): la 'dzag mi bya/ /kun mkhyen yab kyis bstan pa yi/ /spyod pas rtag tu gnas pa ste/ /'greng dang nyal dang 'dug pa dang/ /'chag pa la yang de bzhin te/ /gang phyir ba dag ni mdza' yes yon tan 'byung gnas kyi/ /yab gcig bde gshegs
49b1(mdo 'grel): sras yin de bstan spyod yul ni/ /chos kun rab bzhin de sems zhi byed rtogs par yang/ /'dod pas bdag nyid phyi rol g.yo ba bzlog par bya/ /de ltar de dag thams cad du/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i bslab pa spyad/ /'di ni bslab par bya ba'i chos/ /mang po mdor
49b2(mdo 'grel): bsdus bstan pa yin/ /de rjes bdun gyi dbang byas nas/ /zhi byed bstan pa de 'dir brjod/ /rtsod pa 'khrug long rtag tu brjod/ /zhi byed de yi rjes kyi chos/ /thabs dang gang zag khyad par las/ /zhi byed de ni rnam pa bdun/ /gang zhig lus dag bsdams
49b3(mdo 'grel): pa yis/ /gzu bo yang dag spro bya ste/ /dge 'dun mdza' dag dbus su de/ /tshul bzhin legs par 'grang bar bya/ /'dun dang zhe sdang gti mug 'jigs/ /rnam spang yang dag rtsed pa dag/ /byed 'dod de la sped pa dang/ /sped pa yang ni shes pa'o/ /gzu po rtsod
49b4(mdo 'grel): pa mngon gsum dang/ /gang zag de yang mngon sum brjod/ /tshul bzhin de chos mngon sum dang/ /ston pa yi ni bka' bzhin te/ /mngon sum du ni zhe byed 'di/ /mngon sum 'dul bar brjod de gcig/ blo dman rnams kyis dran pa'i phyir/ /'di ni phyogs
49b5(mdo 'grel): tsam bstan pa yin/ /gang yang dgu 'am bcu yis sam /lnga 'am de las lhag pas kyang/ /gang mang gis ni brtsod pa dag/ zhi byed de ni gang mang brjod/ /gal te gzu bo gang mang dang/ /gang la mdo sde 'dul ba yi/ /bstan bcos shes pa'i gnas
49b6(mdo 'grel): brtan nam/ /gzhan gyis kyang rtsod ma zhe na/ /tshogs la dbul lo tshogs kyis kyang/ /bco lnga ldan pa yang dag bsko/ /sngar bzhin 'dir yang tshul shing brim/ /gang des tshul shing bya ba ni/ /chos dang chos min ston byed gnyis/ /chos kyi tshul shing mchod 'os te/ /dang
49b7(mdo 'grel): po dri zhim reg na bde/ /cig shos de las bzlog pa ste/ /yon po dri ngan reg bya rtsub/ /chos kyi lag pa g.yas su bcang/ /cig shos steng nas bkag ste'o/ /dge 'dun yang ni 'dug pa na/ /nan tan ldan pas lan gsum par /chos kyi tshul shing dang por te/ /gnas
50a1(mdo 'grel): brtan smos nas rab tu brim/ /gal te 'dir ni chos kyi brda/ /dge ba rnams ni mang gyur na/ /tshul shing de yis chos kyi don/ /rtsod pa de yis go bar bya/ /de la skyor byed dge slong la/ /sngar bshad pa yi ltung bar 'gyur/ /slar yang cig shos de lta na'ang/ /de
50a2(mdo 'grel): ni zhi bar brjod par ba/ /chos min las skyor dge slong la/ /de lta na yang nyes byas te/ /gang mang zhes ni grags pa yi/ /'dul pa 'di ni dpa' bos gsungs/ /'di ni rtsod dang 'khrug long las/ /brtsams pa'i 'dul ba gnyis par grags/ /
50a3(mdo 'grel): gsum pa ma gang ma rtsod zhi byed/ /'dul ba rig pa rnams kyis gsungs/ /mngon sum 'dul dang de bzhin du/ /dran pa ma smyos pa yis 'dul/ /mngon sum 'dul pa snga ma bzhin /snga ma ji lta de ltar brjod/ /dran 'dul shes par bya ba ni/ /gyad bu
50a4(mdo 'grel): nor la sogs pa'i tshig/ dge slong ma ni mdza' mos sngon/ /ston pa la zhus ji bzhin te/ /tshul 'dis dge slong khyed cag gis/ /gyang bu nor la dran 'dul sbyin/ /'di ltar yang ni sbyin bya ste/ /des ni rgan pa'i mdza' logs brjod/ /gson cig dge
50a5(mdo 'grel): 'dun btsun pa rnams/ /bdag la tshul min sogs kyis skur/ /de ni tshogs la dran pa yis /'dul ba bdag la gnang zhes gsol/ /de ltar lan gsum brjod rjes la/ /dge slong gcig gis gsol byas nas/ /chos dang ldan zhing cho ga bzhin/ /dran
50a6(mdo 'grel): pa 'dul ba de la sbyin/ /ma myos 'dul ba gsungs ba ni/ /bye skyes bzhin du de tshe bdag/ sems 'khrugs pa 'am smyos pa'am/ /blo ni tshor bas gzir ba ste/ /de nas sdom brtson rnams kyis bdag/ dman phyir yang dang yang du bskul/ /ma smyos
50a7(mdo 'grel): 'dus ba? dge 'dun la/ /gsan du gsol zhes lan gsum brjod/ /ma smyos 'dul ba 'di la yang/ /gsol ba mngon par brjod las kyis sbyin/ /de ltar tshul des rtsod zhi ba/ /ma smyos pa yi 'dul bas so/ /ltung phyir rtsod pa dag la yang//
50b1(mdo 'grel): 'dul ba bzhi yis myur du zhi/ /yang dag khas blangs mngon sum dang/ /rtswa bkram de nyid tshol la ni/ /ltung bar bcas pa gleng pa 'am/ /ma glengs na yang dge slong gis/ /dge slong mdun du tsog bu yis/ /'dug ste thal sbyar phyag byas nas/ /brjod de dgongs
50b2(mdo 'grel): shig khyod kyi mdun/ /ltung ba bshags brjod des kyang der/ /mthong ngam zhes dri mthong lan smra/ /phyin ci ma log de yi tshig/ phyin chad ltung la dga' min dri/ /dga' bar mi byed ces tshig brjod/ /thabs yin zhes kyang nges brjod de/ /khas blangs rtsod de zhi ba'o//
50b3(mdo 'grel): phas pham la sogs tshogs mchog la/ /khas blangs 'dul ba gsol ba na/ /de ltar rtsod de zhi don du/ /khas blangs nyid du mkhas pas brjod/ /'di ltar yangs pa can du sngon/ /dge slong nag pos chos gos dag/ khyer song dge slong yangs can rnams//
50b4(mdo 'grel): mnyan yod dge slong 'ongs pa las/ /mngon sum rtsod pas 'gro ba la/ /mngon sum 'dul ba yang dag bstan/ /mngon sum 'dul ba'i de nyid 'di/ /slar yang rab bshad bzlas pas so/ /phan tshun rtsod pas 'grel pa la/ /rtswa bkram lta bur rab tu gsungs
50b5(mdo 'grel): gnas brtan gzhan zhig song na'ang deng/ /k'di ltar yang dag rjes bstan bya/ /khyed cag rtsod la mngon dga' zhing/ /slar ldog byed pa'ang dka' bar gnas/ /khyed 'dir legs pa rnyed min te/ /'di 'dra dge slong yin nam ci/ /gzhan yang khyed dang bdag
50b6(mdo 'grel): cag la/ /nges par ltung ba gang byung ba/ /sbom po 'am mthar thug spangs nas ni/ /de ni nyer zhi spro bas gnas/ /de la nges smras mi nyan pa'ang/ /min na de tshe rang bzhin gnas/ /cig shos kyis ni phyogs la yang/ /des ni sngar bzhin brjod par bya/ /de yang
50b7(mdo 'grel): gal te ma zhi ba'i/ /sems ldan de tshig nyan min na/ /rtsod de nye bar zhi ba ni/ /rtswa bkram tshul gang nyid kyis so/ /ltung ba khas blangs pa yang ni/ /slar yang log par shes pa yis/ /tshogs nang de slar khas mi len/ /dge slong me bzhi ji bzhin du/ /'dir yang
51a1(mdo 'grel): de yi ngo bo nyid/ /tshol las de 'dul dge slong la/ /sbyin zhes gzhan la phan byed pa'i/ /'gro ba rnams kyi rtsa lag gsungs/ /des kyang de ltar rgan pa yi/ /mthar na kun la gsol bar bya/ /de la de bzhin tshogs kyis kyang/ /chog thams cad snga ma
51a2(mdo 'grel): bzhin/ /bya phyir rtsod pa dge slong gi/ tshogs kyi kun gyi zhi ba thob/ /mi mthun byed min kha cig la/ /zhi byed de 'dir shes par bya/ /'di ni so sor thar pa yi/ /mdo don mdor bsdus tsam zhig ste/ /gzhi la sogs par gang gsungs pa/ /de yang ci nus brjod par bya//
51a3(mdo 'grel): rigs ngan reg 'os ma yin dang/ /chang tshong khyim dang rgyal po'i khab/ /smad 'tshong khyim du brjod pa ste/ /lnga po dge slong spyod yul min/ /grangs can la sogs brdzun pa yi/ /bstan bcos rgyun du bden pa'i blos/ /klog par byed na de dag la/ /bsod snyoms
51a4(mdo 'grel): dug tu 'gyur ba yin/ /mi bzad ngan song nad kyi sman/ /bder gshegs bstan bcos shes nas ni/ /sun dbyung phyed du gzhan dag gi/ /bstan bcos kyang ni blta bar bya/ /gang phyir kun mkhyen dag pa'i dka' / /sbrang rtsi'i tshogs chen yod bzhin du//
51a5(mdo 'grel): su zhig mu stegs kyis bstan pa'i/ /nim pa che ba'i ro myang byed/ /khri'u rkang ba'i ri mo can/ /mu stegs rgyal mtshan nyid kyang ste/ /snod kyang ha cang mang ba dang/ /sna tshogs bkra ba spang bar bya/ /skyob pas na dang rgan po la/ /bzhon pa thams cad rjes
51a6(mdo 'grel): gnang mdzod/ /chad dang las kyi dus dag la/ /gsang ba'i gnas ni bkri ba yang/ /khur gyi rim bas 'gro ba dang/ /dbyig pa dang ni dra ba sogs/ /bsam gtan klog dang ldan rnams la/ /bcas pa gus pa sngon 'gro bya/ /mig sman mchu yi byi dor dang/ /de
51a7(mdo 'grel): bzhin chos gos de zhim? dgod/ /sen mo 'chos dang mgo ba'i khrus/ /gdugs dad mchil lham khra bo bkag/ lo ma 'am ni smrig ma nyid/ /'di nyid sdom brtson dag gis gdugs/ /rtag tu grong gis dbus su ni/ /de yi yub bsgreng mi bya/ /yu ba gdugs
51b1(mdo 'grel): kyi tshad nyid de/ /nam yang de las ring du min/ /kha gdang tshe na nam du yang/ /rang gi lag la sogs pas dgab/ /sdom brtson so yi rus pa ni/ /bstan te brgad par mi bya'o/ /sgra dbyangs chu dus ston pa yi/ /yon tan brod bya dam chos kyi/ /dbyangs ni mngon bang mi
51b2(mdo 'grel): shes na/ /dben par slob pa bkag pa med/ /ston pa'i dam chos mdzes phyir te/ /nyon mongs bcas pa'i sems kyis min/ /dge slong dge slong ma la sogs/ /rnam pa lnga la ston pa yis/ /dbyar gnas pa dang dbyar gyi mthar/ /dgag dbye bya bar rjes su gnang//
51b3(mdo 'grel): bslab ba mdza' dag blangs pa gang/ /dge slong dge slong mar shes te/ /bcu yi gnas la dge tshul nyid/ /dge tshul ma yang de bzhin no/ /gcig po lam du mi 'gro zhing/ /chu bo'i pha rol rkyal mi bya/ /skyes pa la ni mi reg cing/ /de dang lhan cig 'dug mi bya
51b4(mdo 'grel): kha na ma tho mi bcab cing/ /smyan du 'gyur ba mi bya ste/ /'di dag dge slob ma rnams kyi/ /chos drug ces ni yongs su bsgrags/ /sa le sbram ni len pa dang/ /gsang ba'i gnas kyi sbu 'dreg dang/ /sa rnams rko bar byed ba dang/ /rtswa sngon la sogs gcod
51b5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /byin len ma byas zas len dang/ /gsog 'jog byas pa za ba las/ /ldog pa zhes bya de bzhin gzhan/ /rjes mthun chos ni drug du 'dod/ /gsung rab las ni gsungs pa yi/ /dge chos bcu gnyis ldan pa yis/ /'jig rten mgon po'i
51b6(mdo 'grel): bstan pa la/ /dge slob ma yi ming tsan yin/ /dge 'dun dag gi rgan rabs kyis/ /'bad pas tshes grangs dran par bya/ /gtsug lag khang skyong dag gis kyang/ /nyin re tshogs kyi thad du brjod/ /dus rnams yang dag 'pho ba na/ /zla phyed gsum gsum
51b7(mdo 'grel): rjes la 'chad/ /lo la zhag res mtshad? ba'i/ /bla ba drug tu bstan pa yin/ /lo dang zla ba zla shol dag/ rgyal po'i bka' yis kyang ni bsdags/ /bka' ba tsan grags ldan shes rab can/ /dpung ldan de yi rjes 'brang bya/ /snod dang lag pa legs bkrus nas//
52a1(mdo 'grel): brtul zhugs can gyis byug ris bya/ /ci nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang/ /mchod rten lta bur mi bya'o/ /sdom brtson lam du 'gro ba'i tshe/ /gang du lta yi gzugs dag mthong/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshigs bcang ni/ /gus pas se gol gtogs te brjod//
52a2(mdo 'grel): de dag phan dang gnod ba na/ /rgyal bas nyes byas dag tu bcas/ /des na bslab pa rjes bsrung bas/ /rtag tu dran par bya ba yin/ /lha yi gzugs ni bya ba ste/ /de yi mchod pa rang nyid kyis/ /bslab pa yang dag thob pa'am/ /sdom gnas dge slong gzhan gyis
52a3(mdo 'grel): so/ /dgos pa'i ched du gzugs de la/ /gtor ma me tog la sogs sbyin/ /lha rnams rang gi gnas su ni/ /mi mthun pa dag ma ston phyir/ /'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes par/ /lha rnams kyis ni rjes bsdags pas/ /sangs rgyas 'khor du gtogs pa
52a4(mdo 'grel): la/ /ci nas gnod pa mi byed gsungs/ /mgon pos sems can thams cad la/ /kun tu byams pa rab bsngags te/ /gang la sa bon de yod na/ /sred pa las byung sdug bsngal med/ /gang zhig lha ni gang dag la/ /gus pas mchod byed de la 'dir//
52a5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gnas pa gang yin du/ /srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod thob byed/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas skyabs song nas/ /rnam pa gzhan gyis gzhan bsten na/ /gsal por sems ni g.yo ba can/ /de brten 'bras bu gal yod/ /yul 'khor dag gi bsod
52a6(mdo 'grel): snyoms kyang/ /'bar ba'i me mdag lta bur spyod/ /ngur smrig cha lugs tsam gyis ni/ /dge slong rtags sun 'byin pa yin/ /blo ngan dran pa'i don du ni/ /'dul ba la sogs bri bya ste/ /rang ming dag ge ba dag ni/ /dgag phyir sbyin pa'i chos zhes bre/ /ma
52a7(mdo 'grel): dang pa 'am dang chung dag/ tshul khrims can gyi bsro khang dang/ /lus kyi dril phyi sku mnye yi/ /las dag la ni rab tu bkag/ /khrims ldan gyis ni khrims 'chal la/ /bsnyen bkur phyag sogs mi bya'o/ /'di ni nye gnas skal med de/ /'di nyid bstan pa'i tsher
52b1(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ /mkhan po dang ni slob dpon dang/ /pham de bzhin nang pa dag/ tshul khrims nyams kyang bsnyen bkur bya/ /de la med na nyes gnas kyang/ /bsod snyoms dngos po phyed dag kyang/ /sdom ldan rnams kyis pham bgo/ de dag dka' ba byed pa'o/ /rtag tu phan 'dogs kyang
52b2(mdo 'grel): yin phyir/ /yongs su spyad bya 'di dag ni/ /sus kyang kun tu bzlog mi bya/ /rkang ba'i mthil gyi sku mnye dang/ /khrus dang dris phyi sogs kyang ngo/ /gal te de la g.yan pa'i nang/ /byung na long bu man chad du/ /'drur dang skud dang rkang pa dag/ dkri ba la sogs pa
52b3(mdo 'grel): yang ngo/ /mchod phyir thegs pa'i se ral kha/ /rkang gdub dag kyang mi gdags te/ /rims la sogs pa'i bya'i phyir/ /skud pa dbung ba g.yon par rung/ /de ni nang dang bral ba na/ /rtsig pa la sogs khung bur gzhug/ nges par sman pa'i man ngag gis/ /tsan
52b4(mdo 'grel): dan la sogs byug par bya/ /ma dad rigs can skye bo dag/ ci nas dang spong mi 'gyur bar/ /tsan dan la sogs byugs nas ni/ /dben par 'dug gi phyi rol min/ /gal te kha cig nan tan gyis/ /dris byug bsod nams 'dod pa na/ /rtsig ngos maN+Dal byas
52b5(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /de yis mthong ba gsal phyir mnam/ /nam yang dri ni rkang par min/ /gal te dang ba can dag gis/ /khas blangs rjes thogs de yi tshe/ /chu mang po yis bkru bar bya/ /me tog mdzes shing dri zhim dag/ rnyed de snom par 'dod pa na/ /mig gi ched du
52b6(mdo 'grel): rnam bsams nas/ /bsnam gyi 'dod chags blos ma yin/ /gang su la yang mtshon cha dag/ ma dag sems kyis sbyin mi bya/ /sman rnams spa phyir lcags dag las/ /byas pa'i sgo lcags bcang bar bya/ /zangs lcags ra gnas dang ni/ /shing dman nye rdo
52b7(mdo 'grel): las byas/ /rgya dag thub pas gang zag dang/ /tshogs la yang ni rjes su gnang/ /gang zag la ni thod pa dang/ /yan lag drug gis rus bas mtshon/ /dge 'dun dag la kun rdzogs pa'i/ /chos kyi 'khor los rnam par mjes/ /gsal mthong rung ba mi bcang ste/ 
53a1(mdo 'grel): lhan cig spyod pa'i tshul ngan bkag/ sbyin bdag dang ba spel ba'i phyir/ /bcos pa nyid do tshogs kyi yang/ /me long dam ni chu sogs la/ /rang gi bzhin ni lta mi bya/ /lus kyi na tshong mtshan ma'am/ /rma dag lta phyir nyes ba med/ /rang gi lus skyes mi
53a2(mdo 'grel): dgug cing/ /rdol sogs pas mi gzhom mo/ /'dod chags me ni 'phel ba na/ /mi sdug chu yis zhi bar bya/ glang chen rmig rjes lta bu yis/ /sa yi rang bzhin rkang khrus snod/ /'od ma ta la'i lo ma yi/ /bsil yab kyang ni rnam pa gnyis/ /lo ma yal
53a3(mdo 'grel): 'dab ras ma dag/ sha na than bal gyi ste/ /sbrang ma la sogs zlog byed pa/ /rnam pa lnga ni rab tu gnang/ /shing dam skas la 'jig pa na/ /sham thabs mdza' sna da cing bar bya/ /lci ba'i khur ni dge slong gis/ /bal ba bzhin du bkur bi bya/ /so mangs
53a4(mdo 'grel): sogs kyis yan lag mchog/ bshad par bya phyir ma yin no/ /mgo skyes lag pa dag gis kyang/ /gyen du brdze bar mi bya'o/ /skra la rdul gyi gos pa na/ /lag pa'am ni gos kyis kyang/ /mgo bo yongs su sbrug phyi ba/ /brtul zhugs ldan la nyes
53a5(mdo 'grel): ba med/ /skad gsang ha cang che chung gis/ /thub pa'i bka' ni mi brjod do/ /brjod bya dang ni mi 'gal bar/ /yul skad dus dang rjes mthun bya/ /gtsug lag khang gi steng ngos kyi/ byad dang nub kyi phyogs cha ru/ /gshang gci bya ba'i khang pa dag/
53a6(mdo 'grel): bya ba yin te phal cher ro/ /gtsug lag khang gi nang gi ngos/ /lho dang shar gyi mtshams su ni/ /chu yi snod du nus pa bzhin/ /chu don gnyer ba rnams la sbyin/ /dge slong dam ni khyim pa yang/ /rgan po sbring pa byung ba la/ /tshe ring gyur cig ces brjod
53a7(mdo 'grel): do/ /de dag tshe ring 'dod phyir ro/ /gsar bu la ni rgan po yis/ /a rok+Sha zhes brjod bya ste/ /gsar bu yis kyang rgan po la/ /lus kyis phyag ni bya ba yin/ /phyag mi bya dang mi blang dus/ /brtul ldan zas la 'khod pa dang/ /'og gi lam ni mi gtsang dang/ /gos
53b1(mdo 'grel): gcig gis ni 'dug pa dang/ /ma ming na yang gang zhig gis/ /kha ni zas kyis bkad ba la/ /phyag mi bya zhing nges kyang ni/ /gzhan la phyag ni mi bya'o/ /gzhan yang phyag bya'i yul min mang/ /spro mgu spyod pa la sogs yin/ /sangs rgyas dang ni sdom pas rgan/ /rtag
53b2(mdo 'grel): tu dge slong phyag bya gnyis/ /bstan la dam par bya ba yis/ /dge slong phyag ni rnam pa gnyis/ /gcig ni dkyil 'khor lnga ba ste/ /gzhan gyi spyid pa nas 'khyud yin/ /skra yi rang bzhin srang bu yis/ /lag 'gro bzung bar mi bya ste/ /zhi bas rang bzhin
53b3(mdo 'grel): mi 'gro na/ /de ni bskrang ba'i sbyor ba bya// //bam po lnga pa/ /tha gu shin tu 'jam po yis/ /mgul bar bcings te legs par dor/ /g.yang sa ma yin sa phyogs ni/ /'gro ba 'tsho ba med par ro/ /de bzhin gzhan la
53b4(mdo 'grel): gnod med par/ /byi ba la sogs skye 'gro rnams/ /ngal gyis bag yod rab bzung nas/ /'bad pas ci bder dor bar bya/ /bslab pa rjes bsrungs brtse ldan gyis/ /shig rnams dal gyis bzung nas ni/ /bsdus nas brtsig pa la sogs
53b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /bu gang snying rje can gyis gzhug/ rtswa sngon stug po'i sa phyogs su/ /rtswa shig dag kyang dor bar bya/ /lhag ma gzhan yang ma snang bar/ /rang gi spyod yul dag tu dor/ /che ba phul ched chung du phyed/ /'bring po de dag bar ma ste/ /'bru
53b6(mdo 'grel): mar snod du nyer bstan pa/ /rnam gsum de las gang 'dod bcad/ /lam 'gro chos kyi gtam nyid dang/ /mi smra pa yis 'gro bar bya/ /ngal bso'i tshe na tshigs bcang 'don/ /mtshan mo'i gnas tshe rgyud gsum pa'o/ /khru ni brgya dang lnga bcu brgyad//
53b7(mdo 'grel): che dang chung dang bar mi ste/ /rnam gsum pas mthar shes bya zhing/ /gang la ji ltar rigs pas kyang/ /chu rab che ba'i sa phyogs sam/ /chu yi khyab par yang ni rung/ /rjes mthun nyid kyi khyer bya 'am/ /mi khyer ba ni go rim bzhin/ /gal te sdom brtson
54a1(mdo 'grel): dge slong dam/ /rnams la 'dul ba ston pa na/ /yol bas bar du bcad bya ste/ /gzhan du 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /gal te rkun mas por nas ni/ /yongs su ma bzung rnyed lta na/ /skye bos go byas khyer ba la/ /nam yang 'gal ba yod ma yin/
54a2(mdo 'grel): kun dga' rab byad 'dod pas/ /gal te dge slong ljon shing bcugs/ /de yis lo lnga'i bar dag tu/ /gnas te mngon par blta bar bya/ /dge slong gis ni lhung bzed sogs/ /rtsod dang mna' ni dor mi rigs/ /khyim pa rnams ni sho be can/ /tshul ldan
54a3(mdo 'grel): cho long ji ltar rung/ /gang du sdom brtson bud med dam/ /des kyang sdom ldan mthong ba yis/ /chags skyes gyur na nges de yis/ /spyod yul de ni myur du spang/ /dge slong ma ni nyer 'ongs nas/ /bla ma blta bar 'dod gyur cing/ /dam chos mnyan par
54a4(mdo 'grel): shes pa na/ /'dir las 'drag? ces brjod bya ste/ /so phag shing stan phyed tshal lam/ /gong bu dag gam srab mo yi/ /stan rung gzhan dag dge slong gi/ mdun du dge slong ma yis min/ /dge slong rnams kyi mal stan gyi/ /lhag ma dge slong ma la
54a5(mdo 'grel): gnang/ /dman pa 'am ni 'bring po ste/ /bzang po nam yang ma yin no/ /dge slong dge slong ma rnams kyang/ /phan tshun ltung ba bshags pa rnams/ /phan tshun du ni rang gi skyon/ /gang phyir sgrogs bar ma nus na/ /ltung ba'i the tshom tshul 'di la/ /dge
54a6(mdo 'grel): blang? mas ni go bya'i phyir/ /dri'o bla ma'i 'du shes kyis/ /dge slong la ni phyogs gzhan du'o/ /gang tshe dge slong ma gang zhes/ /dge slong gnas su 'jug tshe dra/ /rang dang bcas pa ma yin na/ /shog ces des kyang brjod par bya/ /mdo sde chos
54a7(mdo 'grel): mngon 'dul ba dang/ /rgyu skar dang ni nyin zhag shes/ /dgon pa'i phan yon 'dod pa rnams/ /grong nas rgyang grags gnas bar bya/ /nags khrod dben par 'dug pa la/ /nges par chom rkun dga' bskyed phyir/ /'bru mar la sogs nyer mkho'i
54b1(mdo 'grel): snod ? mkhas pas nye bar gzhag par bya/ /tshul ldan sngar ni bzo shes kyis/ /rang gi bzo cha spang bar bya/ /sngon ni sman pa 'breg mkhan na/ /'chang bar byed la bkag pa med/ /phongs pa'i tshe yang dge slong gis/ /brtson la dga' ba dor mi bya/ /rang
54b2(mdo 'grel): byung brtson 'grus ngo bo nyid/ /de spangs 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /brtson 'grus can yang spyod bcas gang/ /yang dag rjes su bstan par bya/ /de med de la lta ba dang/ /dang dang sgom pa yong ma yin /man ngag dang ni brel pa'i sems//
54b3(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan la ni sbyar mi bya/ /de ? 'khrul pa nyid gnas 'gyur/ /bsam gtan gang yin rnyed par dka' / /gnas khang gos dang mal stan sogs/ /dri zhim spos kyis bdug pa dang/ /me tog dri zhim bsam gtan dag/ byed na'o 'di las
54b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan du min/ lag gi bla yes shing dag go?/ /mtshon gyi las la sogs pa yang/ /shing drung la sogs mi mkho ba/ /de yis byin na nyes pa med/ /rab zhi kun spyod la mkhas pa/ /spyod yul gyur na 'bad pa yis/ /de ni lhan cig gnas par
54b5(mdo 'grel): bzung/ /ma brtags par ni ma yin no/ /gal te chu dang ma nang sogs/ /bud med gang dag 'chi 'gyur na/ /dge slong snying rje ldan pa yis/ /de 'don byed la nyes pa med/ /gzugs brnyan rnams kyi bzo dag ni/ /shes pas gang de 'dod pa na//
54b6(mdo 'grel): sdom can gyi ni bya ba ste/ /'jig rten sems ni bsrung phyir ro/ /mkhar gyi sgo dang de bzhin du/ /khang bzang dang ni khang bzang sgor/ /bud med rnams dang lhan cig tu/ /'dug dang gtam sogs ma bya'o/ /de'i phyir gzugs soD rnam lnga yi/ /'dod yon rtag
54b7(mdo 'grel): tu sangs rgyas ? kyang/ /rgyun du dran pa nyer gzhag gi/ rnal 'byor rnams ni yang dag bsgom/ /gang phyir lam 'di 'das pa yi/ /sangs rgyas phan bzhed kun gyi ste/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ nyan thos rnams kyi sngon 'gro yin/ /bla
55a1(mdo 'grel): bla/ ma legs par rnam brtags nas/ /gnas ni cho ga bzhin du bzung/ /bla mas kyang ni yongs brtags pa'i/ /gnas pa yongs su bzung bar bya/ /phan tshuun skyon dang bcas pa yis/ /nges par dkal? tshabs can du 'gyur/ gang gi gnyi ga dag kyang ni//
55a2(mdo 'grel): phan tshun 'di ltar yongs su brtag/ khrims ldan nad g.yog byed pa dag/ /chos dang zang zing ser sna med/ /dus su 'doms ba'i bla ma ni/ /bla ma'i yon tan yang dag ldan/ /gnas pa tshul ldan shes rab can/ /dul thing bzod bzong dang ldan pa dang//
55a3(mdo 'grel): bla ma la ni rtag tu kus/ /bsam gtan klog pa'i las dang ldan/ /phyag mi byed dang rang dbang can/ /mkhan po dang yang phrad pa las/ /rjes su bstan pa mi slob cing/ /de bzhin mi mthun phyogs la brten/ /'di dag la no gzhan nges kyang/ /gnas
55a4(mdo 'grel): kyi bltos pa med pa yin/ /'di ni ngan par shes byas te/ /slar yang gzhan ni yang dag gzung/ /gnyi gas bltos pa spang ba la/ /gnas ni 'jig par brjod pa yin/ /gcig gis kyang ni bltos bcas na/ /slar yang gzhan ni mi bzung ngo/ /gang du dgos pas
55a5(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba na/ /slar yang phyir 'ong 'dod pa yis/ /gnas de la ni go byas te/ /snga ma nyid las gzhan mi bcol/ /gnas med dag gi zhag lnga'i bar/ /tshogs kyi rnyed pa dbang ba yin/ /gang phyir gnas kyang de tsam las lhag pa rung ba ma yin no/ /sdom brtson
55a6(mdo 'grel): kyis ni dge slob dag/ dge 'dun gtsug lag khang dag las/ /mi dbung chad bas bcang bya ste/ /dge slong gnas khang lnga dag yin/ /gnas ni bzlog par bya ba dang/ /klag dang gdams ngag bo ngas sbyang dang/ /yang dag smra? ba dgag pa ste/ /chad pa rnam
55a7(mdo 'grel): pa lnga zhes brjod/ /ci ste chad pa gceng nyid na/ /de la rjes su gnang bar 'os/ /mi 'os phan gnyi ga la/ /de byed na ni 'gal che bas can/ /ma dang le lo can dag dang/ /gdun sems can dang tshig ngan can no/ /sdig pa'i grogs dang mgus pa'i
55b1(mdo 'grel): bzod pa blang bar mi bya'o/ /mthang gos dang bcas bla gos bskon/ /chu tshags snod dang yang dag bcas/ /bla mas legs par yongs brtags te/ /dge tshul yang ni bskrad par bya/ /gzhon pa la 'os yo byang druk?/ dge tshul de la byin nas su/ /bla mas bskyad par
55b2(mdo 'grel): bya ba ste/ /min na bzod pa bya bar 'os/ /nges par de ni gnas med par/ /zhag gcig kyang ni 'dug mi bya/ /gzhan du lo lnga lon gyur cing/ /'dul ba'i don rig lam du'o/ /gtsug lag khang gzhan phyin na ni/ /de yi zhag lnga las kyang ni/ /gnas kyi slob
55b3(mdo 'grel): dpon btsal bya ste/ /de med par ni 'dug mi bya/ /yan lag dril dang mtshon sogs kyi/ /las ni cho ga ji bzhin du/ /bla ma rnams la bya ba ste// gnas pa rnams kyi chos nyid do/ /bla ma yon tan shes pas kyang/ /rang gi bya ba shes bya ste/ /bla ma dang ni slob
55b4(mdo 'grel): mas kyang/ /rtag tu yongs su bsrung bya yin/ /klog pa yi ni slob dpon la'ang/ /mkhas pas nye gnas bya ba ste/ /kun spyod khyad par 'phags pa kun/ /gnas kyi slob dpon dag la bya/ /klog pa mang par mi gnas shing/ /gnas med par yang ma yin te/ /de
55b5(mdo 'grel): lta'ang gnas kya slob dpon la/ /sems ni rtag tu zhen par bya/ /sde snod gsum shes nyon mongs zad/ /lo bcu lon pa ma yin na/ /ston pa'i bka' ni bdun byas nas/ /des kyang gnas ni bzung bar bya/ /zla ba byed dang de phyed la/ /brtson pas nyin ra lan gsum
55b6(mdo 'grel): du/ /ring dang nye bar gnas pa yis/ /gnas ster ba la phyag bya'o/ /gang zhig dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/ /gnas pas zla ba phyed na te/ /de phyed de phyed gnas pa yis/ /lan gsum der gnas nyid kyis so/ /gal te dbyar ni phyi ma la/ /bla ma dus las
55b7(mdo 'grel): 'das gyur na/ /so so'i ten gyis phan chun du/ /bltas te yang ni gnas par bya/ /dbyar ni gnas par gyur pa na/ /gal te rgan po ma rnyed na/ /gnas ni gnyis pa med pa'i phyir/ /de ni gso sbyong ni bya'o/ /sdig pa'i sman kyi gso sbyong ni/ /dgag dbye byas
56a1(mdo 'grel): nas yang mi bya/ /gso sbyong dag ba'i ched du ste/ /dgag dbye'i las kyang de dag nyid/ /phan tshun gnams ba'i don du ni/ /dgag dbye rjes su gnang ba yin/ /gso sbyong zla phyed re re yi/ /sdig rnams yongs su dag phyir ro/ /blo bur lhags dang
56a2(mdo 'grel): gnyug mar gnas/ /mnyam me ma lhag pa yin na yang/ /rjes su bzlas pa'i gso sbyong bya/ /kha ba sog dbyar rnams kyi/ /zla ba gnyis dang bzhi yi ni/ /mar do la ni bcu bzhi ba'i/ /gso sbyong sdom brtson dag gi bya/ /sa ga dang ni chu stod dang/ /de bzhin
56a3(mdo 'grel): khrums smad smin drug dang/ /rgyal dang dpo zhes bya ba nyid pa drug po'i mar ngo bcu bzhir brjod/ /de bzhin de las gzhan dag ni/ /bco brgyad bco lnga bar ni 'dod/ /glo bur lhags ma mang? gyur? cing/ /cig shos dag ni zang ba na/ /glo bur lhags
56a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i yon tan can/ /de dag 'dod pas gso sbyong bya/ /dge 'dun thams cad ltung bcas na/ /dge slong 'dul ba shes pa yis/ /dga' bcud kyis legs go byas nas/ /rab tu 'bad pas rim pa bzhin/ /chengs pa mtshungs spyod mngon sum du/ /
56a5(mdo 'grel): ? bzhin yang dag mthol bshags bya// de la bltas nas gzhan dag kyang/ /de bzhin mkhas pas byed du gzhug/ mtshams kyi mdza' ma mnan nas sam/ /la lar yang ni dkyil 'khor pa/ /de bzhin las ni thams cad la/ /mtshams
56a6(mdo 'grel): ni bcad bar rung ba yin/ /dge 'dun tshogs ba med gyur na/ /gang zag gcig gi mdun nyid du/ /byin gyi brlab po de yang ni/ /med na rang gi sems kyis brjod/ /de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyi lhung bzed dang/ /chos
56a7(mdo 'grel): gos 'gyur po sems kyis kyang/ /de bzhin mgron du bas pa yang/ /gang gi 'khor ni 'dul ba yi/ /cho ga? ba ni mkhas yod na/ /de la gtang nas kyang ni gnas/ /byin gyis brlab pa'am cing? deng? ga/ brlab la gus shing 'jigs bcas la//
56b1(mdo 'grel): stung ba brtag ba 'ang de dang 'dra/ /dgag dbye de ltar shes bya ste/ /de yang lnga yi tshogs kyis so/ /mthun par bsams pa bzang po yis/ /dgag dbye bya ba kho na ste/ /dga' bas tshangs pa mtshungs spyod pa/ /gzhan la so sor gus pas so/ /nyin zhag bdun nam brgyad dang ni//
56b2(mdo 'grel): bcu rnams kyi ni dgag dbye dag/ byed pa na ni 'khor can rnams/ /rab tu 'bad pas sbyang par bya/ /las kyi phyir ni dkyil 'khor ba/ /bya po mdza' mtshams bkrol nas kyang/ /mtshams gcig tu ni ma 'dres pas/ /tshogs kyi las ni bya bar brjod/ /nyi shu
56b3(mdo 'grel): yang na bcu 'am lnga/ /dge slong bzhi zhes bya ba rnams/ /tshogs kyi 'phrin las 'di lta ste/ /'di dag tshogs zhes bya bar grags/ /dge 'dun kha skong sangs rgyas kyis/ /bya ba'i las ni 'ga' yang med/ /sangs bya sa dkon mchog dge 'dun las/ /tha dad
56b4(mdo 'grel): de yi las de'i min/ /nyi shu yi ni dbyung ba ste/ /bcu yi tshogs kyi bsnyen par rdzogs/ /lnga rnams kyi ni dgag dbye ste/ /bzhi po rnams kyis gso sbyong ngo/ /brjod pa la sogs cho ga bzhin/ /las ni gang cu byed pa de/ /gnas zhes bya bar brjod pa
56b5(mdo 'grel): ste/ /bzlog pa la ni gnas mi brtag/ chos smra ba ni dag nyid do/ /dge slong mi sma'i ying ma bkag/ 'di ni mu stegs skye bo dag/ blun po bsgrub pa spang phyir ro/ /mthong dang thos dang rogs pa yis/ /dngos po kun bying? bya ba ste/ /dbyar gi nas
56b6(mdo 'grel): pa la brdul zhugs can/ /gnas gsum gyi dis? ni dgag dbye bya/ /bar chad ma gtogs gang du yang/ /dgag dbye ma byas mi 'gro ste/ /me sogs bar cad byung ba na/ /rgya mtsho yang ni brgal bar bya/ /klags tshol phung khrol tshom rkun dang//
56b7(mdo 'grel): rgyal po mi'i bla ma rnams/ /? dag gus bas nyan ma shi /'dul ba mi bshad mi bya'o/ /dad ba can ni nor med dang/ /dang chung rnams la de yod pa/ /rab tu mnyan phyir 'bad pa la/ /bshad par bya'o ltung ba med/ /mdo sde la sogs mkhas pa rnams 
57a1(mdo 'grel): bzhag par bya bar rab tu grags/ /de dag las la mi bsko ste/ /'di nyid de dag nyid kyi las/ /mdo sde chos mngon 'dul ba rnams/ /'dzin dang tshogs la klog pa dang/ /nad pa tshogs kyi rgan po ste/ /drug po las ni mi byed pa'o/ /dge slong
57a2(mdo 'grel): mdo sogs mkhas pa la/ /lam phyed 'ongs pa thos pa na/ /ji srid dpag tshad phyed dang gsum/ /ba dan bsgreng sogs sngon 'gro bas/ /gaN+Di brdungs te dge 'dun gyis/ /rang gi nus sbyar bsu bar bya/ /'ongs nas dga' 
57a3(mdo 'grel): bas rnyed pa yang/ /der dbul tshogs kyis kyang ni thob/ /gnas khang 'dug stan mal stan rnams/ /de dag gus pas rtag tu dbul/ /nye gnas la yang las su bsko/ /mi dpap? par ni rab tu bshad/ /bslab pa 'chab ba bder gshegs te/ /skrod pa la
57a4(mdo 'grel): ni dge 'dun dbang/ /dge 'dun gyis ni khros pa yis/ /rab byung bslab pa mi bca' o/ /dge 'dun bsam pa tha dad pas/ /byas na yang ni ma byas yin/ /gnyis med gsung ba'i bslab pa ni/ /sus kyang gzhan du bya mi nus/ /gro zhun zla ba'i chas gcig
57a5(mdo 'grel): nas/ /snga ma'i dbyar de gtso bo yin/ /de nyid khrums stod zla ba yi/ /tshes gcig nas ni phyi mar grags/ /zla ba gsum ri 'gro ba yi/ /spyod ba dge slong rnams kyis spang/ /bya rnams kyis kyang rang gi gnas/ /dbyar gyi dus su mi spong ngo/ /
57a6(mdo 'grel): chu stod can gyi zla phyed nas/ /kun nas nye phyir 'bad pa yis/ /gtsug lag khang rnams spyod ba'i las/ /byi dor la sogs bya ba yin/ /bco lnga la ni ma lus pa/ /'dus nas kyang ni gnas mal dag/ de stobs pa ni legs brtags nas/ /spro
57a7(mdo 'grel): bar byas te kun nas bsko/ /'dun dang zhe sdang 'jigs smongs pa/ /skyon rnams ring du spangs nas ni/ /gang zhig bstabs dang ma bstabs pa/ /ma lus pa ni shes pa bzung/ /de nas gtsug lag khang skyong gis/ /khrims su bya bar rab tu bsgrags
57b1(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa yi ning de ba la/ /reg par gnas pa'i ched du bya/ /gang zhig spro ba gzhi med pa/ bzhad gang rtsod pa ma yin no/ /gnas 'di dag tu brims pa yi/ /tshul shing dag ni long zhes so/ /gsol ba 'ba' zhig bya ba ste/ /de ring tshes ni tshes bco lnga la/ /dbyar
57b2(mdo 'grel): gnas pa yi ched du ni/ /tshogs kyi tshul shing blad du gsol/ /de nas rgan rims ji bzhin du/ /tshul shing brims pa'i rjes la ni/ /gnas gang la sogs ci rigs par/ /sbyin no gnas mal dag kyang ngo/ /dbyar ni nye ba'i dus na yang/ /dge slong gis
57b3(mdo 'grel): ni 'bad pas brtag/ gnas dang spyod yul nyid kyang ste/ /yon tan grub par 'dod pas so/ /gnas khang na ni mkhas pa yis/ /tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dang/ /yon tan can dang thos pa 'dzin/ /snying rje cam yid der mngon gsum/ /thog
57b4(mdo 'grel): mar ltung ba mi 'byin cing/ /byung ba slar yang 'chos byed pa/ /de la sogs pa'i rnam pa yis/ /gnas ni yongs su brtag par bya/ /sman dang bsod snyoms dag kyang ni/ /gang du snying las chung du snyed/ /smad 'tshong tshogs kyi gang ba dag/
57b5(mdo 'grel): ma yin der ni spyod yul dag/ steng g.yogs can gnas dge slong gi/ mdun du dge slong tsog pur 'dug/ 'di la dbyar gnas thob bya'i phyir/ /ji lta de ltar nges par brjod/ /sbyin bdag dang ni nye gnas grong/ /zhal ta ba dang nang g.yogs smos//
57b6(mdo 'grel): bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /zla gsum dbyar gnas snga ma 'am/ /phyi ma 'di la gnas bgyid de/ /ral dang grum pa bcos pa'i phyir/ /'di nyid bdag gi dbyar yin te/ /phyi rol dbyar gnas ma yin no/ /de lngar dbyar mi? gnas pa dang/ /de
57b7(mdo 'grel): nas phyi rol gzhan du gnas/ /nyes byas che rgo can gyi cu/ /ngan song thung 'bab mi brgal lo/ /dge slong gcig gi mdun song la/ /zhag bdun yang dag byin gyis brlab/ /dgos pa'i ched du mdun du 'dir/ /mi ? kyang ni nyes pa med/ /
58a1(mdo 'grel): kun dga' ra ba la sogs bzhi'i/ /gzhi ni nye par dgod pa dang/ /mchod rten mchod dang tshogs snyon mo/ /chad pa'i las byin grogs nyid dang/ /dge 'dun lhag ma dbyung ba ste/ /dge slong dgos pa 'di dag gis/ /zhag bdun byin
58a2(mdo 'grel): gyis brlabs nas ni/ /the tshom med par 'gro bar bya/ /'di dag las kyang dge slong ma'i/ /bya ba slar yang lhag ma yin/ /lci pa'i chos nyid ldan pa yis/ /de las 'byung ba mngon 'dod bas/ /dge tshul las ni lhag pa yi/ /dge slong sdom pa 'dod
58a3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /chos dang rjes chos slob pa'i phyir/ /dge tshul ma las dge slob ma/ /lhag pa'i bslab pa la slob ste/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob phyir du/ /tshangs spyod nyer gnas 'dzin phyir ro/ /dge slong ma yis byed pa dang/ /yang na gsol ba la
58a4(mdo 'grel): sogs las/ /gsang ste ston pa nyid dang ni/ /gang phyir mi 'dod? ma yin na/ /gnyi? ga'i tshogs la bsnyen rdzogs ni/ /khyim bdag gi khyim song la/ /gal te yod na snga ma las/ /lhag par bu dang bu mo rnams/ /bag ma gtong len la sogs
58a5(mdo 'grel): dang/ /pha ma dkon mchog gsum dang ni/ /slob dpon la sogs dgos sgrub la/ /zhag bdun bslabs sam lhag par rung/ /mtshan ma nyi shu sum cu 'am/ /nyin zhag bzhi bcu yang ni rung/ /tshogs la zhus nas 'gro bya ste/ /yul gyi dgos
58a6(mdo 'grel): pa sgrub? phyir ro/ /dgos pa khyad par 'phags pa ni/ /rnam par shes te zhus nas kyang/ /gsol ba gcig ni sngon 'gro ba'i/ /brjod pa 'di la tshogs kyis sbyin/ /bsod snyoms kyis ni phongs pa 'am/ /sman yang rnyed par dka' ba dang/ /nye gnas
58a7(mdo 'grel): dga' ? yang med pa na/ /dbyar ni dral yang nyes pa med/ /de bzhin mi rung sgrub pa yis/ /tshangs spyod nyams par byed pa ste/ /nye du ma yin bud med dam/ /rgyal pos mgron du gnyer na'o/ /de bzhin ma ning la sogs zhes/ /rang gi gnas su bud med
58b1(mdo 'grel): 'gal /chags skyes de ni bzlog dka' na/ /gnas gzhan yang dag bsten par bya/ /rgyal po rkun ma sbrul gdug dang/ /mi dang me dang kyi min? dang/ /chu yi 'jigs pas dge slong dag /yod ba na yang nyes pa med/ /gang du sdig pa'i blo can gyis/ /dge slong dge 'dun
58b2(mdo 'grel): 'byed pa rtsom/ /de? thos phrad pas 'jigs pa yis/ /gal te ser? yang nyes pa med/ /'jigs pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang/ /'jam pos bzlog phyir 'gro bya ste/ /ma song 'gral tshabs can du 'gyur/ /nges dbyar dral yang nyes pa med/ /gtsug lag
58b3(mdo 'grel): khang 'dir 'gro zhes bya/ /dbyar gyi dngos po 'di'o zhes/ /brjod de dge slong go byas nas/ /ma song na ni nyes byas yin/ /zhag bdun pang? ni lhag par ni/ /byin gyis brlab po dge slong gang/ /bar der 'ongs te song ba yang/ /byin rlabs de nyid gzhan yod pa
58b4(mdo 'grel): min/ /sngar gyi byin brlabs de nyid ni/ /rgyun mi 'chad par gnas pa la/ /de stong rgyu yi tshogs pa ni/ /de las gzhan du mi 'thob po/ /mtshams bcad rab tu rnam mang las/ /mdor bsdus tshul ni rnam pa bzhi/ /'di yang mdor bsdus dbang byas nas /phyogs
58b5(mdo 'grel): tsam? bstan pas brjod par bya/ /dpag tshad phyed dang gsum pa'i mtshams/ /chen po de ni phyogs bzhi ru/ /ljon shing tshu bo brag ri dang/ /lam chen sogs kyis mtshon de bcad/ /dge 'dun thams cad tshogs pa na/ /dge slong gcig gis gsol ba bya//
58b6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin brjod pa gcig las kyi/ /mtshams ni rab tu 'grub phyir yin/ /shar phyogs mtshams nas tshu rol du/ /gnas mal nyid kyi mthar thug par/ /grong dang de yi nye 'khor dag/ spangs te mtshams ni bcing bar bya/ /chos gos dag dang mi
58b7(mdo 'grel): 'bral phyir/ /slar yang gsol ba sngon 'gro ba'i/ las nyid bya'o tshul ldan dag/ gang la reg par gnas phyir ro/ /chos gos gsum po med par yang/ /sdom brtson mtshams 'dir gnas rung ste/ /grong dang de yi nye 'khor dag/ ma gtogs gzhan
59a1(mdo 'grel): du ci bder ro/ /sngar gyi chen po mi mkho na/ /chung ngu yang ni bya ba ste/ /gsol dang bzhi yis las nyid kyis/ /chen po nye bar bkrol nas ni/ /chung ngu bcings nas snga ma bzhin/ /mtshan ma brtan po rnams kyis so/ /dkyil 'khor pa zhes grags
59a2(mdo 'grel): pa der/ /tshogs kyi las ni bsgrub par bya/ /sngar bzhin chung du bcings nas kyang/ /de nas chen po bcing bar bya/ /gzhan yang der 'di go rim 'di/ /mtshams bcing ba la gnang ba yin/ /dge 'dun thams cad shi srid dam/ /yang na mtshan ni gzhan
59a3(mdo 'grel): gyur ram/ /bslab pa phul lam mtshams nyid kyi/ /phyi rol skya rengs shar ba dang/ /gsol ba sngon 'gro'i las kyis te/ /mchams? 'jig rgyu ni rnam lnga'o/ /ljon shin gcig gi phyed cha'am/ /gnyis pa mchams kyi phur pa ste/ /phur pa
59a4(mdo 'grel): 'am ni shing gcig la/ /cha bzhir rnam pa phye ba yis/ /bzhi char du yang thob pa ste/ /lnga pa nam yang ma yin no/ /'og tu yang ni dpag tshad dag/ phyed dang gsum mo steng du yang/ /de yi steng gi shing rtse 'am/ /spyil po la sogs pa yi
59a5(mdo 'grel): mthar/ /sbyin bdag rjes bzung don gyi phyir/ /ston pa nyid kyi sku gzugs la/ /sa tshogs rin chen 'od 'bar bas/ /mdzes pa'i rgyan spud rjes su gnang/ /rna rgyan dang ni lag gdub dang/ /rkang pa la sogs rgyan rnams ni/ /dgag go rmad byung
59a6(mdo 'grel): 'di dag ni/ /nges par bud med rgyan yin no/ /skyes bu seng ge chen po ni/ /rtag tu rjes su 'dzin mdzad la/ /smad 'tshod gyon pa lta bu yi/ /bud med gos ni mi rigs so/ /tu rkya'i sgra yis 'dug khang du/ /ltad mo pa ni song ba'i che/ /sku gzugs
59a7(mdo 'grel): dag la brgyan pa yi/ /mchod pa slang yang bsdu bar bya/ /skye bo mang po 'dus pa'i tshe/ /ca co'i sgra yis g.yengs pa ni/ /dus tshod brnga ni spang ba'i phyir/ /rnga'am dung sogs sbyar byas 'dod/ /bcu 'am brgya 'am stong phrag ni/ /mdun du byas te nye
59b1(mdo 'grel): bar sgo/ /re rab brtul can 'chi 'dod dag/ bltas te de skal rnam par brtag/ bgos nas de ni shi gyur na/ /de slar dge 'dun thams cad kyi/ /ma bgos na yang de skal ni/ /gzhan des rnam par bgo bar bya/ /skal de sbyin bdag kho na'i ste/ /gang la de phul de yi
59b2(mdo 'grel): yang/ /thams cad du ni ma gnang ba/ /dge slong rnams la de ni 'os/ /dge slong rnams ni mgron bos shing/ /dge? slong ma yang mgron pos na/ /mchod ston tha ma der ni gang/ /rnyed pa rgan pa'i mthar bzhag na/ /gnyi gas kyang ni go ba 'am/ /yang na sbyin bdag
59b3(mdo 'grel): 'dod? pas so/ /zang zing sgal ba mnyam por ni/ /kun tu skyob pa la yang yin/ /dbyig rnams rnam par 'gong 'dod na/ /dge slong ma las cha gnyis te/ /'di la bsnyen par rdzogs 'dod pa'i/ /dge tshul la yang ci rigs brjod/ /de las gzhan pa'i dge tshul lam/ /
59b4(mdo 'grel): rnams la yang ni sum cha 'os/ /dge slong dge slong ma rnams ni/ /skal ba mnyam par bgo bya nyid/ /gang du dge slong mar gyur cing/ /dge slong ma tshogs nyung na ni/ /de ni mnyam por mi bgo ste/ /rnyed pa re re'i grangs kyis so/ /'jig rten mgon pos 'jig rten gyi? yams?
59b5(mdo 'grel): kyi 'tshe ba zhi ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas sku gzugs grong sogs su/ /spyan drangs par ni gsungs ba yin/ /der ni chag chag byug ba dang/ /srang gi bzhi mdor sa gzhi la/ /sna tshogs me tog bkod pa yis/ /rab tu mdzes par bya ba yin/ /tsan dan a kar ga bur
59b6(mdo 'grel): gyi/ /bdug spos kun nas dbul bar bya/ /phyogs kyi sgo nas dri zhim dag/ dal zhing dal ba'i rlung gis bskyod/ /sgra chen pa Ta ha dag dang/ /'khar rnga ting ting shag sogs sgra/ /rgyun du 'brug sgra lta bu yi/ /sgra yi tshogs rnams rjes su bsgrag /yang yang dal/
59b7(mdo 'grel): ba med par ni/ /nam mkha' i khams ni gang ba la/ /grangs ? rol cha sna tshogs dang/ /gsal por dga' ston chen po bya/ rgyal mtshan rnams ni tshar du yang/ /dngang? ro de yang rnam pa lnga/ mkha' lding seng ge chu srin dang/ /khyu mchog glang po zhes bya nyid de/ /
60a1(mdo 'grel): rab byung chen po rnams kyis ni/ /khyim pa'i 'khor rnams la ni sbyar/ /kun mkhyen grong du gshegs pa na/ /de'ang la sogs bsgrub bar bya/ /de nas sangs rgyas mdun ba dang te/ /mthong bar dga' ba'i sems dpa' yis/ /klu dang gnod
60a2(mdo 'grel): sbyin la sogs ba'i/ /'jigs pa zad par sel ba yin/ /rnyed pa kun nas thob pa dag/ tshogs kyi thad du btsong bar bya/ /dge 'dun gnas brtan blo ldan gyis/ /shes na rin thang gdab par bya/ /nges par nyo bar 'dod pa na/ /de la bskyed
60a3(mdo 'grel): par rung ba yin/ /rin ni thams cad ma gzhal bar/ /sdom brtson de longs spyad mi rung/ /dkon mchog gsum las su dag gis/ /gus pas chung ma sogs phul na/ /de la rin ni mi gdab ste/ /sbyin bdag 'dod pas gtang bar bya/ /mi khyod
60a4(mdo 'grel): glu gang rol mo rnams/ /byos shig ces ni dge slong gis/ /khyim pa rnams la bsgom mi bya/ /'di ni tshul ldan las ma yin/ /'di la tshul ni ji bzhin du/ /mchod cha ston pa mchod pa ni/ /ji ltar mdzes pa de ltar ni/ /bzhin bzang 'bad bas
60a5(mdo 'grel): byos shig brjod// mchod pa'i phyir yang mchod rten la/ /phur po la sogs mi gzugs te/ /dang po rtsom pa'i dus nyid du/ /gzugs rten byed la nyes pa med/ /mar me 'og tu dbul bya ste/ /brtul zhugs can gyis steng du min/ /dge tshul la sogs
60a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan yod bzhin/ /mchod bya'i steng du 'jog mi bya/ /gzhan dag med na dri yi chus/ /sdom brtson rkang ba dag bkrus nas/ /gus pas ston pa'i 'du shes ni/ /yid la byed pas rang gis 'dzeg/ dngos po gcig lhag brgya dang ni/ /gsum la sogs
60a7(mdo 'grel): pa bya ba ste/ /gtsug lag khang gi glo dang klog/ de yang lnga brtsegs dag tu brjod/ /kun tu bdun brtsegs bya ba ste/ /de yi skar khung nang stegs can/ /dbus su ston pa'i khang chen te/ /sgo ni phyi sgo'i drang thad du'o/ /dge slong ma yi dbyar khang ni/ /sum
60b1(mdo 'grel): brtsegs las ni lhag mi bya/ /gtsang khang skar khung nang stegs can/ /kun tu lnga brtsegs bya ba yin/ /sku gzugs mchod rten ba der gshegs kyi/ /bka' yang mngon bar dri bya ste/ /rnyings sam rlag na dge slong gis/ /slar ni gso bar 'os pa yin/ /gang du
60b2(mdo 'grel): gang zhig sngar byas der/ /'di nyid de ltar bzhag bya ste/ /snga ma'i gzugs las chung du min/ /lhag pa nyid du bya bar brjod/ /gtsug lag khang gi 'du byed ni/ /sbyin pa po yi 'dod ji bzhin/ /chen po dang ni chung duAng rung/ /mkhas pas yo byad dang
60b3(mdo 'grel): sbyar bya/ /mchod rten sku gzugs dri ma dang/ /maN+Dal yang ni 'gom mi bya/ /dgos pa'i ched du bde gshegs kyi/ /tshigs bcad sngon du byas te bgom/ /bsod snyoms dag la rgyu ba'i tshe/ /sangs rgyas la sogs brda yi tshig/ sdom
60b4(mdo 'grel): can la ni su dag 'di/ /de la gsal por go bar bya/ /sangs rgyas zhes ni brdod pa 'am/ /yang na rkang gnyis mchog ces brjod /sdug bsngal zad ces yang na gzhan/ /bdag gam chos sam gad de gsungs/ /de bzhin dge 'dun dag la
60b5(mdo 'grel): yang/ /brjod bya so so'i bdag nyid kyis/ /yon tan gang la de dang 'gyur/ /de ni de la brjod par bya/ /gcig bu mgron du'o sa pa la/ /dge slong ma rnams 'khod pa na/ /gang du dge slong zas kyi phyir/ /'dug pa'i stan ni dang por bzhag /
60b6(mdo 'grel): dge tshul gyi ni gral yang rung/ /de ru 'dug ste zos na ni/ /gal te dge slong nus med na/ /dge slong ma yis yon bshad bya/ /grong rgyu ba la song nas ni/ /gar song de don zhal ta bas/ /len pa dge slong med pa na/ /rnyed pa de yi sgal ba bzhag/ gal te 'ongs na
60b7(mdo 'grel): de yi'o/ /rnyed pa mtshams kyis bsgrub pa dang/ /grims su byas la brten pa dang/ /ci 'dod dge slong dge 'dun rnams/ /sbyin bdag gi ni bsnyad pas so/ /mngon du ba dang dbyar gdab na/ /so sor smos pa de bzhin te/ /brgyad po yang 
61a1(mdo 'grel): dag gags? pa 'di/ /thob dang mi thob 'gyed pas so/ /gdags dang me tog rgyal mtshan sogs/ /bsnyen bkur dang bcas sdom brtson ro/ /dge slong rnams kyis yongs bskor nas/ /dur khrod du ni khyer bar bya/ /me chen rab
61a2(mdo 'grel): tu 'bar ba yis/ /der ni yongs su brtags te sbyang/ /gal te yod na mar dag dang/ /tsan dan la sogs byug par bya/ /srog chags dang bcas rma can ni/ /'bad bas sa ni brkos nas su/ /spas te de la rtswa dang ni/ /lo 'dab sogs
61a3(mdo 'grel): kyi dgab bar bya/ /lus can rnams la srin bu'i rigs/ /brgyad khri bzhi stong yod ba rnams/ /lhan cig skye zhing 'jig ba'i phyir/ /ming can de dag tshig bar 'gyur/ /mthang gos dang bcas bla gos kyis/ /sdom brtson ro ni g.yogs
61a4(mdo 'grel): te 'byung/ /lhung bzed chos gos gzhan la ni/ /btsongs te bgo bar 'os ba yin/ /de rjes mi rtag rnam ba'i tshul/ /ston byed chos nyan sbyin bya ste/ /'di dag skyo ba bskyed phyir dang/ /mya ngan dag kyang bsal phyir ro/ /gang phyir 'dus byas
61a5(mdo 'grel): thams cad ni/ /rkyen gyis gzhan du 'gyur ba ste/ /rtswa rtse rlung gis bskyod pa yi/ /zil pa bzhin du mi bstan no/ /gang zhig 'chi bdag khrel rgod kha/ /dgang dka' der ni mi 'jug pa/ /mtho ris yang dag sa steng du/ /skyes pa de la
61a6(mdo 'grel): yod dam ci/ /ji ltar sa gzhi brtan pa la/ /bsregs pa'i ma byung kho na bzhin/ /rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa 'dir/ /mi rnams 'chi ba de bzhin no/ /gzugs rigs lang tsho thos ba dang/ /tshul khrims la sogs rtag min te/ /rgyal po
61a7(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten mgon gcig bu/ /gang gzhan 'dod chags bral ba yi/ /sdom brtson yang srid zad ba yang/ /kun tu gnas pa ma mthong na/ /gang gi ji skad ji ltar bzlog/ tshe ni chu yi ri mo 'dra/ /de ltar mi rtag chos bstan nas/ /de yi dngos
61b1(mdo 'grel): bo'i yon yang bshad/ /rkang lag gdong ba rab bkrus nas/ /mchod rten bskor ba byas nas so/ /ji snyed 'das byas de dag 'dir/ /mi rtag la sogs thub pa'i bka' / /dran ba yang dag thob ba yis/ /gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas ni/ /lung bzhin skal ba mnyam
61b2(mdo 'grel): por ni/ /shi ba'i yo byang sbyin bya ste/ /ro yi bsnyen bkur la sogs 'di/ /sras kyi gtso bo rnams la bcas/ /gaN+Di rgyud gsum mchod rten la/ /phyag byed tshe na gang zhig yod/ /tshul shing 'brim dang gsol ba la/ /gang yod de la 'os pa yin/ /gal te rdzas de
61b3(mdo 'grel): 'god pa na/ /brel bas der kun ma tshogs na/ /rnam bar 'gyed bas cha gnyis ni/ /rgan po gsar bu dag la sbyin/ /de ltar byas bas de yi nor/ /ma lus legs bar bgos bar 'gyur/ /gzhan dag kha cig glo bur du/ /lhags rkyang? de la skal ba
61b4(mdo 'grel): med/ /'chi ba bo yi 'dir bzhugs dag/ 'di snoms brnga ni gal te sbrang/ /de yis byams sems kyis bsngos na/ /de ni tshogs kyis thob ba yin/ /gal te byams sems ma yin pas/ /'tsho ba'i tshe na bsngos nas ni/ /gang zag gis ni blangs na
61b5(mdo 'grel): yang/ /de la nyes ba yang ma yin/ /khyim ba rnams ni bltos byas te/ /brtul zhugs 'dzin pa de lta min/ /de phyir gang la bltos yod pa'i/ /dge slong de la de mi rung/ /gnyen la yongs su bsngos pa'i nor/ /'di ni tshe 'phos rjes la yang/ /gos dang
61b6(mdo 'grel): lhung bzed la sogs pa/ /de ni tshogs kyi thang du dbul/ /rnam par sbyad de dbul ba des/ /cho ga bzhin du dge? bar bya/ /rin chen la sogs yod pa na/ /der ni bgor mi rung zhes brjod/ /dge slong shi ba'i yo byad ni/ /dge slong dbang bar 'os ba nyid//
61b7(mdo 'grel): de dag yod? na dge slong ma/ /de yang sring mo yin phyir dbang/ /dge slong ma ni shi ba'i nor/ /de la dge slong ma yang 'dod/ /de dag med na de la yang/ /dge slong rnams ni bdag bor 'dod/ /dge slong med par dge slong dag/ khyim pa'i grong du shi ba ni/ /de yi
62a1(mdo 'grel): nor de der lus na/ /gang phyir gnyis kar 'dod na yang/ /cig char nyid du slong byed phyir/ /gnyis ka la yang rung ba yin/ /gang gis gang la dmigs te byin/ /de ni ci bder de yir 'gyur/ /gtsug lag khang gi mtshams dag gi/ /bar du
62a2(mdo 'grel): dge slong shi ba na/ /gang du mgo bo bstan pa de/ /chos gos la sogs dbang ba yin/ /bu lon blangs nas dge slong gang/ /'chi bdag khar ni zhugs pa na/ /de ni 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyis/ /de yi nor las sbyin par bya/ /dge 'dun don du zhal ta
62a3(mdo 'grel): bas/ /bu lon blangs te ? shi? ba na/ /de kun tshogs kyis sbyin par ni/ /lung gis shin tu nges pa yin/ /gzhan las bu lon zhal ta bas/ /nges par 'di ni blang bya ste/ /rgan bo rgan po go byas nas/ /dbang po dang bcas yi ger bri/ /lhan cig gnas pa
62a4(mdo 'grel): rnams kyis ni/ /ba dan gos dang mal stan sogs/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'dod pa yis/ /tshogs la phul na nyes pa med/ /gal te 'gyod pa'i me lce yis/ /de dag sems ni bsregs pa na/ /slar yang bzlog pa'i chu yis ni/ /ma lus zhi bar
62a5(mdo 'grel): bya ba nyid/ /'di la rang bzhin gnas pa dang/ /gzhan dag gnas nas phyung ba shi/ gcig gi yang ni yo byang rnams/ /rang bzhin gnas la rung ba yin/ /mdun du yongs su dag ba'i blos/ /rang bzhin gnas pa med gyur na/ /gnas nas phyung ba
62a6(mdo 'grel): la yang ni/ /'di yi dbang thang bkag pa med/ /yi ge bri ba byas nas ni/ /gal te tshogs la phul ba na/ /shi nas de ni bgo bya ste/ /nor dang 'dra ba nyid la so/ /gtsug lag khang 'os der gyur pa/ /de ni de la mkho ba nyid/ /mtshon cha kun ni ma
62a7(mdo 'grel): gtogs pa/ /rgyal po la 'os rgyal la byin/ /mtshon cha la ni khab la sogs/ /rjes mthun dngos po bya ba nyid/ /de bshig nas ni rtsa ba yin/ /mtshon cha gzhan du mi bya'o/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bde gshegs kyi/ /tshig bcad gcig
62b1(mdo 'grel): tsan bklags pa na/ /legs gsungs dam pa'i chos dag gi/ /rnyed pa de la mi 'os min/ /thub dbang dam chos rnam pa gnyis/ /lung dang gzhan yang rtogs pa'o/ /lung de 'dzin pa'i don gyis na/ /chos kyi rnyed pa 'os pa yin/ /khrims ldan sngar ni dbyar gnas
62b2(mdo 'grel): par/ /khas blangs gal te shi ba 'am/ /bslab pa phul lam gzhan gyur kyang/ /dbyar gyi rnyed ba 'os pa yin/ /bder gshegs sras kyi lhun po'i tshad/ /sku gzugs mchod rten bya bar 'os/ /zur bzhi logs mnyam mdzes byas nas/ /bang rim la
62b3(mdo 'grel): sogs gzhan rims bzhin/ /de yang gnyis gsum bzhi dang lnga/ /'bras bu'i rim ba bdugs kyi grangs/ /mchod rten yu bu yon tan can/ /so so skye bo rnams la 'os/ /'di yi mthar ni ston pa yi/ /gdugs kyi tshad la nges pa med/ /brgya
62b4(mdo 'grel): lhag ri bar bye ba rnyed/ /mchod rten yang ni bya bar 'os/ /dman ba bse ru'i spyod pa la/ /gdugs ni rim pa bcu gsum ste/ /de la char khab med pa dag/ bya'o zhes ni thos pa yin/ /logs dag tu ni slob ma bzung/ /ston pa'i mchod rten dbus su
62b5(mdo 'grel): ste/ /lhag ma rnams ni grol rims bzhin/ /de yi phyi rol 'phags min rnams/ /slob ma rnams ni phan tshun du/ /rab gus mnyan pas bsnyen bkur bya/ /dge 'dun gyis kyang cho ga bzhin/ /sman dag gis kyang nye bar bsdu/ /lhung bzed chu gtsang
62b6(mdo 'grel): dri ma med/ /khrus phyir nang pa slong la sbyin/ /lhung bzed lan gsum bkrus nas kyang/ /sangs rgyas tshigs bcad bzlas nas so/ /sman dag byin len byas nas ni/ /tshul ldan nad pa la ni sbyin/ /byin len stobs pa med na ni/ /rang nyid len pa la yang
62b7(mdo 'grel): rung/ /chos gos byin gyis brlabs pa dag/ nad pa la ni mi bslang ste/ /yang na de yis phul yang ni/ /dge slong rnams kyis bgo mi bya/ /gang 'dir chags pas de len dang/ /sbyin bdag de ltar bskul ba dang/ /nges par 'gegs pa nyid la brtson/ /de dag
63a1(mdo 'grel): gsum char skyon dang bcas/ /'phags min 'phags pa'i nad la yang/ /nam yang le lo mi bya ste/ /'khrul 'khor la sogs sbyor ba dang/ /sman pa dang ba chung bas min/ /sangs rgyas la mchod tshogs ston mo/ /nad pa gal te gso
63a2(mdo 'grel): byed na/ /ngan zhing sman yang byin rlabs te/ /chos gos sogs kyis bya ba yin/ /de la nor med gyur lta na/ /gang yod gzhan las bslangs nas kyang/ /nus pa ji bzhin bsgrub bya ste/ /de yi dang pa skyed phyir ro/ /tha na rngo gu me tog dang/ /phye ma dang ni
63a3(mdo 'grel): bum pa'i chu/ /brten nas kyang ni mchod pa dag/ de yis nye bar bstan bzhin bya/ /gang? zhig don min nad kyis gzir/ /nor la yongs su chags pa na/ /'bad pas de ni blangs nas nges/ /mchod dang brtul zhugs can ston bya/ /rang gi lhung
63a4(mdo 'grel): bzed gos sogs kyang/ /de la byin nas de yi tshe/ /nad g.yogs gis ni bde gshegs sogs/ /mchod pa'i las la brtson par bya/ /khyad par du yang nor bdag la/ /chags pas gang du srog mi 'chad/ /ci 'dod de yi lhung bzed sogs/ /yon tan
63a5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa gzhan la 'bul/ /dge slong tshul khrims ldan yang sngon/ /lhung bzed la ni chags bzhin shing/ /rang gi lhung bzed nang du ni/ /gdug ba can gyi sbrul du skyes/ /sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba yis/ /gzhang 'brum legs bar gso bya ste/ /
63a6(mdo 'grel): sman pa'i man dag med bar ni/ /sen mo sogs kyis bcad mi bya/ /gang la slob ma la sogs pa'i/ /nad g.yog med cing sman med na/ /de la sman dag sbyin ba dang/ /nad g.yog kyang ni tshogs kyis bya/ /bdze can gyi ni dge 'dun gyi/ /mal
63a7(mdo 'grel): stan nyer spyod spang bya ste/ /rdzing bu ljon shing nye 'khor dang/ /spong sa 'dug sa la sogs so/ khang bzang dang ni khyams kyi sgo/ /g.yos khang bshang gci'i khang par ni/ /mi 'dug dben par gnas bya ste/ /de ni tshogs kyis bskyed bar
63b1(mdo 'grel): 'os/ /gtsug lag khang gi bdag po ni/ /shi 'am bcing sam ring song na/ /dka' bas kyang ni lo lnga'i bar/ /gtsug lag khang du legs gnas bya/ /lo lnga lon nas de drung gi/ gtsug lag khang rten rnyed pa dag/ blangs te de ru gnas bya ste/ /bsrung phyir gso sbyong tha dang
63b2(mdo 'grel): ngo/ /de ltar lo ni bcur gnas kyang/ /der ni 'dzin po med pa na/ /ma la stan la sogs de byin nas/ /gtsug lag khang gzhan gnas par bya/ /'gro 'dod rnams kyis ci 'dod par/ /sgo bsdams rgyas btab 'gro bya ste/ /slar yang de ni 'jug ba na/ /de la 'dug
63b3(mdo 'grel): gnas sbyin par bya/ /gtsug lag khang gzhan dbang ba'i dkor/ /dge slong gzhan du spyod pa bkag/ dgos pa'i phyir du de mthun pas/ /yongs su spyod la nyes pa med/ /sbyin bdag rnams kyis mal stan dag/ gtsug lag khang du phul ba gang/ /mi 'dod kyang
63b4(mdo 'grel): ni de lta bu/ /gzhan du dbul du gzhug mi bya/ /tshogs kyi gos ni gyon nas kyang/ /dge slong rang gi las byed bkag/ gos bkru ba dang tshon la sogs/ /de bzhin gzhan yang chen po gang/ /char dang kha ba 'bab pa na/ /bla gab med bar mi bzhag cing/ /bshad gci yi
63b5(mdo 'grel): ni sa dag tu/ /de gyon pa ni bkag pa yin/ /gnas mal gnas skyong ma gtang par/ /mtshan mo'i dus su 'gro mi bya// //bam bo drug pa/ /gtod pa na yang yul gcig la/ /go bar byas te bzhag par 'dod/ /tshogs kyi 'dug stan la
63b6(mdo 'grel): sogs kyang/ /rgan rims bzhin du sbyin bya ste/ glo bur lhags pa'i ched du yang/ /dngos po gang yang kun du bzhag/ gnas kyi dbye bas dgon par yang/ /rgan rims sogs la ci 'dod par/ /sa dang shing gi phug la sogs/ /rims ba ji bzhin thob
63b7(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /dgon pa'i glo bur lhags pa la 'di/ /dngos bo'i skal ba bzhag bya ste/ /chos gos la sogs spas nas ni/ /gnas bya gzhan du ltung bar 'gyur/ /gang du sa gzhi khru ngo yi/ /tshad tsam la yang mal dag gnang/ /zhabs tshags can dngos shing
64a1(mdo 'grel): sogs/ /pha gu dang ni sman gyi snod/ /kun nas 'jam? por byug ste bya/ /gnas khang sogs su 'gro 'dod pas/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi 'dug gnas ni/ /bshig nas 'gro bar mi bzhed do/ /gnas khang 'gyed ba la sogs dus/ /ma bsgo bar ni 'gro
64a2(mdo 'grel): ba na/ /slar yang rgan rim de bzhin du/ /'dod kyang de la 'os ma yin/ /gsar bu rnams dang de mnyam par/ /gnas mal bza' ba 'bras bu dang/ /me tog la sogs sbyin pa nyid/ /bstan pa 'di la chos nyid do/ /nad tshabs che la gnas khang gzhan/ /ji ltar 'dod
64a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin sbyin bya ste/ /ji srid nad sos gyur gyi bar/ /khas len mi byed na yang sbyin/ /gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol tu/ /gos stan mthong na nang gzhug cing/ /rgan phon dang nyam chung gis/ /dge skos dag la go bar bya/ /dge 'dun mal stan yo byad dag/ me
64a4(mdo 'grel): yis tshig gam chus khyer na/ /bdag nyid kyis ni rjes bsrung ste/ /nges par bskyed ngo grogs med na/ /dang po gang zag rnams kyi ste/ /phyi nas tshogs kyi de nas chos/ /de nas bde bar gshegs pa ste/ /'di ni dbyung ba'i rim par 'dod/ /go skabs 'byad
64a5(mdo 'grel): bcug nges? brtags te/ /gang phyir thabs kyis bsgrub ba nyid/ /don gnyer de yi dge slong la/ /mdo 'am 'dul nyid dris te'o/ /'dug pa'i thang du nye bas sam/ /de yis 'gro bzhin du yang rung/ /sdom brtson rang la blta ba yi/ /klog dang nye bar stan
64a6(mdo 'grel): pa sbyin/ /nye bar bstan pa 'dzin pas kyang/ /bla ma sangs rgyas dang por gus/ /rtse gcig nyal ba spangs nas ni/ /nye bar bstan ba lan gsum bzung/ /nye bar bstan pa ston ba po/ /'di yis sgra ni mi thos pa'i/ /phyogs der de la gtang nas ni/ /lan
64a7(mdo 'grel): brgya'i bar du yang ni bzla/ /'don dang rjes su 'don? sogs kyi/ /dbyangs kyi thub pa'i gsung mi bsgrag/ yul skad dag dang rjes mthun bas/ /'dod bar byed la 'gal ba med/ /sdom brtson gang zhig khang bzangs kyi/ /ka ba ljon shing rtsig ba la ?/ /rab tu
64b1(mdo 'grel): brdeg na 'gal tshabs can/ /de yi phyir na de mi spyad/ /dpung rgyan dang ni gzhan min pas/ /so sor 'brang ma la sogs gdags/ /phan 'dong sngags ni bzla bya ste/ /gnod gyur gsod sngags ma yin no/ /lha gzhan phyag 'tshal mchod pa ni/ /gsang sngags phyir yang bkag pa
64b2(mdo 'grel): yin/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag byas nas/ /gzhan gyi gsang sngags brjod par bya/ /lhung bzed kha sbub? byas pa la/ /stan dang ston mo bza' ba bkag/ dam pa'i chos ni ston pa na/ /dang ldan rnams kyis 'dus byas bstan/ /sa gzhi gos kyi g.yogs pa la/ /
64b3(mdo 'grel): 'dus byas mi rtag 'du shes kyis/ /dge slong rnams kyi 'gro ba gnang/ /sdom brtson kyis gos gsum 'dzin la/ /khrus kyi ras bsrel rjes su gnang/ /sa bon tshes par dka' ba'i rigs/ /rlang pas phog pa spyad du rung/ /sgregs pa byung ba dor nas ni/ /gus pas
64b4(mdo 'grel): kha nang bkru par bya/ /sngon las bzlog dka' las grub pa'i/ /ming pa gnyis yong ma gtogs so/ /mngon mtshan can dag 'chang ba ni/ /dge 'dun nyid la rjes su gnang/ /bsod snyoms pa yi chos gos la/ /mdud pa bor ba la sogs min/ /thams cad
64b5(mdo 'grel): kha dog gcig pa yi/ /gos rnams nye bar longs spyad min/ /me tog 'bras bu shing sogs drung/ /gci sogs kun tu spyad pa spang/ /steng du shing las bya ba ste/ /rdo yi skas ni ma yin no/ /rlung nad can gyi phyag mi bya/ /de la yang ni gzhan gyis min/ /lus
64b6(mdo 'grel): gtsang byi dor byas nas ni/ /chos gos legs par bgo bar bya/ /de lus mnyer pa'i bsam pa yis/ /sku mnye byas la nyes pa med/ /li shi'i me tog la sogs pa/ /rnyed na dben par 'dug nas ni/ /sbyin bdag rnams la phan 'dod cing/ /lta byed tshim
64b7(mdo 'grel): rgyas don du bsnams/ /chos gos 'jam phyis byas pa sngon/ dga' bo la mdzes mas byin/ /skur 'debs gyur gsan thub dbang gis/ /dgag pa'i tshul 'di rab tu gsungs/ /brdungs nas 'das? por byas pa yi/ /chos gos bcang bar mi bya ste/ /de ni su 
65a1(mdo 'grel): zhig 'chang byed pa/ /nges par 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur/ /phag gi yan lag la sogs dang/ /bu ram shing la sogs ba dag /chom rkun gyis ni bong ba gang/ /skye bos mthong ba blang bar bya/ /rgyab dang mgo bo rnyed pa yis/ /khur po khur ba'i
65a2(mdo 'grel): sdom brtson gang/ /de ya 'gal tshabs sdug bsngal gyis/ /'jig rten pha rol gzir bar byed/ /srin bus la ba rin po che/ /zos pa la ni nim pa dang/ /'dab ma bdun pa la sogs pa'i/ /lo ma'i phye mas bskon par gsungs/ /pha ni dbul po ma yin
65a3(mdo 'grel): pas/ /bu la nor skal ster ba na/ /tshul khrims ldan pas blangs nas ni/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi dgos pa bya/ /mtshams gzhan gnas pas de yi tshe/ /'dun pa phul na nyes byas te/ /'bul du bcug kyang mi 'chags pas/ /nges par nyes byas las
65a4(mdo 'grel): gzhan min/ /lab? la sogs bzang po gang/ /tshogs kyi ci bder thob pa na/ /de ni btsongs te bgo bya yin/ /gshag cing gtub par mi bya'o/ /gnas mal rab tu ma brtags par/ /nyal ba la ni nyes byas 'gyur/ /rta dang khyim bya bar ta ka /glang
65a5(mdo 'grel): sogs 'thab du gzhug mi bya/ /bde gshegs kyi ni gnyis po la/ /pus 'khyud rjes su gnang ba ste/ /lus ni nad kyis nyams pa dang/ /gzhan yang rgan po de la'o/ /gnas nas 'go bar 'dod pa yis/ /slar yang 'ong bar 'dod pa na/ /gnas
65a6(mdo 'grel): mal kun nas sbyangs nas ni/ /legs par gtad de 'gro bar bya/ /gdal gtad pa de yis kyang/ /de ni 'bad pas kun tu bsrung/ /'ongs nas slar yang sbyin bya ste/ /rtags sam go bar byas te'o/ /gang sngon brang 'gro ma mthong nas/ /mnan pas
65a7(mdo 'grel): dge slong gzung nas ni/ /gnyi ka yang ni shi bar gyur/ /des na 'di ni go byed yin/ /brtul zhugs can gyi zla phyed der/ /chos brgyad dang ni bco lnga la/ /gnas mal legs par sbyang bar bya/ /ma sbyangs na ni bslab mi 'thob/ /gnas khang bzang
65b1(mdo 'grel): po dang bsgrubs pa/ /tshogs la nye bar mkho ba yang/ /sngon du gang 'os thob pas sbyangs/ /rgan rims ji bzhin 'dir yod min/ /bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa na/ /snong byad dang ni yo byad gos/ /sngon du blangs nas dbyer bya ste/ /phral pa'i las kyis ma yin no/ /
65b2(mdo 'grel): tshogs kyi gnas mal bzang po nyid/ /gang zag dag la de mi 'dod/ /rgyab rten byas pa'i stan dag ni/ /gnyis ka la yang rjes su gnang/ /lo gsum khyad par zhugs pa dang/ /lhan cig stan gcig la mi 'dug/ dge slong bsnyen par ma rdzogs dang/ /lhan
65b3(mdo 'grel): cig stan la rung ma yin/ /mkhan po dang ni slob ma yang/ /khyim? pa'i khyim du rjes su gnang/ /stan gcig la 'dug der yang ni/ /gnyis pa cung zad med na'o/ /mal stan la sogs blangs nas ni/ /'jigs bcas gzhan du 'gro ba na/ /sdom brtson gyis deng longs
65b4(mdo 'grel): spyad nas/ /'jigs bral tshe na gtag par bya/ /'di la 'jigs dang bral nas ni/ /sngar bzhin yang dag yongs su sbyad/ /rdol dang ral dang zag pa dag/ cho ga bzhin du bcos par bya/ /gang der gding ba la sogs pa/ /sbyad mi bzod dag longs spyod phyir/ /de
65b5(mdo 'grel): yis lcir legs bsres nas/ /rtsig pa'i khung bu la sogs byug/ de ltar legs par sbyar na ni/ /sbyin 'bras bde ba'i don du 'gyur/ /sbyin bdag rnams kyi bsod nams rgyun/ /mi 'chad pa yi rgyu yin no/ /gtsug lag khang gzhan rnyed pa ni/ /spyad
65b6(mdo 'grel): de gzhan du gnas pa na/ /de yis gong dam du na yang/ /thams cad rin tshad gzhal bar bya/ /dge 'dun dag gi gnas mal la/ /shes byed mtshan ma gdab par bya/ /che ge'i sbyin bya'i chos yin zhes/ /mdzes pa'i yi ge rnams kyis so/ /
65b7(mdo 'grel): khri steng khri ni brtsegs pa la/ /dge slong 'dug par byed pa de/ /nyes byas rung gi sgra gcan gyis/ /'das te de ni 'og tu ltung/ /dge tshul gang zhig dad pa can/ slob la rab gus blo ldan gyis/ /tshogs la go byas de dag gi/ gnas mal la ni
66a1(mdo 'grel): rung ba nyid/ /ko lpags las gyur mal stan dag/ yul gyi dbus su bkag pa ste/ /khyim pa'i khyim du 'dug tsam rung/ /der yang nyal ba gnang ma yin/ /gtsug lag khang gi sgo drung du/ /dom lpags nyid ni rjes su gnang/ /ko lpagS
66a2(mdo 'grel): kyi ni mal stan dag/ mdza' 'khob du ni nyes pa med/ /ngo mtshar nor bu mu tig sogs/ /rin chen mchog gis mdzes pa la/ /gser dang pa so la sogs rkang/ /mal stan chen po zhes byar brjod/ /gang gi steng du brla 'dug nas/ /rkang kyang sa la mi reg
66a3(mdo 'grel): pa/ /mal stan khyad par 'di 'dra yang/ /de ni mal stan mthon por 'dug/ 'di dag bsnyen gnas sdom par ni/ /khyim pa la yang rab bkag ste/ /de 'dir gnyis ka dge slong la/ /ci phyir dgag par mi 'os men/ /khri'u la ni gcig pur 'dug /
66a4(mdo 'grel): gnyis ni shing khri stan la'o/ /bstan dang mi bstan shes byas nas/ /shing khri la ni gsuum sogs kyang/ /gaN+Di brdungs nas zhus te 'am/ /tshul shing brims pa dag gis kyang/ /rnyed pa 'god byed de yi tshe/ /dge slong kun la go bar bya/ /shi sogs
66a5(mdo 'grel): brda ni sprod byed pa'i/ /yu'o la sogs gaN+Di lnga/ /dge slong rnams kyis brdung ba ni/ /'gal med rjes su gnang ba yin/ /lan cig kun tu bteg pa yis/ /gang du rab tu brdung ba ni/ /de ni shi ba mtshon byed pa/ /yu'o nyid brjod dang po'o/ /
66a6(mdo 'grel): gang du lan gnyis btegs pas brdung/ /de ni gnyis pa las su shes/ /de nyid gcig gi lhag bar ni/ /'du ba zhes byar mngon par brjod/ /nges med gnod byung gaN+Di ste/ /de yang 'jig rten go byed yin/ /sgra ldan 'khar gsil
66a7(mdo 'grel): 'khrol ba ni/ /bsam gtan pa rnams go byed nyid/ /gtsug lag khang du glo bur gang/ /'jug tshe phyi rol rkang gnyis bkru/ /sbrug gam yang na phyi bya ste/ /chu 'am yang na lo mas so/ /nang zhugs nye bar phyin ba na/ /brtul zhugs can
66b1(mdo 'grel): thad phyag bya ste/ /des kyang de la ci nus su/ /de dag la ni bya ba yin/ /dka' thub can gyi thog mar ni/ /dge 'dun dag gi nang khrims dri/ /de yis stan pa'i bka' bzhin d/ /yang dag rjes su bsrung bar bya/ /gtsug lag khang du dge slong la/ /gnod byed du ni mi
66b2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba/ /yon tan 'phel du rung ba gang/ /de 'dra dge slong rnams kyi bca' / /shes bya ma lus de nyid ni/ /mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la/ /brtul zhugs can gyis tshe ldan dang/ /rigs rus mtshan nas smos pa dang/ /yul nas brjod par
66b3(mdo 'grel): mi bya'o/ /rgan bu dag la gsar bu yis/ /btsun pa zhes ni brjod bya ste/ /gsar bu la ni rgan pos kyang/ /tshe ldan zhes brjod gzhan du min/ /rigs pa yis ni ci nus su/ /nyal nyil nges par bsal bar bya/ /tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la/ /gaN+Di
66b4(mdo 'grel): brdungs nas gnas pas so/ /bshang gci mchil ma ngar snabs dang/ /khrag kyang nges par 'dor pa na/ /sgra bcas se gol gtog bya ste/ /bslab ba zad par mi 'dod na'o/ /rtswa sngon dang ni chu dag la/ /dor bar bya ba ma yin no/ /sa gzhi
66b5(mdo 'grel): gtsang ma'i phyogs dag dang/ /gang du 'gal mthong dor yang min/ /nyin mtshan bder gnas dge slong gis/ /tam po la ni mi bza' ste/ /dge slong rigs pa bsten pa yi/ /nad pa la ni nyes pa med/ /dus min zas la bkag pa yis/ /'bras bu gang
66b6(mdo 'grel): yang mi bza' ste/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis chos 'dul las/ /gnang ba de spyad mdor bsdus yin/ /dga' po mig sman thur ma sogs/ /thub pas ji skad mdor gsungs bzhin/ /de bzhin dge slong rnams kyis 'dir/ /bza' ba bag yod yongs su spyad//
66b7(mdo 'grel): gtsug lag khang nang dge slong gis/ /skra dang kha sbu breg mi bya/ /nad pas sa gzhi gtsang ma la/ /gos dag bting ste breg par bya/ /skra sogs 'breg par byed pa la/ /rgan rims ji bzhin rjes su gnang/ /nyung du tsam zhig bregs na yang/ /gsar bu'i
67a1(mdo 'grel): 'phro ni mi bcad do/ /dang por mgo bo yang ni kha/ /de nas sna yi gtsang sbra dang/ /de 'og rkang lag sen mo ste/ /las byed rim pa 'di dag go/ /skra ni chan pas mi breg ste/ /brtul zhugs can la gnang ba ni/ /'ga' zhig gnas su rma nyen//
67a2(mdo 'grel): chan pas bcad du rung ba yin/ /nad pa la ni go byas nas/ /tshangs spyod rnam par mkhas pa yis/ /kun khyab phyogs su dran ldan pas/ /spu dag bregs sogs rung ba yin/ /zla 'dra 'bras bu'i rnam pa 'am/ /de bzhin spu gri'i so lta bu/ /bcad
67a3(mdo 'grel): po rtsi yis mi byug cing/ /dag phyir yin te mdzes phyir min/ /dgon pa pa yis sor gnyis las/ /lhag par skra skye bzhag mi bya/ /grong gi mthar gnas brtul ldan gyis/ /sor gnyis yang ni mi rung smad/ /skra rnams phregs zin rjes
67a4(mdo 'grel): thogs la/ /dag pa'i don du khrus bya'o/ /sdom brtson rkyen dbang ldan gyur na/ /yan lag lnga rnams bkru bar gnang/ /dge 'dun spyi khang nyer gnas su/ /spu gri la sogs snod bcas bzhag/ skra sogs las la mkhas na ni/ /dben par
67a5(mdo 'grel): byed la bkag pa med/ /so shing byas shing kha bkrus nas/ /dam pa'i chos ni bshad bya ste/ /zas dus yang ni de nyid las/ /gzhan du 'os pa ma yin no/ /de yang rnam gsum ring shos ni/ /sor ni bcu gnyis shes par bya/ /brgyad ni
67a6(mdo 'grel): chung du de yi dbus/ /bar ma zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /de dor nas kyang lce bzhar gyis/ /'bad de lce ni bzhar bar bya/ /'khar ba zangs dang ra gan lcags/ /lce bzhar rnam pa bzhi yin no/ /grong gi tha mar gnas pa yis/ /de dag nyer bsgrub
67a7(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang ni/ /med na legs par blud pa yi/ /shing tshal gyis kyang bzhar rung nyid/ /gal te shing tshal yang med na/ /kha dang lce yi dri ma ni/ /ji ltar sus kyang mi mthong bar/ /lci bar bcas pa'i chu yis spyad/ /sngon byung dug can sprul shi
67b1(mdo 'grel): bas/ /bram ze'i bur skyes gyur pa zhig rab byung de yi lce yis dris/ /rnam sbyang nyes pa mang por 'gyur/ /dang por sbrang ma so shing gis/ /de yi rtsangs pa shi gyur te/ /de yis ni le de la gang/ /reg pas mdza' dag shi bar gyur/ /de yi dri dor thams cad du//
67b2(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba rnams ni rim gyi shi/ de yi phyir na bcom ldan 'das/ /thugs rje ldan pas bkag ba yin/ /tshul ldan rnams kyi so shing ni/ /bkrus nas yongs su dor bar bya/ /chu dag med na sa la yang/ /brud de yongs su dor bar bya/ /gci ba dang ni bshang ba dang//
67b3(mdo 'grel): so shing bca' ba'i bya ba ste/ /rnam pa gsum po dge slong gis/ /sgrib g.yogs can gyi phyogs su bya/ /dge slong dag la rim gcig pa'i/ /mchil lham bcang ba rjes su gnang/ /mchil lham rim pa mang po can/ /ma brtags par ni bcang mi bya/ /sgra can dang ni rin po
67b4(mdo 'grel): che/ /bcad du rung ba ma yin no/ /tshul khrims ldan pa longs spyod na/ /dge 'dun gyi la nyes pa med/ /lhags rlung can gyis phyogs sam/ /kha ba can du nyin mo yang/ /rkang pa'i gnas skabs rig bya ste/ /yu ba can yang rjes su gnang/ /stag dang seng ge dred dang rta//
67b5(mdo 'grel): glang po'i bags pas bya ba min/ /gzhan dag kyang ni de dag gi/ rgyus pa can ni rnam par spangs/ /gzhan yang sder mo can dang ni/ /mche ba can ni mi bcang ste/ /spyad khyi byi ba la sogs pa'i/ /pags pas byas pa'i mchil lham yang/ /gtsug lag khang du thams
67b6(mdo 'grel): cad du/ /shing gi mchil lham mi rung ste/ /bshad pa dang gci ba'i khang ba dang/ /khyim pa'i grong du nyes pa med/ /'od ma mun dza la sogs pa'i/ /rang bzhin mchil lham mi bcang ste/ /rlung khrag nad kyis nyen pa yi/ /nad pa dag la bkag pa med/ /gru la sogs pa med
67b7(mdo 'grel): pa na/ /glang po rta dang ma he dang/ /khyu mchog rnga mo'i mjug ma la/ /'jus te brgal pa bkag pa med/ /tshogs la 'bad pas thams cad du/ /bsrung la rag las yod ma yin/ /rgyal po'i skal ba len pa dang/ /zhing gi bya ba rjes su gnang/ /gtsug lag khang du char sogs
68a1(mdo 'grel): kyi/ /'jigs pa rnams kyi g.yengs pa na/ /tshogs kyi nags kyi lo tog ni/ /'bad pas rang gis bkur bar bya/ /dge 'dun gyi ni ba lang sogs/ /rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya/ /khol zhig shos shig la sogs pa'i/ /tshig ngan brjod par mi bya'o/ /dge tshul
68a2(mdo 'grel): la sogs gang rnams kyis/ /lam du lam rgyags khur ba na/ /des don bkur bya chu la yang/ /dge slong gis ni bsgral bar bya/ /dub pa na yang bkur bya zhing/ /de ni de yi byin brlabs te/ /sems kyi 'gyod pa med pas ni/ /theg gu la sogs sbyor bas so/ /rkun pos skrag
68a3(mdo 'grel): gyur por pa 'am/ /brgal dka' i chu la bo pa yang/ /de ni legs blangs phyung nas kyang/ /yongs su spyod la bkag pa med/ /bza' bca' rdzas sogs kyes gang ba'i/ /shing rta bgrod ka'i lam duAm/ /kha lo pa yi stan ma gtogs/ /'bad pas dge slong rnams kyis
68a4(mdo 'grel): bkri/ 'di la 'di gnyis 'os yin pas/ /gru ni 'dam sogs zin pa na/ /gru gdong rnam par spangs nas ni/ /de ni dge slong rnams kyi bkri/ rlung sogs med na tshon gyi las/ /bya'o nyi ma ngan par min/ /'di la gang du skyon 'byung ba'i/ /sa yi cha dang nyin gung min/ /mkhas
68a5(mdo 'grel): pas phal cher rdul dang char/ /rlung dang nyi dus ma yin te/ /'di ni khang bzangs sogs don du/ /sa gzhi gtsang mar sbyangs nas so/ /dge slong rnams ni rtsod pa dag/ byed na chos ldan lhan cig bas/ /ma gus byed pa de dag ni/ /yal bar mi dor dgag bar bya/ /khrims
68a6(mdo 'grel): 'cha' gyur la khrims ldan gyis/ /tshul mnyam rnams la mang thos kyis/ /thos pa mnyam la spobs pa can/ /sbobs pa mnyam la'ang phul byung gis/ /gang zhig dang por rtsod pa la/ /de yi tshig gis 'dul gyur ba/ /sbobs can nyid la'ang gang lhag ba/ /
68a7(mdo 'grel): de dag tshig gis 'dul ba yin/ /rab tu nges dang ldan pa yi/ /rtsod ba yongs su rtog pa pos/ /phan tshun nang khon bstan pa la/ /yang na btang snyoms bzhag par bya/ /mi mthun pas kyang lam dag tu/ /phrad na rgan la phyag bya ste/ /des kyang nad med gyur cig
68b1(mdo 'grel): brjod/ /gzhan du gnyis ka ltung bar 'gyur/ /bsro khang khrus kyi gnas su ni/ /sgo drung srungs ma bzhag bya ste/ /dge slong rnams ni khrus song dag/ byed pa ma dang bzlog phyir ro/ /sdom brtson sna tshogs dag go/ ri mo'i cho ga de dag gnang/ /gang dag mi rung ba yi las/ /
68b2(mdo 'grel): sems can rnam pa ma gtogs so/ /gnas khang dag tu rus pa yis/ /tshogs bcas dur khrod chen po bri/ /gcer bu so gtsigs 'jigs pa yi/ /thod pa'i phreng brgyan du bya/ /rtsa ba'i sgor ni dbang phyug che/ /kun dga' bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor can/ /lag na
68b3(mdo 'grel): be con thogs pa yi/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po bri/ /cho 'phrul pad+ma rgyas pa la/ /bder gshegs gzugs mang bzhugs pa dang/ /srid ba'i 'khor lo'i kbar dag tu/ /sgo khang logs ni gnyis su'o/ /gtsang khang sgor ni gnod sbyin rnams/ /me tog phreng
68b4(mdo 'grel): thogs bri bya ste/ /gus pas bza' ba mang thogs ni/ /khyams kyi bkod pa'i sa dag tu'o/ /mdzod sgor gnod sbyin chen po ni/ /lag na rin chen myu gu'i ming/ /kha nas rin chen mang skyug pa/ /gser gyi bum pa mang thogs pa'o/ /kun nas 'du ba'i khang par ni/ /brtul
68b5(mdo 'grel): ldan rgan zhing rgan pa rnams/ /chos dang mngon brjod 'chad pa ni/ /byed pa mngon par gnas pa bri/ /bsro khang me yi gnas su ni/ /mdo sde lha yi pho nya bri/ /nad pa'i sngags su sku gzugs ni/ /nad pa'i dbugs 'byin bla mar mdzad/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyi phun tshogs
68b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i/ /klu mo chu yi gnas su ste/ /dur khrod 'jigs su rung ba ni/ /bshad dang gci ba'i khang par ro/ /khang bzang dag gis ngos dag tu/ /thub pa'i sngon gyi skyes rabs bri/ /dper na thams cad sgrol dang ni/ /zla 'od bzod par smra la sogs/ /gtsug lag
68b7(mdo 'grel): khang sogs 'dul ba la/ /'jig rten mngon par dad 'phel phyir/ /ri mo'i cho ga brjod pa 'di/ /thugs rje can gyis legs par gnang/ /khyams dang khang bzangs rnams su ni/ /ched du me sbar mi bya ste/ /dgos pas de dang mthun par ni/ /mdag ma yong
69a1(mdo 'grel): su spyad bar bzhed/ /sa gzhi yongs su sbyangs pa la/ /me ni btang bar mi bya ste/ /de phyir de ni spang ba'i phyir/ /me ling rjes su gnang ba yin/ /sangs rgyas tshogs kyi rgan po dar/ /rgyal po dang ni slob dpon dang/ /de bzhin mkhan po nyid kyi bka' / /
69a2(mdo 'grel): gang zhig rigs na 'da' mi bya/ /dang po 'dir ni gang cung zad/ /gnang med bkag pa med pa ni/ /gang zhig rung dang mthun pa na/ /de ni the tsom med par spyad/ /mi rung ba dang nye lta na/ /sdom brtson rnams kyi de mi spyad/ /'di ni chos 'dul mdor bsdus
69a3(mdo 'grel): pa/ /bstan bcos sgron ma lta bur bzhag/ 'dul ba 'am ni mdo sde yi/ /gleng gzhi gsal por ma dran na/ /bzhugs pa'i grong khyer rnams kyi ming/ /gang 'dod de ni smos par bya/ /mnyan yod gnas bcas tsam pa ka/ ba ra NA si yangs pa can/ /
69a4(mdo 'grel): rgyal po'i khab ces grags pa ste/ /'di dag grong khyer chen por shes/ /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ste/ /sa bdag mi dbang gsal rgyal brjod/ /bud med rnams las ga ste/ /brjed ngas dang ni smos par bya/ /grong khyer bar na si ste/ /sa
69a5(mdo 'grel): bdag yang ni tshangs sbyin no/ /skyes pa 'am de bzhin bud med la/ /bsnyen gnas ster na bsgrub bya ba/ /dang po'i sbyor ba gang yin la/ /klog pa dran pa mi gsal na/ /bslab pa'i gzhi ni mthar thug pa /'di ni thub pas gsungs pa yin/ /thog
69a6(mdo 'grel): mar ba ra NA ser ni/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na/ /lnga sde bzang la phan bzher pas/ /mdo sde bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs/ /gnyis pa'ang gang gis 'khor kun ni/ /gzugs la sogs pa phung por bcas/ /bdag 'dzin zhags pa
69a7(mdo 'grel): gcig pu yis/ /'chid ba mdza' dag rnam grol mdzad/ /lnga sde bzang rnams nyid kyi phyir/ /gos dag legs 'gos 'tsham dang mdzos/ /zlum po la sogs tha snyad kyis/ /bslab gzhi yang dag gsungs pa yin/ /ji ltar gnas ni gtsang ma'i lha/ /
69b1(mdo 'grel): bag yod gos yengs gyon byed pa/ /de bzhin thub? pas dge slong la/ /zlum par rab tu gsungs pa yin/ /thub pas rim pa 'di yis ni/ /bzang sbyin la sogs mtho ris dang/ /thar pa 'dod pa de dag la/ /bslab pa'i gzhi yang bca' bar mdzad/ /so ga'i dus
69b2(mdo 'grel): na mdza' med pa'i/ /rgya mtshor 'jug pa ji bzhin du/ /gang gis dang por 'dul ba la/ /tshul khrims dri ma sbyong mdzad pa/ /drug sde bdag nyid chen po rnams/ /ngo mtshar bcas pa'i spobs pa can/ /mtshon pa med kyang grub pa ste/ /bzang po de dag drang srong
69b3(mdo 'grel): che/ /dga' bo nye dga' 'gro mgyogs dang/ /'char ka mdun bdab? so ste/ /mkhas pa dma'o drug sder grags/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar mdzad/ /slar yang de dag shin tu bzang/ /rab bsngags mun pa 'joms byed pa/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis
69b4(mdo 'grel): gang ltar yang/ /'dul ba las ni 'da' mi byed/ /sangs rgyas sras su gang gyur ba/ /de dag yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /gang 'dir nye bar bstan pa ni/ /rtegs par byed pa'i bshes gnyen mchog/ yun ring bsags sdig mi shes pas/ /'gro'i gnyid kyis
69b5(mdo 'grel): log pa 'di/ /gang gis dam chos bstan ba yi/ /lag pas bskul de bsad mdzad pa'o/ /yun rings goms pas bskyed pa yi/ /thugs rjes thugs ni brlan pa ste/ /bdag nyid chen po'i mdzad pa ni/ /rnam bcu gdon mi za ba yin/ /gzhan dag byang chub
